120a1(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di la yod do// rdo rje sems dpa' dang sbyor ba gnyis su med par gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// lha mo thams cad dang kun nas 'dus pa ni shin tu sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid de/ thams 
120a2(rgyud 'grel): cad du sna tshogs pa'i skal pa bzang po zhes 'dod do// rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni/ de'i bdag nyid du bsgom pa'o// de ni sangs rgyas kun tu bdag sbyor bas zhes bya ba ste/ sngar bshad 
120a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rjes su sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ye shes sems dpa' nang du bstim pa'o// rnam pa kun mkhyen shes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan po ste/ de dang gnyis su med pa'i nga 
120a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dang ldan pa de ni kun gyi slob dpon yin zhes gsungs so// gang gi tshe yang lha ma thams cad dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba mngon du byed pa de'i tshe/ kun gyi slob dpon du rab tu gnas pa ste/ 
120a5(rgyud 'grel): kun tu sna tshogs bskal bzang por yang shes par bya'o// kun gyi slob dpo rab tu gnas pa de'i sgrub pa ni rjes su sgrub pa'o// grub pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba ni rjes su/ 
120a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa ste/ rgyal mtshan yin par rnam par bshad do// mchog ni kun gyi slob dpon la sogs pa slob ma'i sgrub pa'i grogs mchog go/ mtha' ma ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i skal ba can na// 'bring ni de 
120a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod par dbang bskur ba'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che mchog gi dbu rgyan ni sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan no// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal po yin no zhes gsungs so// 
120a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa ni thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan te/ de ni dpal gyi pad+mo'i tshul du bshad do// sangs rgyas rang bzhin grub gcig dang zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas gcig gis mtshan pa'o// grub pa ni rab tu grags pa'o// 
120b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i rang bzhini gcig ces bya ba ni/ thod pa gcig gis mtshan pa'o// de gnyis ni rim bzhin du sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba dang / dbang bskur ba chen po yin zhes don thams cad grub pas gsungs so// 
120b2(rgyud 'grel): yon gyi dam pa ni nor gyi dbyig thams cad dang / snying thams cad yon no zhes zer ro// tsan dan dmang po ga bung dang bsres pa ni khrag chen po yin par shes par bya'o// gzhan dag na re ni brag nag por brjod pa 
120b3(rgyud 'grel): nirdo rje 'dzin gyi'o// lal ni ga bur dang ldan par 'dod do// de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag pa ni dpal thams cad dang ldan pa'i ras yan zhes bya'o// dpal nye ka'i gtong ma'i cho ga la phyugs 
120b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po zhes gang gsungs pa de la yang bag zan las byas pa'i rang bzhin la tsan dan dmar poso bskus pa'i mi'i gzugs brnyan yin par shes par bya'i yang dag pa nyid ni ma yin no// gang yang rta mchog gi go tor 
120b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i cho ga la sha smras pa de yang bag zan la byas pa kho nar shes par bya'o// gang yang rgyal po'i zas sha dang chang dang ldan pa rdo rje nyi ma'i gtor ma'i gsungs pa de yang bag bya'i zan las byas pa kho na yin par shes par 
120b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// lal na re de med na bya ba yin te/ 'bras bu bcos ma la sogs pa bzhin no zhes zer ro// mna' dang dam tshig ces pa ni rnam grangs so// sdom pa dang bde mchog ni rnam grangs te/ sangs rgyas 
120b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ces gang gsungs pa de yang dam tshig ste/ bde mchog gi ngo bo nyid dang / e ma 'o bde ba'i ngo bo nyid do// sgrol ma zhes bya ba ni rab tu gsal bar rnam par bzhag go// shi shi ni yang srid pa ste/ phyag rgya de dag 
120b8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyang dam tshig ces bya bar brjod// gang gis shen 'da' bar byu pa yin pa'i phyir ro// phyag rgyu'i sbyang ba yin par bshasas par// phyag d+ha'i ltung ba yin par gsungs la/ de bzhi 
121a1(rgyud 'grel): ba yang phyag rgya yin par bshad do// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyong ba zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du bsgom pa la sbyor ba ste/ de ni sbyor ba thams cad ces bshad do// ci'i phyir 
121a2(rgyud 'grel): zhen/ nga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gang gi phyir sna tshogs pa'i dam tshigs thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin zhing shin tu phul du byung ba'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje'i dga' ba sems kyi 
121a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i bdag nyid can te/ de bas na sbyor ba thams cad ces bya'o// de'i sbyor ba thams cad bdag nyid de'i nye bar longs spyod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i khams gsum mo// de gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ 
121a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gzugs ni de ma zhes bshad do// sgra 'i glu la ni zhes bya ba ni klublangs pa'o// dri dang rab tu tshim par byed pa ni rnam grangs so// ro'i mang ni ra sa ya na zhes bya'o// reg pa 
121a5(rgyud 'grel): bde ba ni rig pa gang las bde bskyed par byed pa ste/ de ni bde ba'i reg pa'o// chos ni chos kyi spyad pache de de/ sbyor ba yin par bshad de/ de lta bu nyid ni sbyor ba thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa thams cad kyis 
121a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas gang la ji ltar bde bar longs spyod pa de ni rang gi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin par shes par bya'o// rjes su sbyor bas mchod na ni zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes sems dpa' yang gnyis su med 
121a7(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pas gzugs la sogs pa la nye bar longs spyod par byed pa'o// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba ni gzugs la sogs pa nye bar longs spyod pa las bde ba gang skyes pa de ni/ bde ba chen po yin no zhes bshad do// rang gi lha'i 
121a8(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid du bsgoms pa ni ye shes tsam la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ de ni rnal 'byor ces bshad pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin dang sbyor bo ni ming gi rnams grangs so// lha mo thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba shin du sbyor ba'i mtshan 
121b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin no zhes bshad do// gang gi tshe thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pas gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de la sangs 
121b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba 'thob po// bsgrub pa ni dga' bar spyod pa zhes bya'o// rjes su sbyor ba ni sngar bshad pa'i yon tan bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// lha mo rnams kyis skyes pa ltar byed pas dga' ba spyod pa ni slar rjes 
121b3(rgyud 'grel): su bsgrub pa yin no zhes bshad do// bde ba'i mchod la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang 'dus pa'i shin tu sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyi bde ba gang yin pa de ni// lugs pa zhes bya ste/ rgyan la rab tu 'jug pa'o// de ni sbyor ba kun las mos pa ste/ 
121b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mda' ni bde ba yin no zhes bshad do// dngos grub thams cad ldang ba'i sgra'i tshig can te/ thams cad du grub pa gang yin pa de ni sdang ba kun tu 'gro bas dngos grub chen po ste/ ldang ba chen po'o// dngos grub 
121b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po kun gyi mchog/ rdo rje 'chang chen po nyidi dang / dbang phyug chen po bla na med pa ni/ bla na med pa'i dbang phyug yin no zhes bshad do// khams gsum pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dang bral bas rang gi rgyud dang dngos grub chen po thams 
121b6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi mchog dbang phyug chen por gyur pas bla na med pa'i bde ba ni dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i bde ba'i mchog ste/ de ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba/ sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde can no zhes 
121b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad do// me tog ni khrag ces bshad do// bdug pa ni mdangs kyi tshig can no// mar me ni sha chen po zhes bya'o// dri dang spos thams cad kyi rnam grangs ni bshad zin to// 'o mar gyur pa las byung ba ni phrum ste/ de ni zla ba nya ba zhes 
121b8(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// raka'i ming ni sman zhes bya'o// chang ni bcud kyis len zhes bya'o// zas ni tshe zhes bya'o// sha dang chang du ldan pa'i bza' ba sna tshogs ni dga' ba'i longs spyod skal ba bzang po'i tshe'i dam pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no// a mra'i 
122a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu smin pa la sogs pa ni bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'o zhes bshad do// sgrol ba ni bde ba myang ba dang / bde bas rab tu rmongs pa yin no zhes bshad do// sbyor ba dang ting nge 'dzin ni rnam grangs te/ gang lha 
122a2(rgyud 'grel): mo thams cad dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i lha mo'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa zhes bshad do// a mra dang smin pa la sogs pa ming gi rnam grangs so// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba'i glu 
122a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / sil snyan dang / gar byed pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa zhes bya'o// rab tu zhi ba'i sil snyan dang glu dang gar zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi glu ste/ de ni shin tu rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya'o// dur khrod kyi glu 
122a4(rgyud 'grel): dang sal snyan dang gar byed pa ni dpal he ru ka'i yin te/ de ni rab tu sprul pa zhes bya'o// chags pa dang bcas pa'i glu dang / sal snyan dang / gar ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi ste/ de yang dpal rnam par sprul pa zhes bshad// 
122a5(rgyud 'grel): do// mi'i dbang po'i glu dang / sil snyan dang / gar ni rdo rje nyi ma dang 'brel pa ste/ de yang shin tu rnam par sprul pa zhes bya'o// rab tu dga' ba'i glu dang / sal snyan dang / gar ni rta mchog dang 'brel pa ste/ de ni rta mchog
122a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sprul pa zhes bya'o// bde zhes gang gsungs pa de rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de zhes bya ba la mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ kun tu sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po
122a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de ni ni mkha' thams cad du 'gro bas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyong ba'i mkha' 'gro ma zhes bshad do// sgyu ma'i gar gyi dbang phyug ni dpal he ru ka de ni/ a ral+li zhes mang 'dogs so// sangs rgyas
122a8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam grangs so// Tak+ki 'dod pa yin zhes bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/ dkyil 'khor la sbyor ba'i mtshan ston pa yin te/ de nyid ni bde mchog la sogs pa lha mo 
122b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyis na Tak+ki la sogs par brjod pa yin no// rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig gsum gyi rim pa zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o// gdug pa la sogs pa rim bzhin bstan pa'i phyir/ dza zhes 
122b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni/ bde mchog la sogs pa'i snying po ste/ 'di dag ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa yin par shes par bya'o// tiSh+Tha hUM zhes pa ni drongs shig pa'o// ga ga bA hi a pi tsa a pi tsad radar dwa 
122b3(rgyud 'grel): ru Ta ma Ta/ hu lu hu lu/ a ra ra aho// a la la ho zhes bya ba 'di dag dang / gzhan yang nyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don yang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nas rdza rnga'i bar gyis te/ man ngag dang 'ga' ba'i byar/ snying po 'di dag 
122b4(rgyud 'grel): la don bshad pa ni med do// 'o na ci zhig ces na/ rol mo'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i snying po nyid yin pas na don dang ldan pa ma yin no// gal te yang rtog pa gtso bor bya na ni sgrub thabs su byas pas thams cad kyi gnas skabs su 'gyur ro// 
122b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs pa yang yi ge hUM la sogs pa'i glu dang / bzlas pas mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bshad pas/ ji ltar rang gi dkyil 'khor du bdag po'i snying po de nyid dang / bde mchog la sogs pa ni phyag rgyas 'debs 
122b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa'i las byed pas na/ rgyas 'debs ma la sogs pa'i rnam grangs su brjod do// sangs rgyas la sogs pa yi ni kun tu bstan pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa rnams 'di skad bstan pa yin te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa ni kun
122b7(rgyud 'grel): tu bstan pa la sogs tshig ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin par bshad de/ rim bzhin du shin tu bstan pa la sogs pa'i rnam grangs so// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ming bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 
122b8(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i don dang rim bzhin no// oM zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas kun brjod ma la sogs pa bzhi po'i snying po'o// thams cad mkhyen pa dang bde bar mkhyen pa/ ga/ nyis kyi rgyu'i snying po/ 
123a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge oM dang / sarba bidi ni rnam grangs so// oM ru ru tiSh+Tha sad+d+hi lo tsa ne sarbA d+ha sA d+ha ni swahA/ zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag ldan pa'i bzhi po'i snying po yin no// de dag nyid kyi don bskrun pa'i 
123a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ 'khor ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'khor ba'i zhes pa ni/ 'khor ba'i dngos grub mkhyen pa ste/ oM ru ru 'khor bar bzhugs shig sad+d+hi lo tsa ne dngos grub mkhyen pas zag pa med pa'i mtshan
123a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid can gyi gdan la bzhugs te/ sems can gyi don thams cad 'di mchog tu mdzod cig ces pa ni/ don dam par mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o// nye bar zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba ste/ 
123a4(rgyud 'grel): don dam pa dang nye bar zhi ba ni/ don dam pa nye bar zhi ba ste/ don thams cad bsgrubs la don dam pas bzhugs shig/ swA hA sa nye bar zhi bas bzhugs shig ces bya bar sbyor ro// sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i rnam grangs
123a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni bdag po'i ngo bo nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das de nyid bstan pa yin no// rdo rje sems dpa' yang skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bstan te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// dpal he ru
123a6(rgyud 'grel): ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i phyir/ ko tak+Sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ mang bcu po 'di dag ni/ skye mched bcu'i sgo nas de nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ ming dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so// 
123a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mtshon cha ba ti dang zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje 'bar ba de nyid kyi ming ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni gnod sbyin ces kyang bya'o// dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje chen po thal bar rab tu 'jig pa zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje 'bar bas rab tu 'jigs 
123a8(rgyud 'grel): par byed par bstan pa'i phyir/ de nyid ni sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che zhes pa ste/ de'i 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'jigs pa chen po zhes bya'o// kha T+wAM ga'i ni rgyal mtshan chen po zhes bya'o// thod pa kham por ni pad+ma zhes bshad do// 
123b1(rgyud 'grel): khrag chen po sbrang rtsi chen po zhes brjod do// hU~M hUM hUM hUM zhes bya ba rnams ni rim bzhin du bsrungs shig pa dang myur cig pa'i don te/ dkar mo la sogs pa bzhi'i snying po'o// ma Ta ru Ta sma ra raT zhes bya ba 'di rnams ni 
123b2(rgyud 'grel): rol cig dgongs shig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i don te/ spos mo la sogs pa'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen po dbang phyug chen po'i dam pa ste/ de ni skal ba bzang po zhes bshad 
123b3(rgyud 'grel): do// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug dang / rta mchog ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir/ rgyal po spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi ming bstan pa 
123b4(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ rnam par lta ba la sogs pa lha mo bzhi'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// shud+d+ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ rnam par lta ba la sogs pa drug gi 
123b5(rgyud 'grel): snying po yin no// na mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gtogs po'i ming bstan pa yin te/ drug pa'i bdag po'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na/ na mkha'i snying po la sogs pa ni mang gi rnam grangs can ni 
123b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das nyid yin par shes par bya'o// dbang bskur ba yin snyam zhes bya ba'i gter gyi ni pa pa'o// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i yi ni ta ta'o// mchod pa chen po ni tra Ta tra Ta traT ces bya ba'i snying po'o// sangs rgyas byang chub pa
123b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar la yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying po de nyid yin no// la la dag ni lha me rdo rje'i gtso mo'i gang yin pa de dag nyid do// thams cad kyi yang bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni rang gi
123b8(rgyud 'grel): bdag po'i snying po de nyid yin no// zhes yongs su rtog go/ sna tshogs pad+mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi ming ston pa yin te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang sna tshogs pad+mo zhes pa ni ming gi rnam grangs so// 
124a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems chen po ni tshogs rdo rje zhes bya'o// thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ zhes bya ba ni le lo thams cad bsal bar dgongs pa'o// grogs po zhes bya ba ni grogs pa rnams kyis so// bzlas pa'i
124a2(rgyud 'grel): don la lhag mar mos pa rnams kyis kyang yi ge hUM la sogs pa bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur bas/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes pa bstan pa'i phyir/ rjes su chags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i 
124a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa ni yi ge hUM ste/ de ni 'di yin te rjes su chags par bya'o zhes pa ste/ byed kyi bdag nyid du mngon sum du byas so zhes pa'o// yi ge oM ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi bzlas par bya ba ste/ 'di'i don rjes su 
124a4(rgyud 'grel): chud par bya'o zhes pa ste/ khyed kyi bdag nyid kyi byang chub mngon sum du bya'o zhes pa'o// dpal he ru ka'i bzlas pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje ha ha bzhad pa'o// de'i rjes su sbyor bas bya'o// zhes pa ste khyed kyi bdag 
124a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di chen po dang gcig pur gyur par bskyed par bya'o// zhes pa'o// bad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi bzlas pa ni yi ge oM ste/ de'i don rjes su sbyor bar bya'o zhes pa ste/ khyed kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid mngon sum du 
124a6(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'o zhes pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma'i bzlas pa ni yi ge hi ste/ de'i don la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o zhes pa ste/ khyed kyi bla na med pa'i don gyi phun sum tshogs pa rab tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid kyis 'jug par bya'o zhes pa'o// rtam chog gi 
124a7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa ni yi ge hUM la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'o// de'i rjes su bstan par bya'o zhes pa ste/ khyod dang gnyis su med par gyur pas na lha dang 'dres par gyur pa'o// dngos grub la sogs pa grub pa dang ma grub pa la sogs pa shes 
124a8(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i don du rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba ni dang po yi ge hUM zhes rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsams la/ 
124b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol tu mchod pa la sogs pa bya ba byas te/ khye'u 'am bu mo la phyag rgya chen pos spyan drangs pa la sogs pa'i rim pa byas la rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab bo// de'i mig tu rdo rje hUM las byung ba rnam par bsams la/ 
124b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ gdod nas dag cing dri ma med ces bya ba'i bden pa gang yin pa des na/ phyin ci ma log par mthong bar gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyis bslabs sngon 
124b3(rgyud 'grel): du bya ba bstan to// de bzhin du rna ba yang thams cad ces bya ba ste/ bden pa gang gis chos rnams sgra brnyan lta bu yin pa'i bden pa des phyin ci ma log par thos par gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas la/ sgra rnams dang 
124b4(rgyud 'grel): por bsgo'o// de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa ni/ las la sogs pa la'o// de bzhin du dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la'o// de bzhin du 'jig rten
124b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor pa ni/ sna tshogs pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul gyis pad+ma de nyid la'o// de bzhin du rdo rje nyi ma'i rnal 'byor pa ni me tog la sogs pa la'o// de bzhin du rta mchog gi rnal 'byor pa ni reg pa dang ma reg pas rdo rje rgyal po
124b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa dang / shing la sogs pa la ste/ rdo rje la sogs pa la reg pa dang ma reg pa ni lag pa reg pa dang / ma reg pa yin par shes par bya'o// bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad du yang dang po'i sbyor ba yang thun
124b7(rgyud 'grel): mongs yin no// bsrang ba'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod la sogs pa'i thal ba la yi ge hUM/ gis rdo rje byas 
124b8(rgyud 'grel): la des thig ler byas pas bdag dang gzhan bsrung ngo // de bzhin du rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu la sogs pas gtor ma la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin no// mi yi thod pa'i nang du bskyed pa'i yungs kar la sogs pa yang de bzhin no// 
125a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin ma mchu sogs mnan nas g.yon du 'gying bas mdud la/ dril bu bzung la g.yas pas rdo rje bzung ste/ 'jig pas phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa bya'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa ste/ 
125a2(rgyud 'grel): de rnams sam gzhan dag gnyis su med par gyur pas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa rdzogs par bya'o// rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas ni lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rjes mtshams bcing bar bya'o// dpal zhe 
125a3(rgyud 'grel): ruka'i rnal 'byor pas ni de'i glu dang / gar gyi sbyor bas/ thams cad bsrungs na rims la sogs pa 'jig par 'gyur ro// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor pas/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la mos pas sna tshogs 
125a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma kha 'byed pas sgrib pa dang bral ba la sogs pa rdzogs par bya'o// rdo rje nyi ma'i rnal 'byor pas ni/ rang gi lus rdo rje 'bar bar bsgrubs pas bsrungs par bya'o// dpal rta mchog gi rnal 'byor pas ni rdo rje 'u tshur gnyis bcings la go 
125a5(rgyud 'grel): cha gyon pa nas thal mo brdab pa'i bar du rdzogs par byas pas bdag nyid bsrung ngo // gzhan ni bdag gi nang du bcug la go cha la sogs pas bsrung ngo // sbyor ba thams cad la yang rang gi snying po rnams brjod par bya'o// rims la sogs 
125a6(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa dang bral bar bya ba'i don du tshe'i rig byed ces pa bstan pa'i phyir/ chos sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mig phye la zhi ba'i ltabs 
125a7(rgyud 'grel): bltas la/ rims la sogs pas btab pa la spyi bo nas rkang pa la thugs pa la byabs shing / bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i mdog lta bus bsgrubs par bya'i lus la gang bar bsam mo// grang ba'i rims la ni sku mdog dmar po bsams te/ 
125a8(rgyud 'grel): des na thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ mthe'u chung lcags grub cing bas sbyor te/ mdzub me gnyis sbyar la rims la sogs pa nang du bsams la gtsir bar bya'o// de nyid bde blag gi sbyor bas 
125b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bsgyur te 'phral la bzhag na des sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro// mdzub mo phan tshun sngon phyogs pa zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo phan tshun sbyar te/ gzung la/ zug rngu 'byin par ltar byas na de phyin 
125b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sbyor ba nyid la sogs pas btsir ba'i tshul du byas na/ nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// grub pa'i spyan gyis byas pa ni long ba ji lta ba dang bcas par bcing ngo // 'dod chags la sogs 
125b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bgegs rnams ni zhi ba'i don du dpal rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya zhes pa nye bar bstan pa'i phyir/ rkang pa brkyang ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas rkang pa brkyang dang zhes bya ba la sogs 
125b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rab du sbyor ba byas te/ des kyang g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ zhes bya ba la rkang pa g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa gnyis kyis rim bzhin du skyes pa dang bud med kyi gzugs mnan par gyur na/ de ltar byas pas 
125b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la sogs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor bdag gi bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa dang ldan pa'o// de ltar bya ba thams cad byas shing bgegs rnams nye bar zhi ba'i 
125b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya legs par slob cing / rab tu dmigs pa'i don du dngos grub thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa bstan pa'i phyir/ khu tshur snying gar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs 
125b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa snying gar khu tshur gyi bdag nyid can gyi bud med kyi phyag rgya bcings na/ dngos po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar dgongs so// 
125b8(rgyud 'grel): bud med kyi sbyor ba ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyi'o// g.yon pa 'gying ba'i tshul du bya zhes bya ba ni g.yon pa 'gying ba'i tshul gyis dril bu 'dzin pa'o// lag g.yas rang gi snying gar ni zhes 
126a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni bud med kyi phyag rgya snying gar gtod pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa'o// bud med thams cad ces bya ba ni bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa'i gtso bo sngon du 'gro ba bud med kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni rdo rje 'gying ba la rab tu 
126a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas ni/ g.yon pa khu tshur gyis sna tshogs pad+ma 'dzin pa g.yas pa ldang ba'i tshul gyis dbang phyug thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// dpal he 
126a3(rgyud 'grel): ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas/ g.yon gyi dril bu 'khrol la/ g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba yongs su bskor bas/ sku ma thams cad 'byung bar bya'o// dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor pas/ lag pa g.yon pas sna
126a4(rgyud 'grel): gas pad+ma dang ste/ ga pa de bad+hag yon pa gag lag gams / ka sA+en pa'i la'i N+Di ng+ya shA / de'i ma khri ma sems dpa'i 'dzugs pa'i rdul su na / des mi dga' tha thams cad dasem par gyur ro// 
126a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nyi ma'i rnal 'byor pas ni g.yon gyis rang gi snying gar gtod pa'i tshul du yid bzhin gyis nor bu rin po che 'dzin la/ g.yas kyis ni bud med la sogs pa rin po che mchog 'dzin pas mchog sbyin pa ni bsam pa thams cad yongs su 
126a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rta mchog gi rnal 'byor pas ni/ g.yon gyis rang gi snying gar gtod pa'i tshul du sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin/ g.yas rdo rje 'gying bas dbang phyug dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// kun tu sna tshogs kyi dam tshigs gi rtog pa ste/ 
126a7(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o// // da ni phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bdun ji ltar bsgrubs pa bstan pa'i 'og tu/ kun tu sna tshogs skal pa bzang po dpal dam tshig gi rtog pa nye bar bstan pa'i phyir/ de nas kun tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsung 
126a8(rgyud 'grel): te/ kun tu sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bdun shes pa'o// 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o// kun tu sna tshogs sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ni bdag gi lhar sbyor ba'i bdag nyid bsgrub pa'o// 
126b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ sman ma mig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ smin ma mig la sogs pa gsungs pa'i rim gyis/ cha lugs ji lta ba bzhin du gar byed pa ste/ ji ltar mthun par gar byed
126b2(rgyud 'grel): pas so// phyag rgya thams cad ces bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o// yongs su dkrol zhes pa ni bcing ba'o// 'di skad ston par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyi lha'i bdag nyid ji lta ba la sogs pa'i smin ma dang / mig la sogs pas 
126b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa med na ni bdag nyid kyis ji lta ba bzhin du gar byed pa sngon du 'gro bas/ phyag rgya chen po thams cad bcing bar bya'o// zhes pa ste/ sngar bshad pa'i rgud kyi tshegs ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa'o// da ni 'jig
126b4(rgyud 'grel): rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'jig pa'i lan gyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir/ da pal g.yon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ g.yon pa 'gying ba dang bcas zhes bya ba ni/ g.yon pa 'gying
126b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pas dril bu 'dzin la/ lag pa g.yas pas ni pad+ma'i khu tshur bcangs nas dpral bar bzhag la khros pas gyen du lta ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/ dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad la sogs pa sgrub par byed do// kun tu sna
126b6(rgyud 'grel): sa bzhin pa ba gdapalanarnas su pal sas+ho/ tsu la phel ba'o// / sangs sa thams da sa rgya ma gas pan/ di bstan pa yin do// 
126b7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan mang ldan mkhas pa'i spyod yul ba/ don rgyas don ldan tshegs ni shin tu 'brel sbas pa'i/ 'dir ni bdag gsi lo 'dab rtse tsam blangs nas rnam phye yi/ mchog tu mkhas pa'i rjes 'brang dam pa rnams ni tshad ma yin// 
126b8(rgyud 'grel): dka' 'grel 'di ni sbyar ba yi// bdag gi dge ba gang yin des/ rab zhi ba shes gnyen bcas pa yi// 'jig rten rdo rje 'dzin par shog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dka' 'grel/ slob dpon rab tu zhi ba'i
127a1(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po/ a tsAr+ya shrad+d+ha ka ra baR+Ya dang / d+harmA shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab 
127a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// // @#// rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang don rnam par dgod pa bzhugs// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra satwa guh+yAR+YA d+ha ro b+hA ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/ 
127a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas thams
127a4(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'agro sgyu ma bde mchog las// sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang // bde ba thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir// ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i// gtam dag rab tu
127a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya// yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la// grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ sangs rgyas bstan pa rnam 'phrul pas// rang bzhin gzhi las 'khrul 
127a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // dam chos spyod pa 'khrul pa dag/ rgyus rkyen la 'bras gdul don du// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dbugs dbyung rnam pa drug gi tshul// de las mtha' yas rnam 'phrul pas// sna tshogs dkyil
127a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lha rnams dang // sna tshogs rgyud don gsungs pa dang // sna tshogs las kyi 'dul mdzad pas// de bas 'di ni rgyud kun gyi// rtsa ba'i don du shes par bya// gang zhig sngon 'gro phun sum tshogs// shes bya dngos gnas lta
127a8(rgyud 'grel): gzhi shes// gnas mchog phun tshogs bzhi ldan pas// dkyil 'khor dbang dang dam tshig dang // ting 'dzin phrin las spyod pa'i don// tshogs kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs// bdag gzhan don gyi dbye ba yis// rim pa gnyis su 
127b1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// lam gnyis nyams su blangs byas pas// 'bras bu mdzad dang bcas par snang // de dag rnal 'byor don snang ba'i// rnal 'byor tshig gi rnam par grol// mu stegs sngogs sbas gsang ba'i brda// sgra tshad 
127b2(rgyud 'grel): rtog shes shes pa min// bzhin bzang rang bzhin zhi ba'i chos// skye bo kun dga' mkha' 'dra'i blo// dri med ras dkar legs gnas la// sngon po'i tshen zhen 'gyur ba med// la lar rgyal rigs bram ze dang // rigs na mtshon tshwa'i 
127b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo can// drang srong slob skyong dpon po ltar// byang chub sems ldan don spyod pa// ma ltar byams shing pa ltar slob// bran dang rgyal po lta bu'i tshul// khyim bdag rig byed dmang gdon dang // blon po las mkhan bzhin 
127b4(rgyud 'grel): duganas// bya ba rnam pa bcu bzhi yis// bdag dang gzhan gyi don spyod pa// yid bzhin nor bu'i sgom 'byed cing // 'od kyi snang ba gsum la spyod// theg chen gsang don gnas mthong nas// gzhung bzhin khang par zhugs pa 
127b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // gnas gsum dgra cing cal rdzogs pa'i// smin byed byi nang gsang mthar phyin// rang gnas 'da' ba med pa'i chos// thun mong khyad par rim pa bzhin// mnyams rgyud la gnas bya ste// bskad sa'i las la brtson ldan/ 
127b6(rgyud 'grel): pas// bdag gzhan don gyi bya ba rnams// gzhung gzhin bsgrub par bstan pa yin// srog chags bsad par mi bya zhing // dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang // byang chub sems kyang mi gtang ste// slob dpon skal bzar 
127b7(rgyud 'grel): yong mi spang // kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang por// bdag rang sgrub pas skal ba bzang // rang gi ngo bo yongs spangs pa'i// dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas
127b8(rgyud 'grel): yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// cis kyang mi 'jigs dgar bar spyad// dkyil 'khor kun tu ma zhugs shing // dmatshig rnams ni spangs pa dang // gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// sgrub paci 
128a1(rgyud 'grel): yang mi grub po// bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pas// dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan// srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na// skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// chos kun rang bzhin gnas 
128a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul// rtog thabs yon tan skyon dag dang // log rtog snying rje'i gnas bstan pa'i// dngos po de nyid don bstan mdzod// 'di ni rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// sangs rgyas thams 
128a3(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'agro sgyu mo bde ba'i mchog/ bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ nA ma dag ni thams cad las// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang // rang bzhin 
128a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni de 'grub po// rA ni na mkha 'gro ma zhes// khams las mngon du brtags pa ste// na mkha' kun du spyod 'grub pas// mkha' gro ma zhes rab tu grags// chags min chags dang bral ba min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs/ 
128a5(rgyud 'grel): so// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yis// thams cad ma lus bde mchog gi/ sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba// mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog/ de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni 'gro ba yin// dus gsum srid 
128a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang // rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'o// gnas pa thams cad de nyid do// 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun// thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mtha' yas 
128a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ chos nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// dngos po thams cad de yin no// sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byad dang // yon tan ma 'gags rtsal rdzogs shing // dkyil 'khor la sogs 
128a8(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par ldan// gsung thugs phrin las gsal bar ldan// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// mkha' gro sgyu ma bde mchog go/ 
128b1(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i// mgon rnams bde chen gnas bzhugs te// gsal ba stobs dang mi 'jig thogs// bdag gzhan gnyis med sna tshogs snang // thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// na mkha' 
128b2(rgyud 'grel): la yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa'i// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur// dmigs su yod pa ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi 
128b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul// yod pa ma yin med pa min// dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o// thabs kyi sgo nas bde ba che// thig le phra mo las 'das shing // rlung gi 
128b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas la'ang gnas mi mdzad// gsang ba sngags kyi dmigs bral ba'o// shes rab las la brten pa'i mthus// 'khor lo 'byung sems 'bebs dang gzung // rang gi gnas sam gzhan du spro// rtsa sogs dman pa de byin 
128b5(rgyud 'grel): las 'das// gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i ngang // snang ba nyid na stong pa ste// stong pa nyid na snang ba yin// dbang po drug gi yul la rol// chos rnams mngon sum bde chen po// gzugs sogs rab 'bring tha ma med// 
128b6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba de stong pa'i rgyas btab pas// dmigs pa kun las rnam par grol// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// bde bas bde ba kun thob po// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor mtshan mas g.yengs med pa// 
128b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di la khrus dang bsdam mi dgos// dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang // bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub// de bas ji ltar 'dod spyod cing // kun za de bzhin thams cad spyod// spyod pa ci dgar spyod par byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci
128b8(rgyud 'grel): dgar byed// gang la ci dgang spyod kyang rung // gnyis med bde chen grogs su 'gyur// dkyil 'khor kun tu ma zhugs shing // sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang // rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na// bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 
129a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar mi thob pa// sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// bsgrubs na kun tu thob par 'gyur// bdag nyid sgrub par byed pa'i mchog/ de ni bdag gis 
129a2(rgyud 'grel): brtag par bya// rang gi rang bzhin ma rtogs shing // gzhan du 'khrul pa'i 'gro ba dag/ yul drug rang rgyud brtags pa yis// sna tshogs gnyis kyi chos su snang // mi mthun bde sdug gnas la spyod// chos brgyad 
129a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mas g.yengs gyur zhing // nyon mongs yan lag dang bcas pas// 'gro drug gnas rnams so sor snang // sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyis gdungs// las kyi 'brel pa'i dngos lo chags// kye ma 'di 
129a4(rgyud 'grel): dag snyi re rje// bde chen gnas las 'di ltar gyur// sdug bsngal 'di gzhan g.yas 'gyur// nam zhig rang gi de nyid mthong // nam zhig rang 'byung ye shes 'char// nam zhig bde ba chen pos rgyas// kye ma'o log/ 
129a5(rgyud 'grel): par rtogs pa yi// kha cig lam ngan log zhugs pa'i// rgyu las 'khrul las lam las 'phrul// 'bras bu'i dngos las 'phrul gyur pa// 'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal te// khyi dang ba lang dbyu gu gsum// me lnga sogs kyis 
129a6(rgyud 'grel): lus gdungs te// tshe zad ngan song gsum du 'gro// rigs ngan dman pa'i lam zhugs pas// bde 'dod de nyid lam las gol// sdug bsngal kun 'byung spong shes 'dod// phyir zhing sdug bsngal kun 'byung gnas// 'gog lam
129a7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par sgom byed kyang // 'phags pa'i lam la rgyab kyis phyogs// kye ma'o yang dag bden las gzhan// 'khrul pa'i bden pa bzhi ru brtag/ rkyen rtogs dgra bcoms 'dod pas// rten 'brel la brjod de nyid spong / 
129a8(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal gyis// rang bzhin rmongs las bde spyod pa// de nyid mtshan mas 'khrul 'gyur te// thams cad ma rig las byung na// de nyid rgyud gzhan gang las byung // thams cad rang byung ye shes yin// 
129b1(rgyud 'grel): kye ma 'odagra bcoms 'dod pas// rgyun zhugs lan cig 'ong ba dang // mi ldog spyod sogs dka' ba yis// dgra bcom la zhugs grol mi 'gyur// yang dag bden pa'i don med par// kun tu brtags pas gnyis 'dzin pa// 
129b2(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa mang por dka' spyad kyang // yang dag sangs rgyas thob mi 'gyur// kye ma nges don ma rnyed pas// lam gzhan g.yengs pas tshig chad de// gyad kyi nor bzhin kun tu 'tshol// sku gsum 'bras bu skye mi 'gyur// 
129b3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // bar chad med cing nyams dga' ba'i// dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam// rang gi skyed mos tshal sogs par// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang poraro// kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis// 
129b4(rgyud 'grel): kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa rnams// der ni dkyil 'khor legs pa la// dri sna lnga yis byugs byas nas// shes rab ldan pas srad bu gdab// chad bye lha yis gdan sogs dgod// lugs ma'am ras bris sogs bkram nas// 
129b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa sna tshogs sbyor bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pas sras// dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa brel pa dang // rdo rje tshig dang mchod la sogs// glu dang sil 
129b6(rgyud 'grel): spyan rnam par 'phrul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me dri la sogs ldan par// der ni dang por ba dan bshams te// 'jam zhing reg na bder 'gyur ba'i// sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs// de ni thams cad dag
129b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdan// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dang // bza' btung myang dang ldan pa yi// 'tshe ba'i zas dang rkyen bzlog sman// dam rdzas mi 'chi gsang ba lnga// lcags kyu lnga po grogs dang bcas// gsang ldan dpa' bos spyad
129b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rig bzang gzugs sogs mtshan ldan pa'i// de tsigs ba'i gnas thub pa// rtog med theg chen la dga' zhing // gtso bo mnyes pa'i las la mkhas// khrus byas bris byugs rgyan dang bcas// dbang bskur 
130a1(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs spro ba bskyed// rdzas rnams 'tshogs pa sbyang bya zhing // byin brlabs bsdus nas gnas su dgod// cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i 
130a2(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa las// dkyil 'khor lo sogs rab tu bsgrub// kye ma'i rang gis bslang byas pa// rmongs rnams 'khrul zhing gdungs pa la// tshad med khyab pas bkab byas nas// mur du sgrol bar dam bca'o// 
130a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag kyang goms par ma gyur te// 'dod kyang nus med yod ci phan// de phyir dang po bskul byas te// grub pas gzhan don rgya cher bsam// spros bral de bzhin nyid dbyings las// 'gro la khyab pa'i thugs rje 'byung //

135a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// a badz+ra loka/ bar med mar mo rdo rjes mtshan// gsal 'dzin rlung gi batshams su gnas// a badz+ra gan+d+he// dri cha ba ljang gu rdo rdzas mtshan// gang 'thor dbang ldan mtshams su gnas// oM badz+ra aM ku shAdzaH 
135a5(rgyud 'grel): gdong dkar mo lcags kyu dang // thod pa rta mgo ljang gu shar// oM badz+ra pA she hUM/ phag gdong sngon mo g.yas mche ba// g.yon zhabs lho yi sgo la gnas// oM badz+ra shri kha le be// snang ba mo dmar phyag gnyis kyis// nyi zla lcags 
135a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrog nub kyi phyogs// oM badz+ra g+haN+De/ thal byed ljang dgu g.yas dril bu// g.yon pas ban+d+ha ku bcas byang // yang na lha mo thams cad kyang // zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// brla yis dbus ni dmar la dkar/ phyag 
135a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog le ma sngon mo 'dra// dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan// lha rdzas kha zas sna tshogs mchog/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+ma sna tshogs la gnas pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma la se gos mchog
135a8(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// mu tig me tog la sogs mchog/ mdzes pa'i rgyan cha sna tshogs 'chang // mgon po ro mnyam gnas bzhugs nas// chos dbyings ye shes snyoms 'jug las// lha mo bdag po'i 
135b1(rgyud 'grel): bskul mdzad de// sems can don kun rnam 'phrul mdzad// rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad+mo rnams// dag pa'i mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas pa// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor
135b2(rgyud 'grel): bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod// e ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba'i shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon med rtag la rol cig rol cig ho// 
135b3(rgyud 'grel): glo bur 'khrul pas 'khor ba yi// 'gro ba kun la dgongs nas bzhengs// dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams gsal bya'i phyir// dbang bskur byin bris brlabs par mdzad// gzugs bud chos dbyangs ye shes che// 
135b4(rgyud 'grel): mgo la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// rnam gsum gzugs dang ro la mdzad de// brten g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul// tsur bkun tegs ye shes che// rnab rdo rje nyi ma yin// rnam gsum sgra dang rol mdzad de// 
135b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul// 'du shes mnyam nyid ye shes che// lce la pad+ma dbang phyug rgyal// rnam gsum ro dang rol mdzad de// brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul// 'du byed bya ba grub pa'i gnas// 
135b6(rgyud 'grel): sna la rta mchog rol pa ste// rnam gsum dri dang rol mdzad cing // brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul// rnam shes me long ye shes che// yid la rdo rje he ru ka/ rnam gsum chos dang rol mdzad de// brtan g.yo'i
135b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos po rnam par 'phrul// kun khyab stong pa'i ye shes che// lus la rdo rje sems dpa' gnas// rnam gsum reg dang rol mdzad de// gartan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul// rnam gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs
135b8(rgyud 'grel): zhing // thugs gang ye shes sems dpa' gnas// rang rigi dkyil 'khong spyan drangs nas// dbang bskar rigs kyi ma tshanamapas ma// de ltar ga ca dang sprul gas pa// dbang bskur byin parlabs rdzogs 
136a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// phyag rgya bzhi la gnas spro zhing // phyag rgya'i sku rnams gsal bar mdzad// sbyor ba bzhi yi bye brag gis// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas nas ni// rjes su 'gro ba'i las dag gis/ 
136a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba yin// ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa// sbyor ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// yum ldan byin brlabs rol pas mchod// gzhug pa rjes su sbyor ba'o// dag mdzad dkyil 'khor 
136a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs mdzad nas// 'phro 'du shin tu sbyor ba yin// byin brlabs dbang bskor las rdzogs pa// sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o// thugs ka'i 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor sprul mdzad cing // 
136a4(rgyud 'grel): dza hUM baM hoH'i sbyor tshogs dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ba cing // stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus// na mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol/ 
136a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ dzaHhUM b+h+rUM hoHe h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru Ni kA kr-i sh+ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bde gshegs po brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang du 
136a6(rgyud 'grel): dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol// k+Sha ya bA k+tsi t+ta hUM/ sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes// e la la ho// tshangs pa'i mchog 
136a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams zin gyis gnon mdzad cing // rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad// a la la ho// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnams mtha' yas// snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings la rol// a la la ho// 
136a8(rgyud 'grel): kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyis dkyil 'khor rnams dgod rang las byung // a la la ho// mdzad pa rgya chen 'gogs med kun bsgrubs pas// tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs nas/ 
136b1(rgyud 'grel): a la la ho// sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan phrin las rgyar// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya/ 
136b2(rgyud 'grel): sri zhur byas shing bteg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam g.yon thal mo sbyar bar bya// oM AHhUM// a ti b+hu ho// ban+d+ha nAM kA ro ya mi/ gu ru pa 
136b3(rgyud 'grel): ti// a la la ho// oM 'byung ba chen po thams cad 'byung // stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// lha mo'i tshogs rnams ma lu sa spro// me tog bdug pa mer me ma// dri tshogs 
136b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi mchod par bya// oM pa na be na/ de nu su ra ta/ ti bu par ma/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa ma yo ga~M sid+d+hi hUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ oM badz+re d+hU be/ oM badz+ra A lo ke/ badz+ra gan+d+he/ pra tIts+tsha ha~M/ shrI b+ha ga ban kha kha khA hi/ skad dkyigasang ni 
136b5(rgyud 'grel): mthon dman dang / gre 'gyur bcas shing bzlas pa yis// dus gsum rang bzhin mchog rnams kyis// hUM la sogs pa'i glu blang zhing // tshig rnams kun gyis ci 'dod par// ji ltar spros pa'i glu kun gyis// 
136b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi glu yis phyag rgya dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub pa'o// gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // de bzhin du ni rgyud mang sogs// gyen du 'thor dang thur du thugs// g.yas pa mi 'degs so so'i rgya// sbyor ba
136b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum ldan pas// rang gi gnas la sbyar bar bya// dzaHhUM baM ho// bde ba kun la zhen pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku/ 
136b8(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing // sems dpa'i skyil krung snyems bcas nas// dpung 'joms dngos grub thams cad 'grub// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa AHdzaHhUM baM ho/ 
137a1(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta ste/ zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// pad ga nas bcas pa'i gar bcas 'khyud// mda' 'dzin sangs rgyas pad+mo sogs// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gos can// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig 
137a2(rgyud 'grel): chags// bde ba 'bar ba'i gar byed pas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// se ral kha yi tshul bzhin du// rdo rje kha thA ga bzung ste// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni// gtsug lag rje 
137a3(rgyud 'grel): lha'i rjes mthun par// dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis// mda' bzhi yongs su 'bang ba ni// bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// rkang pa btig cing 'phang ba dang // gzhi bos te 'phang ba'i stabs dag gis/ 
137a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bstod pa ni// khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // dbrog pa dag gis khyad par du// sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing // khams gsum dag ni bsdu 
137a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// lcug ma gang yang rung gzung nas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// bud med thams cad rtsen nas ni// dpag bas ma shing dag yongs su 'grub// gling bu len pa'i tshul ston no// pi bi len pa 
137a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul ston dang // cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor dang // rdza ji tshul ston rnal 'byor pa'o// myang ba btung ltar byed pa dang // sna yi myang ba rngub pa dang // mig bcu ma zhen par lta ba dang // thams cad bdag gis 
137a7(rgyud 'grel): byang ba'o// rang 'byung lha mo dang bcas pa'i// phyag rgya sngags kyis gnyis med 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod bdag cag sgrub la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// kye de bzhin gshegs 
137a8(rgyud 'grel): pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha'agro sgyu ma'i tshogs rnams bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog grub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// a la la co// de bzhin gshegs 
137b1(rgyud 'grel): mags ma mas cas bya mas sa bas sams sa sa ma sa sa sa ya mas pa nga masas sa sa mal ma pa la mam mtha' sa ma ma mamam mam ma bya bya ba mas bya kyang yas sas sa ma na sa ga ba 
137b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dzaHhUM baM ho/ kye ma bde mchog bde bas zung la rnam par sprul// hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol// a la la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs 
137b3(rgyud 'grel): pa kun gyi mkha'agro sku mas slob ma gzung du gsol// mdzub mos mtheb mos mnan nas ni// rang gi ma theb mos mdzub mo mnan// dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste// mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur bya// 
137b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// khong stong du ni sbyar nas su// sngags bcas gnas su bzhag bya ste// rim bzhin mtha' nas dgrol bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin 
137b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod// oM AHhUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzad/ 
137b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol du gsol// rab tu dga' ba rjes su chags pa'i mda' ga'u rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pa'i// rab tu dga' ba'i sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa'i bde bas thams cad bdag la grub/ 
137b7(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang // rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug che mchog grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i 
137b8(rgyud 'grel): mchog rol cig ho// bde bas bde ba slong rnam par rol hUM snang bar mdzod// e la la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha'agro sgyu ma sna tshogs kun gyis slob ma gzung du gsol// kye bde ba'i 
137b9(rgyud 'grel): mchog grub par mdzod// kye ma'o bde ba gsol// dam pa rab tu zhugs par mdzod// bdag la rab tu bde bar 'gyur// a la la la la ho// kye ma'o shi shi zhugs shig/ mkha 'gro ba de mchog kun tu 
138a1(rgyud 'grel): bskor cing kun tu zhugs// la lar rab tu drag cing skye bo drag la drag pa'i bud med sku ltar snang // 'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul phyi ril lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku// la lar rab tu res 
138a2(rgyud 'grel): shing zhi bar mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzad// la lar rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa pad+mo'i dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod// thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter mchog bdag 
138a3(rgyud 'grel): la grub par mdzad du gsol// kun mchog rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la stsol// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam par 'gyur// bde ba myang bar rab sbyor ba/ 
138a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par lta zhing gar byed pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos gnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// sna tshogs ban+d+ha brtag pa
138a5(rgyud 'grel): las// sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par dag/ lnga lnga lnga yi 'phro 'du yis// mtshan ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i gzugs ston bdud rtsir 'grub// rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag 
138a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i don ldan rol bar mdzad// byin brlabs mtshan dang rgyan ldan pa'i// mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog/ byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba chen por rnam par rol// grub pa'i rdzas 'di
138a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la// hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub
138a8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni na mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas 
138b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ 
138b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don bsgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid brtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa snyed gyur kyang // 
138b3(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo bgag par yod mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go/ 
138b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pas// dam tshig pa chog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// dzaHd+hU ba/ 
138b5(rgyud 'grel): ru Ta maT/ sma ra raT/ hu lu hu lu/ pra sad+d+hi/ Ta k+ki hUM dz+ra/ ka ni ku ni/ hUM hU~M/ Tak+ki ni hAM dzaHhu lu hu lu/ a la la la la ho/ shud+d+ha sid+d+hi/ dar+ra ya/ sarba ta g+he g+he/ ta g+he g+he/ Ta Ta/ g+he g+he g+he/ ta g+he ta g+he/ g+he g+he 
138b6(rgyud 'grel): ta ta/ tag+ne ta g+he/ ho doN+Dok+ki hUM dza/ g+he ta g+he dor+b+ha k+ki hUM dzaM/ tra a la la la la hau// ru Ta ma TaM/ thal mo brdabs pa brtag pa'o// tag+ne g+he/ te g+nen tig+ne na g+he ta/ g+hen g+hen/ rgyun gyi dza'o// bdag cag dam tshig 'di 
138b7(rgyud 'grel): la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// bcad gtubs lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib pas phog sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i// sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas smon lam 'tsho ba dang // gzi ma dang sa lus la 'jug
138b8(rgyud 'grel): pa bye ba stong phrag gi/ 'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khams kun snang ba dang // lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rje rab brtan te// ri smon thams cad dus 'dir 'grub par mdzad du gsol// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la 
139a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs nas// thun mongs 'das dang dang po brtsam// sems dpa' rnam pa gsum ldan par// rang rang sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// nyid kyil thabs dang shes rab kyi// phreng ba 
139a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang ldan pa las// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mas brgyan// gtso bos ji ltar bzlas pa bzhin// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas// gnas dang 'khor dang 'phro ba yis// mthun pa'i lha 
139a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mnyes mdzad cing // rigs bsdus 'gro ba'i las la sbyar// gtso bo'i zhal nas sbyor sngags ni// rang gi gsang sngags bcu bzhi pa'o// de bzhin lhams sa yi// sngags dang 'phro 'dulas ldan 
139a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rdzogs nas mchod bstod bsgral ba dang // gsol gad ba 'gro ba'i las la sbyar// gnyis pa sa so las bya ba// gtso sogs rim pa bzhin du ni// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan byas te// 'od kyi rig 
139a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas shing // gsal ba rnam pa gnyis ldan par// rang gi gsang sngags brjod par bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa AH/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'i gsang sngags yi ge bco brgyad pa'o// 
139a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha mo ma lus pa'i// bzlas rdzogs mchod bstod bskul bya zhing // rang gi las la sbyar nas kyang // so so'i gnas su bsdu bar bya// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog/ don dam bde ba chen po 
139a7(rgyud 'grel): sgra// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi// lha nyid brtson pas bskum par bya// sna na thig le za mol// phyi yi dkyil 'khor ba sti byA ste// yi ge mtshan ma phra mo'i bar// mtshan ma lda gsul bar du gnas/ 
139a8(rgyud 'grel): yig gsogs da lag mthara'// ngan spangs nas 'jug par bya'o// mi ga tu mags lnga las mtha'// zang ba gnyis pa yang dgazo// dbus gnas par ni sa yig zang // ba'i dkyil 'tshangs pa 
139b1(rgyud 'grel): TA sa dang lda pang // cagan sa yin to// ma yig 'i ltung bzla ba par bya// dbus sun rdza ba gnas// dad bras rtag bsgrum pa ni// 'dud chags can pa da pa na// 'dir 
139b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ri mang grags pa yid// yang gA'agling bang du 'byung ste// bad+ma li bus sa gzhug byas nas// ling ga rdo rdzir byin pa rlabs te// rdo rjesems dpa' bdag sun 
139b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// b+hag pa yang ga bdug das ni// der ni n+d+ra yig bsgrub par bya// shin tu dga' 'dzi gzugs dgan// sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// kun kyang khyab cing dri med pas// byang chub sems dag ba rtan 
139b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mtshan ma rnam pa lnga yi bar// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rnab par bsgom// rten dang brtan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// rnam dag de nyid gsal bar brtag/ dge bcu dag la brten bcas shing / 
139b5(rgyud 'grel): bden pa ni dngos pa gcig tu gnas// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis tshogs// rgyu 'bras sna tshogs dag pa'i dbyings// yon tan chags rnams kun rgyas shing // tshangs pa'i gnas pazhi byab mdzad nas/ 
139b6(rgyud 'grel): chos tshogs sum cucu bdun las// ting 'dzin bzhi por 'jug par mdzad// rang bzhini ye shes drug dag las// rigs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs sdung // rnamathar brgyad po brten bcas shing // rdo rje theg pa'i/ 
139b7(rgyud 'grel): tshul nyid mdzes// mdzad pa rgya chen min las rnams// yul drug dag gi phyug rgya che// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// thugs rje chen po'i char khab dang // bdud bzhi las rgyal thag chen mchog/ 
139b8(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par sbyor bas tshul 'jug cing // rtog pa'i sgrib pa sel bar mdzad// smon lam las grub mdzad 'phro las// theg chen yon tan ci yang 'byung // mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs pa'i sku/ 
140a1(rgyud 'grel): ga sa sa phru ba sa ra grangs ga gras nga bar nga nga bra sa nga dang sa bar kyang gra pa nga ba nga nga grang du sa sa ma byang su sa sa 'gra du pra grang nga 
140a2(rgyud 'grel): brten pa'i theg pa sna tshogs sgrogs// dbang phyug la sogs yon tan brgya// phrin las bzhi yis rnam phyi zhing // rten gnas rgyu dang spyod mdzad pa'i// gnas kyi mtshan ma 'grub pa yin// chags med 
140a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pas spyod kun dang // nyon mongs mtshan mas gos pa med// bde chen dbyings las ma 'phros shing // sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa can// yon tan 'byung gnas 'chi med sngas// gang ba phyogs bzhir/ 
140a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas dgod pa// shes lnga'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod tshogs// nyi shu bdun gyi rgyan gyis spras// phrin las mchod pa'i gnas gyur pa'i// 'khor lo rang rtags mtshan mas mdzes// phyi yis mtshan ma tshogs
140a5(rgyud 'grel): dag gis// thams cad yon tan snang bas spras// sku gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis// sna tshogs phrin las dpag med tshogs// ye shes 'bar ba'i byin rlabs kyis// log rtogs mtshan ma bsreg par mdzad// 
140a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid theg sogs gzhan dag las// khyad par 'phags pa theg pa'i mchog/ khams gsum gzhan rtog sbyong mdzad cing // lus sogs rnam par dag pa'i phyir// yon tan rgyan gyi rten dag las/ 
140a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas brgyad po sgra snang mdzad// dregs byed 'dul phyir rigs mtshan mnan// bsnod bcud sgrol mdzad shes rab mtshon// srid gnas las byung rtog pa'i tshogs// gnyis med rang gi ngo bor mos// 
140a8(rgyud 'grel): dbyings dang ye shes mnyam pa'i lha// snang srid gnyis med bsgom pa'i lha// thugs rje che la sprul pa'i char// tha ba las byung smin par mdzad// rang byung ye shes chen po las// tshogs brgyad snang ba sna 
140a9(rgyud 'grel): tshogs nyid// thugs rje'i sprul pa dpag med kyis// gang gsum khams las 'gro bar byed// 'byung ba'i sdang ba tha dad rnams// thams cad rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro// 'dor ba'i rtog pas mgos 
140b1(rgyud 'grel): shing // byang chub thugs rje chags pa'i rtags// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku// zla 'drad mar ba'i mdangs dang ldan// chos dbyings stong pa'i ye shes las// rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhir snang zhing / 
140b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las tshad med rnam spyod pas// 'brel ba'i don bzhin spyod par mdzad// khams gsum rgyal ba'i rgyan bcas pas// cha lugs sbyong zhing 'gying bar mdzad// ye shes lnga ldan zab mo dang // rgya chen rigs/ 
140b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i sku snang mdzad// rang gi thugs bskul dran tshogs kyis// las la rnam par rol mdzad do// sna tshogs kun grub sku gsung thugs// khams gsum las rgyal gsung sgrogs shing // chags phyir zhig nas 
140b4(rgyud 'grel): lhag mthong gi/ mtshan nyid 'brel pa ston par mdzad// mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad brgyad nus rnam spras pas// thun mong las grub zil gnon pa'i// dbyings dang ye shes 'brel ba'i rgyan/ 
140b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems sogs bla gab la// thugs rje'i rim pas legs spras shing // mdzad pa'i las mang sna tshogs pas// 'gro ba'i rnam tog spyod par ston// g.yas su bsdu ba bzhi dag dang // g.yon du tshad 
140b6(rgyud 'grel): med bzhi snang mdzad// spyi bor pha rol phyin drug dang // gzungs dang ting 'dzin rtag sna tshogs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun 'dus pas// yon tan rgyan gyi rin chen la// rnam pa lnga yi tshul zhugs shing // 
140b7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rgyan gyis spras po yi// rigs kyi mtshan ma mi nub phyir// gzugs mthun pa yi do ker can// yon tan sna tshogs brgyan bcas pas// de nyid kun gyis gzugs su ston// dge bcu yan lag rnam spras 
140b8(rgyud 'grel): shing // zhabs la rnam thar brgyad kyis brgyan// bden bzhi'i gdubus mdzes byas pas// rnam thar bzhi yi rang bzhin can// dge dang pha rol phyin bcu yi// rkeng chings phreng ba nyi rim mdzes// chos bzang 
141a1(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa bdun gyis// tshangs skud bzhin du brgyan bcas shing // ma 'dres chos bzang bco brgyad pos// rim gnyis phreng bar ldan pa yin// phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ldan zhing // 'gro la de don ston 
141a2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// phung po lnga rnams rnam dag pas// rigs lnga'i rgyan gyis mdzes par byas// 'byung ba che rnams rnam dag phyir// lha mo bzhi dang kun tu 'brel// skye mched bcu gnyis rnam dag pas// nang gi lha 
141a3(rgyud 'grel): mo'i tshogs su byung // khams sogs spyod pa rnam dag ning // thugs rje'i phrin las rgya chen pos// lha mo'i tshigs rnams dgod byas nas// nyon mongs nyi shu dag par mdzad// ye shes snang ba bsam 
141a4(rgyud 'grel): yas pas// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor cir yang snang // bar chud bgegs bzhi bsrungs pa dang // dngos grub lhag par gnas pa'i phyir// brtson pas thun mtshams rnam pa bzhir// gtor mi'i las dag 
141a5(rgyud 'grel): brtsam par bya// sgrib pa thams cad sbyong byed cing // tshogs kyi las rnams rdzogs byed pa// de nyid spyod dang mthun pa'i las// des ni mdzad pa rgya chen 'gyur// phyi rol dkyil 'khor zla gam la/ 
141a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'i mtshon gyis kha bsgyur te// mkha'agro'i dkyil 'khor rnam lnga yi// theg le dbus dang phyogs bzhi ru// dbus sra rta yi rgyal po la// lha chen lha yi mtshan mas bskor// shar du phyogs 
141a7(rgyud 'grel): skyong la// lho ru sngon spyod ma mo'i tshogs// nub tu dbang lha klu chen brgyad// byang du rgyas pa'i 'gro ba rnams// rang gi gsang sngags kyis bskyed cing // skur gyur ye shes 'od tshogs spyad // sgeg 
141a8(rgyud 'grel): mo dang nin chung dang // myos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang // gcig pud dpa' dang 'dod chags sra// g.yon can bran mo de bzhin te// lan cha la sogs ro kun dang // kar la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin 
141b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kun gyi ro grub pa// sha dang chang dang ldan pa yi// bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni// dga' ba'i longs spyod sal mchod ste// tshe yi dam pa rab tu grub// a mra smin dang rgun 'brum dang // pan se dang 
141b2(rgyud 'grel): na le kar// a ru ra la sogs pa yi// 'bras bu'i phyag rgya mchog rnams dang // kha ra sbrang rtsi byug pa yis// a mra la sogs tshig gus byug/ ha sa ka ri'i mar la sogs// mnyam pa'i dri zhes bskur 
141b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// yung dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i// mtshon gyis mthun par 'a bskur nas// shun pa dro ba la sogs byas// mchod pa'i tshen dbul bar bya// thod pa'i nang du sbyar byas pa'i// gza' 
141b4(rgyud 'grel): btung bca' ba la sogs rnams// haho hrIHyis sreg sbyang brlab// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor la bsngo bar bya// gtor ma rdzas chen ma lus pa// dang po dri yi chu sbyangs shing // sna tshogs sgra sman ba dan 
141b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs// bkod pa'i mchod gtor brlabs la spel// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems pa nyid// rta mchog gzugs su sprul byas nas// mdzes pa'i phyag rgya sngags ldan pas// mkha'agro'i tshogs rnams 
141b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdu bar bya// oM badz+ra DA ki ni b+h+yo// e a ra li dza dza// 'khor bcas bsdu bar 'ongs pa dang // dam tshig phyag rgya rnamagasum bstan// oM badz+ra ku h+ya dri sh+ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM// oM badz+ra gu h+ya dri sh+ya ho// sa ma ya 
141b7(rgyud 'grel): s+t+waM// oM badz+ra ku h+ya dri sh+ya ho// sa ma ya phaT/ oM au daM du puSh+pa d+hu pa gan+d+he/ pu dzas pa ra Na ar+g+haM ba li kha kha khA hi/ yaM las skyes pa'i gzhu'anga'i dbyibs// ba dan g.yo bas mtshan pa ste/ raM byang me yi dkyil 
141b8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'bar// dmar po gru gsum ra yis mtshan// kaM byung thod pa mtshan ldan nang // 'od gsal chags med la gnas pa'o// mi sha la sogs phyogs dang mtshams// a las byung ba'i zla ba dang // hUM byung 
142a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes bkab byas nas// hUM oM hrIHthi traM haM/ bzhi rnams so// oM aHhUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta hUM hUMHtha/ rim bzhin sngags dang phyag mtshan dang // skur 'gyur 'pho dang 'du ba yis/ 
142a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bdud rtsi dgug bya ste// rdo rje bzhugs nas snod bzang bltam// zla 'dra 'od zer lnga bcas pas// dkyil 'khor 'khor bcas tshogs mnyes bya// oM 'jig rten kun gtso mnga' mdzad pa'i// 'jigs 
142a3(rgyud 'grel): byed drag byed stobs ldan pa// bde gshegs sras sogs bran mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ldan snying rje can// dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas// de bzhin khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang // brgya byin 'dod/ 
142a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' chung ma bas ste// lha chen 'azh-i bcas tshogs rnams dang // phyog sbyong brgyad pa 'khong dang bcas// bla nan brgyad zi 'khong dang bcas// mtha' gre drag mi gsus 'dzin ma// dung khrod mchogs 
142a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas dang // gzhan yang lha srin sde brgyad dang // 'gro ba drug po 'khor bcus rnams// sku gsung thugs sogs sbyang byas nas// rang gi lha yi gzugs 'dzin rnams// gnas 'dir 'dus pa'i

142a7(rgyud 'grel): grogs mdzod cig/ las mkhan rdo rje bran bcus pas// zhi rgyal dbang drag las grub cing // theg chen gsang sngags bsrung ba dang // nad dang gdon sogs zhi ba dang // tshe dbang bkra shis spel ba dang // 
142a8(rgyud 'grel): ba de legs 'bras bu thub par mdzad// oM AHhU~M/ pad+ma mu ka N+Ta Sh+T+r-i ta mgrin phyag rgya rnams gnyis kyis// las rnams dngos grub chags kyur cig/ dngos grub dbang du byas nas ni// rang gi gnas 
142b1(rgyud 'grel): la dgod par bya// oM hrIHDA ki nI maM ba liM ta pra tIts+tsha hU~M khA hi/ oM AHhrI/ khA hi/ thugs rje chen pos gzigs nas kyang // sna tshogs rgyud rnams sprul mdzad pa'i// gar mkhan 'khor lo brgyud mnga' ba// 
142b2(rgyud 'grel): drag po zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs gar gyi rnam par sprul la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje la sogs mtshon chas rol la phyag 'tshal lo// ma lus lha yi lha mchog skyong la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo 
142b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsal rdzogs stobs bcu'i shugs la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a ti b+ha ho// a la la la la ho// thun bzhi'i dus su bya ba las// rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing // rang las byung ste mnan 
142b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag nas// gsol btab las la bskul bar bya// oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'gro 
142b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don la dgongs// oM badz+ra gats+tsha mu/ de nas phyag rgya rnams dgod pa// rim bzhin bdag la bsdu byas nas// rnam gsum sems dpa' hUM la thim// rim bzhin theg le mnyam pa'i dbyings// 
142b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'byung mtshan ma'i skur gnas te// mtshan med rgyan dang cha lugs gsal// cho ga go bcings bsrung bya zhing // dbang bskur dbu rgyan cod pan ldan// kaM haM oM tuM rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ pa Ta laM ba/ 
142b7(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi l-i ba hUM/ spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par// lha nyid du ni bsgom par bya// dbang po'i snang ba yul dus rnams// dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du brtag/ bza' btung byin brlabs ma nyams
142b8(rgyud 'grel): bzlas// sgyu ma gnyis med ye shes rol// byed spyod tshogs gnyis rgyu ru brtag/ thams cad 'gro ba'i don du spyad// blo mchog mkhas shing rtsal ldan pas// bla ma mnyes las byung ba'i don// 
143a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis dus gcig rdzogs pa yis// rgyal ba rnams kyi yul la sbyor// gang zhig phyi yi g.yeng bral zhing // nang gi bdag nyid gsal 'dod pas// mnyam bsams las rnams 
143a2(rgyud 'grel): gdung gsal nas// bla ma'i bdud rtsi'i ro myang bya// las dang po yis brtsa ma byab// zhi gnas mi mthun rgya spong zhing // lus sems bde bar bzhugs byas nas// skye ba'i mtshan nyid bsam par bya// 
143a3(rgyud 'grel): kye ma'o rang bzhin la rmongs rnams// blo bur rtog pas kun tu bslad// de bzhin yun ring goms shugs las// bde sdug gnyis tshogs dbang spyod pas// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs tshogs su snang / 
143a4(rgyud 'grel): la las zhen chags rnam par 'khrul// la las spong 'dod sdug bsngal rgyu// la las spyod 'dod gnas ma dag/ dga' ba kun la spyod rnams kyang // lus ngag g.yeng zhing sdug bsngal rgyu// snang bde

143a7(rgyud 'grel): gis// gtum mor bcas yang dag sbyor// dbyings snang ri bong 'dzin pa la// ye shes rdo rje rtse lnga gnas// dmar po oM sogs yig bcas pa'i// dbyings can sprul sku gyen du phyogs/ 
143a8(rgyud 'grel): dkar po hUM sogs zur bltas pa'i// chos skus mngon du phyogs par mdzad// sgra ga nas oM sogs yi ge tshogs// longs sku dmar po gyen du phyogs// tshang bug 'og tu bde ba che// 
143b1(rgyud 'grel): haM sogros dkar po thur bltas pa'o// steng gi yud rtsa ma dgag byas pas// rgyun mi 'chad par rdo rjer bstim// bskyod pa'i ba dan gnyis bskul bas// 'og nas yud tsam yud tsam dgag/ 
143b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun mi 'chad par 'dren byas te// ri bong 'dzin pa'i khams zhus brgyan// bar skabs stod smad yan lag rnams// nyams chung 'bar sogs grags gyur na// cung zhig sbyor ba glod bya zhing // 
143b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon steng 'og spro ba dang // spyod lam sogs kyis bcos byas nas// bde 'gyur gong bzhin brlab par bya// de bzhin dbang po gzhan dag dang // tshangs bug ste naganas dag kyang bsdu/ 
143b4(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba bzhi 'bum bskyen nus nas// bum pa gang bar gnas pa yin// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i 'phro 'dra yis// mtshan ma gsal bar brtag par bya// zla ba rdo rjes rgyas pa na// 'khor ba'i

143b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi yis// dga' ba bzhi yi rim bskyed cing // phung po bcud bsdus kA rtser bzung // dga' chen pos rnam myos par// hUM gsum phyag rgyas 'dren byas nas// phyi yi dkyil

144a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon du 'gyur// chags lam gzhan la rten pa yis// mtshan ldan rigs dang mthun pa la// dbang bskur byin brlabs gdams ngag dpog/ glu dbyangs sman dang brdas bskul nas/ 
144a2(rgyud 'grel): bA ga'i mtshan mar rnam brtags te// phyag rgya so so'i sbyor ba dag/ lnga nas drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar// sgor thabs drug cu rtsa bzhir bcas// phung po'i dkyil 'khor brtag bya ste// bsgrub gnas
144a3(rgyud 'grel): rol pa'i gnas shes bya// bskyod pas gtum mo legs sbar bas// srub thabs sbyor ba 'dres pa yis// lde phreng sbyin sreg byas nas su// sAl skus lus rtog sbyor bar mdzad// gong nas/ 
144a4(rgyud 'grel): gong du sbyor ba yis// chos dang longs spyod gnas spyod pas// sems dag dri ma rnam par spangs// bde ba chen po gnas rgyas pa// dga' dang mchog dga' rnam dga' dang // lhan cig skyes
144a5(rgyud 'grel): dga' lugs su 'byung // rdo rje dbyings mtshams sbyor ba'am// bad+ha ka ti'i rtse mor gzung // gling bzhi'i rtse rnams bsdu bya ste// steng gi mtshan mas blta bar bya// dga' ba ma skyes par dag tu//

144a7(rgyud 'grel): rab la la thur bltas pa'i// yi ge las byung dkar po yis// 'khor lo bzhi dang sbyor byas nas// k+ShaHrtse'i gnas gzung gong ma bzhin// thabs ldanas dang gyen bltas la// gcig 'gyur a ba
144a8(rgyud 'grel): d+hU tir zhugs// de la sprul pa'i 'khor lo yis// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas// slar nyid chos kyi 'khor lo'i gnas// bde ba'i ye shes gzung byas te// zin dang brtan dang pogra/ 
144b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyung dang // dbyung du med pa'i gnas 'jog pa'o// phyi yi gnas kyang rgyas byas shing // gzung med 'dzin dang bral bar gzhag/ khams gsum dngos po de lta bur// bde ba chen las gzhan ma 
144b2(rgyud 'grel): yin// blo mchog sbyangs pa'i 'phro ldan pas// phyi nang chos kun mkha' bzhin gsal// snang srid rang las rnam grol zhing // 'byung 'jug med par ye shes che// dbang po drug gi yul snang bas// 
144b3(rgyud 'grel): de las gzhan med byang chub sems// rtog pa mtha' rnams 'dzin med pa'i// snang gsal bde ba chen po'i chos// gnas med btang snyoms chen po'i gnas// rtsol bral byang sems brtsol ba'i don/ 
144b4(rgyud 'grel): bcos med dran pa rang dgar gnas// chos nyid mnyam pa'i rgyan dang bcas// byung tsher 'gog dang rjes dran med// ma bcos mtha' bral bde ba'i rgyun// mngon gsum gsal ba nyams myong ba// 
144b5(rgyud 'grel): snang srid ma g.yos phyag rgya'i tshogs// chos kun rang bzhin de lta bur// bde chen rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// gsung thugs yon tan phrin las brgyan// ma rtsol rgod pa chen po'i dbyings// de dus mtshan 
144b6(rgyud 'grel): ma rnam myong ba// lus rtog sgra sogs snang zhing stong // gsal ba'i don las gzhan mi 'gyur// chos rnams gang la chags sngar med// mkha' la khyud chen gnas pa dang // chu la nya chen 'phyo ba bzhin// 
144b7(rgyud 'grel): byis pa rnams ni gzugs sogs chags// 'bring po'i blo ldan chags bral spyod// gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid shes pas// blo mchog rnams ni grol bar 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs ma la sogs/ 
144b8(rgyud 'grel): la// rnal 'byor 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson no// de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams 
145a1(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// de bas bdag nyid lhur sbyor bas// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo
145a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang thams cad kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sbyor ba bzhi la legs gnas shing // ting 'dzin nyams pa med pa'i blos// seng ge ri brag rgya ba bzhin// 
145a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs med thams cad zil gyis gnon// thams cad mnyam pas sprad bya ste// 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis brgyan// bza' spyod kun la rol bya zhing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// 
145a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor thams cad nyer spyod pas// dpal ni bzhir 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs// de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khams gsum ma 
145a5(rgyud 'grel): lus thams cad do// rnal 'byor kun gyis longs spyod kyis// ji ltar bde bar bsten byed cing // rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // 
145a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag/ bdag nyid rab tu myang byed na// shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis// ra sa ya na'i bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang / 
145a7(rgyud 'grel): lang tsho nad med bde ba 'grub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal sbyor ba'i// mthu 'di/ 
145a8(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis thams cad du// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// so so dag nas rab 'grub 'gyur// lta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku// thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad// legs so zhes pa grub pa ni// 
145b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa dag kyang rab tu stsol// sku gsum dbyer med las byung bas// sems can kun don rnam 'phrul zhing // mdzad pa rgya chen sna tshogs kyis// don bzhin sprul pa mdzad pa yin// brtson ldan shes 
145b2(rgyud 'grel): rab mchog gyur pa'i// mkhas mchog rnams kyis rnyed dki 'don// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor// mkha' 'gro sgyu mi bde mchog las// skyes ma chog gang gis drin rnyed pa'i// rgya mtsho las 
145b3(rgyud 'grel): byung rin po che// 'gro ba'i don du bteg byas pas// 'jug pa po rnams dga' bar gyis// rgyud rgyal rnams kyi rtsa ba'i don// gsang ba'i de nyid bzhi bcu gnyis// ces bsdus rtog pa bcu pa dang // 
145b4(rgyud 'grel): phye ma'i phyi ma phyi ma las// gsang don rnam par dgod byas pas// 'khrul rtog mi tshig bslad bral zhing // rgyud gzhan tshig phrad tsam bkod de// rgyal ba'i gsung bzhin rnam pa rab sdebs// cung zad bsag/ 
145b5(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba yi// dri med ston ka'i zla 'dra bas// 'gro ba'i ye shes gsal mdzad nas// dpal ldan sku gsung thob par shog/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/

145b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal rnam par snang mdza rtsin sang don zugs// rgya gar skad du/ shrI bi ro tsa Na gu h+yAr+tha d+ha ro b+hu ha nA ma/ bod skad du// dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sem 
145b8(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos bdag gsal ba gnyis med mchog/ longs spyod rnam sprul bde chen sku// rigs kyi 'khor lo rab mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor kun 'byung gnas phyag 'tshal// zhi 'gog 
146a1(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das sogs 'joms// rgyu 'bras lam zhen dbugs sbyin mdzad// dpal ldan rnam snang gsang ba'i don// rnam dgod sgrub thabs mchog bshad bya// rang bzhin ngang tshul

146a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la dga' bas// phyi nang g.yeng bar rab gsal to// rang gi 'dod don 'bras bu gnyer// rten gnas dgon pa gtsug lag khang // ri yi rtse rnams thams cad du// rnam pa du ma sna tshogs/

146a6(rgyud 'grel): gas gas la spang byed pa'aM// 'ag 'du ba gyur// rdzogs bdung na no tshogs bskyed pa'i// chags dang kyilas pazhin bas pa/ khams cad sgras bral de bzhin da/

150a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga' bas lta zhing 'dzum// shin tu srid pa yang dag sgrub// 
150b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar lta la gnas par mdzad// sna tshogs ban+d+ha brtag pa la// sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par dag/ lnga lnga lnga yi 'phro 'du yis// mtshan ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha yi gzugs

150b3(rgyud 'grel): shig rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba chen po rnam par rol// grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la// hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod// mnyam nyid mi g.yo la sogs pa'i// bstod pa'i glu rnams blang byas
150b4(rgyud 'grel): nas// sil snyan kun gyi sgra rnams dang // gar gyis lha rnams mnyes par bya// aM aM aM/ haM haM haM/ baM baM baM/ daM daM daM/ bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// btsod gtub lus la 
150b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib mas phog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa// sku yi phyogs tsam mthong na mdo la 'tshe ba dang // gzi mdangs lus la 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag gis// 'od kyi phog pas 'jig rten 
150b6(rgyud 'grel): khams kun snang ba dang // lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rje re rab gnas te// re smon thams cad dus 'drir 'grub par mdzad du gsol// de nas bzlas brjod rnam gnyis sam// theg le gnyis sam 
150b7(rgyud 'grel): phra mo gnyis// rnam dag mtshan ma gsal ba dang // mtshan ma med pa'i don bsam bya// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyis mchog/ don dam bde ba chen po'i sku// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi// 
150b8(rgyud 'grel): lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya// zud bzhi'i skabs su gtor ma btang // rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing // rang lus byung ste mdun bzhag nas// gsol btab las la bskul bar bya/ 
151a1(rgyud 'grel): oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// oM badz+ra gats+tsha muH
151a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyag rgya rnam bkod pa// rim bzhin bdag la bsdu byas nas// rnam gsum sems dpa' hUM la thim// rim bzhin thig le mnyam pa'i dbyings// rjes 'byung mtshan ma'i skur gnas te// mtshan dpe
151a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang cha lugs gsal// cho ga go bcings bsrung bya zhing // dbang bskur dbu rgyan cod pan ldan// kaM haM oM traM oM rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM// oM pa Ta laM ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa laM ba b+h+rUM/ spyod lam kun tu mnyams 
151a4(rgyud 'grel): par// lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste// dbang po snang ba'i yul dus rnams// dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du brtag/ bza' gtung byin rlabs ma nyams par// sgyu ma gnyis med ye shes rol/
