151a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi lo tsa ba ban+de/ lha rin po ches bsgyur zhing / gtan la phab pa'o// @#// dpal te ru ga'i gsang don bags// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra he ru ka guh+Na R+YA d+ha ro b+hu ha nA ma// bod skad du// dpal he ru ka'i gsang 
151a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don rnam pakod pa zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad 'byung gnas gsal byed cing // gnyis med ma 'dres mdzad mthar phyin// stong nyid ye shes drug gi 
151b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ thugs mchog khro ba dag phyag 'tshal te// dregs byed zhe sdang la sogs skyes// nyon mongs lam zhen ru tra sogs// 'joms mdzad dpal ldan he ru ka'i// gsang don rnam dkod bshad 
151b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// rang bzhin ngang tshul bzang las byung // gnyis med yon tan skye bas thob// skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa can// dbang thob dam tshig 'jigs med pa// theg chen gsang sngags blo
151b3(rgyud 'grel): gros mchog/ he ru ka dpal la dga' bas// phyi nang g.yeng ba rab gsal to// rang gi 'dod don 'bras bu gnyer// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug nas// rdo rje 'dzin 
151b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dgongs pa dag/ rnam pa du ma 'grub par 'gyur// 'gro la snying rje chen po yis// bdag gzhan sgrol bar dam bcas nas// sbyor ldan nus mthu gsum bskyed pas// bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang ba
151b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // dbang po'i dkyil 'khor mdun dmigs te// dang po bya ba'i rim rdzogs sbyang // sgrub sogs las grol dag byed pa'i// sems can chad med blo yis gzung // bar chad bgegs bsal 
151b6(rgyud 'grel): srung byed pa'i// 'khor lo me 'od ra bgur// phyogs bcu khro bo'i tshogs skyed pa'i// cho ga rang gi las bzhin bsgom// thams cad spros bral de bzhin nyid// gnyis med byang chub sems 
151b7(rgyud 'grel): dbyings las// 'gro la phan pa'i thugs rje'i rgyun// stong gsal na mkha'i shugs ltar byung // rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal// rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la gzugs/ 
151b8(rgyud 'grel): e yaM baM laM suM raM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ a na rA ga ya ni maN+Da la hUM b+h+rUM// chos 'byung na mkha'i rang bzhin las// byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin brtsegs// ri rab me 'od rgyan gsal 
152a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing // kha dog dbyings rgyal mtshan mar bcas// bde gshegs yon tan snang ba'i gnas// sna tshogs pad+ma rin po che// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dbus// khang pa rdo rje sgo khyud dang /

152a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad// rin chen mu tig me tog zeng // rgyan mtshan thar rdza ma pa gdugs// 'dred yon lnga yi lha mo'i b+hag/ bla ched rdo rje rin chen dang // ba dan dril bus san sgrogs// bzang zla khams

152b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mda' dang gzhu// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// stod g.yogs dar ser dang ris tsan// skra smad tshig gu'i na bza' la// rin chen phreng ba'i rked 'chang 'dril// mgul du do shal dpung

152b8(rgyud 'grel): las// spa rnams rdo rje gyen du 'khyil// sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung // rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba yis// sku gsung thugs kyi gang thabs can//

155b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams ma lus spro// oM pa na pe na pe nu su ra ta ti pu pa ra mu// sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yo ga tsit+ta aHhUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe/ badz+ra A lo ki/ badz+ra gan+d+he/ pra tIts+tsha ho// shI b+ha ga bAn/

155b8(rgyud 'grel): thogs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// na mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa// na mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkha' la 'byin/ 
156a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas// skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas la// rkang pas rang gi brla gnan nas// legs par bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis// 
156a2(rgyud 'grel): yang nas yang du bskyod pa yis// oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' bar gar byed 'gyur bas bcas// shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i 
156a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rab tu gnas// zhing dang drag po rmongs byed dang // gyen du dbugs byed gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba 
156a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang // ras dang me tog grub pa yas// khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba bzhin// mngon 
156a5(rgyud 'grel): par gtong zhing se gol brdab// dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas// g.yon du blta zhing lag pas drud// 'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin te// gar byed rab tu rmongs pa dang // zas dang gsang ba'i 
156a6(rgyud 'grel): lus rnams dang // tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhini 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// de bzhin sa las 'dren pa dang // rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul bstan dang // dur khrod dag gis gar byed
156a7(rgyud 'grel): dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // rab tu 'jigs pa bsreg pa'i me// las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang po rgyas 'debs ma yin rgya// snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa 
156a8(rgyud 'grel): shin tu rmongs byed ma'o// de bzhin bzhi pa 'debs byed ma'i// lnga pa gar byed ma yi rgya// drug pa gsod ma yin par bshad// bdun pa zab mo yi rgya// brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya 
156b1(rgyud 'grel): yin// mda' rnon 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i// lha mo bzhi po snga ma bzhin// me tog la sogs brgyad rnams ni// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya lnga ma'i tshul// rang 'byung mo dang bcas pa yi// phyag rgya sngag 
156b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis gnyis med 'gyur// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad do// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol la/ 
156b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo tshar bstan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs byas man bsu gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar ba de la bzhugs// hUM a la la ho// snang bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bde 
156b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog sgyums sprul// dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsal// nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzad// so so'i lcags kyi pad+ma la// chos kyi snying po mtshan ma'i dkyil// su b+ha gas ma han de bo ti ri mi 
156b5(rgyud 'grel): mi ti r-i ne shrI ye// rdo rje thal ma gyen du dbye// 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bo gnyis kyi mame ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa rdo rje gnon sbyin ma// sngags bcas gnas su bzhag byas te/

156b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// mnyam pa'i gnas la rol tu gsol// hUM rdo rje las kyi mda' gzhul phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig

161a4(rgyud 'grel): kA yA bAk+Shi trAM hUM/ sku 'phrul 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes// a la la ho// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan mdzad 
161a5(rgyud 'grel): cing // rtog pa du me'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad// a la la ho// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mtha' yas// snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings las rol// a la la ho// 
161a6(rgyud 'grel): kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam dgod rang las byung // a la la ho// mdzad pa rgya chen mgon med kun grub pas// tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs pa/ 
161a7(rgyud 'grel): a la la ho// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan phrin las brgyan// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// thal mo pad+ma kha dbus bzhin// ras kyi snying gar bcing bya ste/ 
161a8(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong maze'u chung pad+ma bzhin// rgyas par 'dud pa'i phyag kyang bya// hrI a ti b+hu ho// ban+de naM kA ro ya mi/ gu ru pa ti/ a la la ho// oM 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung // stong gsum rdul 
161b1(rgyud 'grel): snyed ma lus pa'i// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// lha mo'i tshigs ma lus spro// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // dri tshogs kun gyi mchod par bya// oM pa na pe na pa nu su ratra// sarba ta thA ga tA/ sa ma 
161b2(rgyud 'grel): yo gA sid+d+hi AHhUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ badz+ra d+hU pe/ badz+ra A lo ke/ badz+ra gan+d+he/ pra tIts+tshi ho/ shI b+hA gA ban kha kha khA hi khA hi/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dgag si// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur/ 
161b3(rgyud 'grel): te// g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// te zhes bya ba glu yi rgya// thams cad dag pas rab bsgrub pa'o// dzaHhUM baM ho// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ 
161b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad dam dag phyir// bAd+madz+ra'i phyag rgyu dpal druganas// mi 'gyur dam pa dag bya'i phyir// shal gang bzhin du dag pa'o// 'dod chags zluma?/ 
161b5(rgyud 'grel): cad bsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas tshe yi rin chen spras// gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// bde ba can bzhin 
161b6(rgyud 'grel): dam par 'gyur// gang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bsgyur cing gar byas pa// pad+ma'i mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas// phyag na rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyar 
161b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ya si// skyil mo krung ni phyed mar gnas// rgyal ba'i skyil mo bgrang bcas nas// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha pad+ma narte shwa ri hrIHdza bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon// 
161b8(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// pad+ma dmar po ci bider bzung // snying gar 'dron tshul kha 'byed pa// rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// bsnyems pa'i log pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma sngon po ci bder bzung / 
162a1(rgyud 'grel): snying gar 'dren tshul bud med rgya// sgrol ba'i byang chub mchog yin no// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma dkar po tsa bi der bzung // 'khor lo'i rgya bcings rab tu bskor// 
162a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal chen mo yi 'khor lo'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma mthing kha ci bder bzung // g.yas pa gar byed pa dan gsum// khro gnyer ma yi phyag rgya yin// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon 
162a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// pad+ma dmar po tsi bi der bzung // g.yas pa tri shul tshul du bsgreng // pad+ma gtum dbang phyug bde gnon rgya// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa ya si// pad+ma ljang gu ci bder gzung / 
162a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas 'khor lo rtse brgyad stong // pad+ma dbang phyug thugs kyi rgya// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma ser po ci bder gzung // g.yas pas gar byed chu srin bsgreng // pad+mo gnas 
162a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dpal chen yan// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa ya si// pad+ma le brgan ci bder bzung // snying gar 'dren tshul rdo rje'i rgya// 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i go ba gsum// glang bu la sogs lha mo yi//

162b4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// mnyam pa chen po'i

163a1(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs rgan dang mtshan ldan pa'i// mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog/ byin gyis brlabs cing rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba chen po'i rnam par rol// grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la// hUM dang phaT

163a4(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas mos la 'tsho ba dang // gzi mdangs lus la 'jug par byed pa stong phrag gas// 'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khams su snang ba dang // lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rjer rab tu gnas/ 
163a5(rgyud 'grel): re smon thams cad dus 'dir grub par mdzad du gsol// de nas bzlas brjod rnam gnyis sam// thig le gnyis sam phra mo gnyis// rnam dag mtshan ma gsal ba dang // mtshan ma med pa'i don bsam//

163b2(rgyud 'grel): dbu rgyan cod pan ldan// kaM tAM au tuM hrIHrat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa tAM/ oM paT+Ta laM a ba laM ba hUM/ spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par// lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste// dbang po snang ba'i yul dus 
163b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du brtag/ bza' btung byin brlabs me nyams bzlas// sgyu ma gonyis med ye shes rol// byed spyod tshogs gnyis rgyu ru brtag/ thams cad 'gro ba'i don phyir

166b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // phyag zhabs dpud rgyan se mo do// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni// gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste// sngags kyi bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam/ 
166b2(rgyud 'grel): oM na maHsarba tA thag tA/ kA ya bAk+tsi t+ta gu Na kar+m+ma badz+ra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko/ haM/ lus kyi baspu'i gnas rnams su// dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas// mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya 
166b3(rgyud 'grel): yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// oM d+harmA d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor ba// mdzub mo mnyam ste phyi rol dgug/ mthe bong ginyis ni rab tu 
166b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya// dpral bar mi gu bzhug pa ni// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// traM oM b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rat+na ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsa.a~M/ ban+d+ha laM a b+hiShiny+tsa.oM/ badz+ra tu 
166b5(rgyud 'grel): sh+ya ho// byin rlabs rigs kyis dbu rgyan gyis// rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang // dpal ldan rdo rje nyi ma ru// ma lus mtshan ma rgyan gsal gyur// gser gyi ri la nyi shar bzhin// zhal bzhi 
166b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhis rnam mdzes pa// g.yas na mda' dang ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gzhu nyi dkyil rdo rjes mtshan// 'od kyis dkyil 'khor rnam lngas bskor// 'dzum bcas g.yon mig gyen du bteg 
166b7(rgyud 'grel): la lar cung zhig khros pa la// bya ru dmar po'i mdangs ldan sku/ zhabs gnyis skyil krung legs bzhugs shing // snga ma'i rgyan gyis byas pa'o// rang 'od ngo bo las byung ba'i// mthing 
166b8(rgyud 'grel): shun mdog 'dra mA ma kI// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgyu rtsal can// phyag gnyis rin chen thod pa 'dzin// rin chen sna tshogs phreng ba dang // na bza' dradril bu rkeng chings can// phyung nas byin gyis

167a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi yi rnam par gsal// lha mo'i bum pas brus byas te// dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag por bsam// traM las bskyed pa'i lang ga ni// rani chen gsal lam phaT kyi mtshan// a yis 
167a3(rgyud 'grel): dag byas b+ha ga'i dbyings// pad 'dab brgyad la e gnas pa// sna tshog brda' yis bskul byas nas// thabs shes gnyis med rol bar mdzad// traM pra be sha paT/ al la la ho/ 
167a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad// lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste// gnyis ka'i dga' ba rab tu spel// khams gsum 'gro gnas dag pa dang /

167a8(rgyud 'grel): gling pu traM pi baM// baM las rnga chen dza rnga rnga// me mtshams la sogs re'u mig tu// lha mo bzhi ni gnas pa yin// a a me tog spos me ma// a aHmar me dri chab ma// bar khyams

172a1(rgyud 'grel): 12// mthu// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol// rta mchog rol pa skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ dzaHhUM baM ho// e byi hi b+ha 
172a2(rgyud 'grel): ga bA na/ ma hA ku ru Ni ka dri sh+ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bder gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i bya ri// don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas gshegs 
172a3(rgyud 'grel): shing bzhugs su gsol// ka ya bak+Sha t+ti hUM/ sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol pa'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes// a la la la ho// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil
172a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnon mdzad cing // rtog pa du ma'i sgo 'dogs gcod par mdzad// a la la to// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mtha' yas// snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings la rol/ 
172a5(rgyud 'grel): a lal ho// kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam dkod rang las byung // a la la ho// mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med kun grub pas// tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba 
172a6(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzogs pa// a la la ho// skug srung thugs mchog yon tan phrin las rgyan// dkyi'i/ 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs/ 
172a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag bya'o// haM a ti b+hu'o// ban+d+ha naM kA ro ya mi// gu ru pa ti a la la ho// o 'byung ba chen las thams cad 'byung // steng gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i// gzugs sgra dri

172b2(rgyud 'grel): mar me mchog/ dri yas mchod pa byung ba'o// gang ngam 'on te stong ngam rung // yang na ci 'byor pa yis kyang // dam tshig mnyam par bsgrub pa yis// mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 
172b3(rgyud 'grel): kaka la ya dang tse'u r+ya'i dbyangs// de bzhin rab tu gdangs snyan dang // ka ha la yi glu yi rgya// 'joms pa thams cad 'grub pa'o// dzaHhUM baM ho// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ 
172b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor bas rnam sbyong dpal// rta yi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas// thams cad pad+mo mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon tu// rab tu non 
172b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags can la g.yem par ston// gdug pa rnams la gdug par 'gyur// drag shul can la drag shul sbyor// zhal bzhi pa

173a2(rgyud 'grel): pas lhag par rab tu ston// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun grub par mdzad// thams cad dag pas mos pas ngo 'than stobs kyis non par mdzod// hi he he he he/ dbang

173a7(rgyud 'grel): pas de la mdza' zhes su zhig zer// rgol ba gang la bya ba 'am mi bya yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i rgod pa sgyu ma yin pas de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer// so so'i ljags kyi pad+ma la//

177b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yang // rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste// dam pa'i dkon mchog bla ma sogs// mchod par 'os pa bslas pa dang // 'gyod pa'i gnas pa yin pa la// gzhan dag nye bar sbyor ba dang // 
177b4(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed byang chub sems dpa' che// zhe sdang tshig gis tshar gcod cing // sems can rnam pa thams cad la// g.yo dang sgra yis spyod byed pa'o// byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang // 
177b5(rgyud 'grel): de la gal te gzugs mchis na// nam mkha'i khams ni kun bkang nas// de ni de las lhag par 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye ma grangs snyed kyis// sangs rgyas zhing khams mi gdags// ran chen 
177b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyis kun bkang ste// ston pa mchog la phul byas pas// gang gis thal mo nyer sbyar nas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// mchod pa mchog 'di khyad par 'phags/ 
177b7(rgyud 'grel): del mthang thugam mchisas// 'khar la dpag chad bcu gnyis pa// lcags las byas pa mgal 'bod// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa yis// gsal bar gyur zhes rab tu grags/ 
177b8(rgyud 'grel): byang chu sems mchog ma bskyed par// dge gzhan gang gis grol mi 'gyur// 'o mas dug ni sel lo zhes// 'jig rten pa la rab tu grags// de nyid sprul gyis 'thungs pa na// 
178a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dug ni 'phel bar byed// mar dang bu ram sman gyi mchog/ byis pas bza' nyes dug tu 'gyur// 'bru mar sdong bu'i phung pos kyang // me med bar du gsal bar 'gyur// 
178a2(rgyud 'grel): shel gong dag par gyur pa yang // tshon gzhan dag gas bsgyur ba yin// long ba dmigs bu med pa dang // brgya stong grong gzhan rgyu mi zhu// rlung dang bral ba'i me nyid kyis// nags tshal bsreg 
178a3(rgyud 'grel): par ga la nus// gsher bral rdul gyi phung po'i tshogs// 'du bar mi 'gyur rlung gis mthor// chu rnams bsags pa'i lteng ka dag/ gnyen pas mod la 'joms par byed// sems nyid 
178a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dang ba yis// dge ba'i bshes la brten bya ste// bsnyen bskur cho ga bzang po'i tshogs// bya ba'i khyad par gnas kun 'phags// mngon 'dod the tshom med pa'i yul// don kun 
178a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba ston byed pa// rab tu smin pa 'di nas 'jug/ bla ma'i byin rlabs mthu yis grol// lan grangs mang por gsol gdab cing // phun sum tshogs pas mthu bskyed nas// mos pa'i 
178a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i bskor// rang rgyud dag pas snga ma gnas 'dod// dbang bskur chog rdzogs pa yis// las kun rim bzhin mngon gnyer zhing // phyag rgya'i bsam gtan mthu bcas 
178a7(rgyud 'grel): pas// las kun gsang ba'i sngags rgyun 'jug/ thun mong khyad par dam tshig gis// nyes bskyed rten gnas dag par bya// thams cad sdom pas rjes gzung zhing // bdag gzhan bya ba 
178a8(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin pa ma// byang chub chen po'i gnas spyod pa// der 'jug de nyid la mtshan sbrum// don kun ngo bo gsal byed pas// skyog sum byan rtag tu brtag/ 'gro gnas sems cad 
178b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen tshogs// theg chen gsang bas gsung bya ste// mthar thugs cig tsam don gyi phyir// rgyal ba'i bka' don gus pas gzung // rdo rje bla ma sangs rgyas mchog/ dus gsum thugs rje 
178b2(rgyud 'grel): gtsor ldan pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag 'tshal mchod pa'i gnas nyid yin// mi mkhas phrag dog nyams pa'i gzhi// de rgyud gtan du nyams par 'gyur 
178b3(rgyud 'grel): thog mar don kun sgo 'jug pas// bcas pa'i dam tshig sdom la gzung // thabs rnams kun gyis bstan pa'i sgo// mtshan med mtshan ma sna tshogs kun// ma nor de bzhin ston byed pa// 
178b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje theg pa'i sngags lam rgyud// phyag rgya kun las mi 'da' zhing // mchod bstod tshogs kyi bya ba shes// sems can don spyod 'tshe ba spang // der 'jug thugs rjes rnam par gzung // 
178b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu rang gi lha nyid dang // rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// stobs ldan rnams kyis spyod byed pa// de dag kun gyi sgor 'jug brtsam// rtag tu dkon mchog mchod bya zhing // rtag tu rang gi 
178b6(rgyud 'grel): dam che gri bsrung // mchod rten gtsug lag ba bzang po// pad dag gus pa'i sems kyis gnas// lha gzhan dgul phyag byed dang // ngan pa'i spyod yul kun ston pa'i// theg dman rgyur gzhan 
178b7(rgyud 'grel): ston pa'i phyir// don kun che ba'i gnas nyams 'gyur// dran tshogs shes bzhin blo gros mthus// dad brtson ting 'dzin bskyed byas te// sdom bcas sdom min gnas dag las// mchod brtson mthu 
178b8(rgyud 'grel): yis rnam par grol// dkyil 'khor kun tu ma zhugs shing // dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dang // gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// sgrub pa ci yang grub mi 'gyur// bdag nyid chos nyid dang ldan 
179a1(rgyud 'grel): pas// dam tshig la sdang skal pa ngan// srogs chags bsad par mi bya zhing // dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang // byang chub sems kyang mi btang ste// sgal bzang slob dpon 
179a2(rgyud 'grel): sprad mi bya// srid pa shin tu sgrub byed pa'i// mgon gyur rnams la bdag skyabs mchi// thog mar brlab par bya ba'i tshul gyi smin par bya ba'i tshig ste dang po'o// // rten gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa
179a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od// mngon par bsgrub bya'i gnas gang dag/ rgyud las mngon par bsngags pa'i gzhi// phun sum tshogs pas don kun sprad// gnas mal phyag dar legs pa'i sar// rgyan tshogs 
179a4(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa legs dgram zhing // 'phags pa'i gnas mchog mthu ldan pa'i// rten gyi byabs don kun rdzogs// sa chu lcib sbyin pa'i rdzas// legs snyoms byugs pa tshul khrims mchog/ grog 
179a5(rgyud 'grel): spur skyon gsal bzod pa nyid// kun tu spro ba'i brtson 'grus dang // mi g.yeng brten pa'i bsam gtan dang // legs par mi shes rab rdzogs// pha rol phyin drug dkyil 'khor 'di// rtse gcig/ 
179a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la dbul// gser mdog nad rnams kun zhi zhing // zla ba'i bzhin rgyas lha yis mchod// khyad par bla ma lhag pa'i lha// thun mongs dkon mchog la dmigs pas// dus bzhin 
179a7(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal bzhi dag la// me tog sngags su bcas pas dgram// oM badz+ra re khe hUM/ oM badz+ra tsAkrA maN+Da la hUM b+h+rUM/ dkyil 'khor bzang po gnas de nyid// don gyi byin rlabs mthu ldan pas// stan 
179a8(rgyud 'grel): bzang legs par bshams pa la// khrus kyi dag byas bde bar gnas// rgyud dang po yi dbye ba nyid// brtan pas nyin rer gsum zhib// bya ba thun mong bye brag gis// las kun yongs su/ 
179b1(rgyud 'grel): dag par brtsam// tho rangs mal nas legs langs te// bgegs kyi sbyor ba sel byed pa'i// sngags kyi rgyal pos bsrungs byas nas// pha rol phyin tshogs mtha' yas spyad// 'gro brgya 
179b2(rgyud 'grel): che la dmigs te// tshad med bzhi nas kun tu khyab// bag med patshan mo'i nyes dmigs kun// dran pa bskyed cing bshags par bya// de bzhin 'bad pas dgongs mo'i dus// rang rgyud 
179b3(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pas rnam par spyad// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs mdzes brgyan// kun tu bzengs bstod dga' ba'i yid// lhag pa'i lha yi nga rgyal ldan// phyag rgya sngags kyis bsrung byas pa'o// 
179b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs btsal bkram zhing // mchod tshogs gtor ma rgyas byas nas// ras ri si la sogs glegs bam la// yang dag mos pa dad pa skyes// snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// 
179b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur khyab pa'i zla ba bsam// sbyor ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya sngags// gnas kun dkyil 'khor legs par bskyed// rnam pa kun mkhyen sangs rgyas gtso// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor// 
179b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams kun// sku rgyan cha lugs byini rlabs rdzogs/ rigs kyis 'od zer sprul par bcas// thams cad rgyud kun rnam dag pas// pho brangad dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir ldan 
179b7(rgyud 'grel): gnod byed khro bo'i sngags kyi tshogs// phyogs bcu khro bo'i phyag rgyas gnas// bgegs kyi dngos po bsreg byas te// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen tshogs// dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje/ 
180a1(rgyud 'grel): las// rdo rje se gol rnam pa gnyis// rang gi sngags bcas mthu ldan pas// lhag pa'i lhar bcas dkyil 'khor bskul// oM badz+ra sa mA ya dz+nyA hUM/ oM dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 
180a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nyid// sna tshogs lhag pa'i bsam pa can// ma lus sems can don mdzad pa// ye shes che gnas byin gyis brlabs// dzeHhUM baM ho// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru Ni ka dri sh+ya ho// 
180a3(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM phyogs bcu'i kun legs bzhugs pa yi// bcom ldan rgyal ba sras dang bcas// thugs rje che dgongs 'gro rgyud gzigs// thabs mkhas smon lam dbang gis 
180a4(rgyud 'grel): spyon// oM badz+ra maN+Da la saM pa ri bA ra hUM// 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du// phyag dang zhabs ni bsil mdzad cing // dam tshig dkyil 'khor gi nas 'di bzhugs// oM badz+ra sa ma ya/ pad+ma 
180a5(rgyud 'grel): moN+Da la hUM/ pran rA ga swA hA/ gang dge bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan// sku mchog gsum mnga'adus gsum nyid// rab mchog theg chen bla na med// byang chub dge tshegs thugs ldan pa 
180a6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa gsang sngags tshogs su bcas// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthar phyin pa// bsam 'das brjod par dka' ba'i tshogs// gnyis med sbyor bas bstod pa'i gnas// thams cad don 
180a7(rgyud 'grel): kun ston mdzad pa'i// dkyil 'khor kun la bdag cag 'tshal// o na maSh+Tasarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta ban+da nA ka ri mi// snga gi las ldog pa'i sems nyid kyis// thal sbyar pus mo g.yas 
180a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs te// nyon mongs rgyu dang yan lag gis// rmongs pa'i tshegs 'phel 'khrul pa bskyed// sgo gsum mi dge sdig pa las// dus kun rgyun gyis bshags po bya// thun mongs
180b1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par dkon mchog gi/ bstan la mngon par ma dad cing // dge ba shes dam pa ston pa'i mchog/ khyad par zhing du gyur kun la// mi dge las kun gang bgyis la// thog med 'khor ba'i kha
180b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyud nas// rang bzhin bcas pa'i sdig pa kun// bdag gzhan rgyud las gang byung ba// dus 'dir bshags shing bsdam par bya// gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang // 'phags 
180b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis byang bar mdzod// oM sarba pA ri s+pho Ta da ha na badz+ra pA paM swa hA// gnyis med ye shes 'dag pa'i phyir// mi 'gyur kun tu dgra ba'i bdag/ bkod pa che snang sna tshogs bzhi/ 
180b4(rgyud 'grel): don kun phyag rgya 'byung ba'i tshul sprul pa phyogs bcur ma 'gags pa'i// dbyer med pas ni las mdzad pa// thams cad don kun bskyed pa'i mchog/ dus 'dir skyabs su gsol ba 'deb 
180b5(rgyud 'grel): oM bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa// sha ra Ni gar+b+ha mi/ badz+ra d+harmA thiHskyon med rnam par dag pa'i sgo// rdul phran grangs med bas ma 'das pa// bzhi 'byung ma lus lhag pa'i tshogs// bde gshegs kun la/ 
180b6(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bgyi// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza pra brta na ye At+ma nAM nir+ya tA yA mi// sarba ta thA ga tA shra a d+hi ti shwA naM/ sarba ta thA ga tA dzA maM a b+hi Shiny+tsa na tu swa hA// skye rgan 'chi rba klong gi/ chu bo kun lnga/ 
180b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrol byed shog/ mi shes log rtog nges bcom dag/ thugs rjes mgon la skyabs su mchi// 'gro rnams kun la skyab slad du// sems mchog re ni chen bdag gis sbyar// dus kun 
180b8(rgyud 'grel): srog chags rnams kyi bdag/ skyabs rnams dpung gnyin skyob g+hu ra cig/ o bo d+hi tsat+taM ut+pA da ya ni// sarba pA paM bi ka ta ka na t+ya tra Ta tA sa ma ya bo d+hi tsit+ta hAM swa hA// phyogs bcu'i rgyal 
181a1(rgyud 'grel): bslas bcas kyi// bsod nams sna tshogs mkhas pa'i mchog/ 'phags dang lha mi dge spyod pa'i// brdul zhugs bzang po bla med pa// bya ba rgya chen gnas kun tshogs/ 
181a2(rgyud 'grel): der gzhol de nyid slob byed pa'i// bsod nams tshogs 'gyur gang yin pa// de dag kun la rjes yid rang // oM sarba te thA ga tA pu dza dz+nyA na a nu mo da na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha rA Na sa ma ye hUM/ 
181a3(rgyud 'grel): theg chen gsang ba bla na med// rdo rje lta bu yon tan brjod// rnal 'byor thig pa'i lam gyur pa'i// rin chen sgrol mas gsal bar mdzod// dngos rtog rigs kun sel byed pa'o// ye shes nyi ma'i
181a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje bdag/ dus kun rnam par grol ba yi// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// dus kun rdzogs par grol byed pa'i// 
181a5(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa rnams kyi gsar ba'i sngags// nyi ma'i snying po dri med pas// rgya chen phyogs rnams bya ba byed pa'i// nyes pa'i skyon tshogs rab tu ni// de dag de las der mtshungs ston// ston pa 'jig rten 
181a6(rgyud 'grel): sgron ma'i tshogs// dus kun mi 'gyur brtan par mdzod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ga na a t+ye shA ya me// sarba ta thA ga tA e ta ra tA ya// d+har+m+ma tra thAM/ sti thir b+ha ba ye swAhA// 'gro rnams kun la phan pa'i phyir/ 
181a7(rgyud 'grel): dge ba rgya chen gang bsags pa// 'khor ba'i chu bo 'joms byed pa'i// mya ngan 'das las grol bar shog/ maM lus 'di dag gcig pa'i blos// rnam par sbyor ba gang dang gang // mthar thug dngos po'i 
181a8(rgyud 'grel): zhi byed pa// don kun gsal ba gnyis med mchog/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pun ni ra yA tan b+hu dza me g+ha s+pha raH sa ma ye hUM swAhA// chu rgyud sbyangs bku sha'i tshigs// gnas kun dri sbyangs dag par byed// 
181b1(rgyud 'grel): so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis// de dag byin gyis brlab cing dbul// dkon mchog gsum nyid gtsor gyur pa// lhag pa'i yon tan mtha' yas tshogs// sangs rgyas la sogs rje su gzungs/ 
181b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam grol mtha' yas brjod cing bstod// rtse gcig 'dud pa'i rgyun kun tu// 'khor los gnas kun 'khor lor sbyor// dga' ba dang gus pa'i tshogs kun gyis// bsod nams rgya chen mtha' yas 
181b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti rat+na ke ru rA dzA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta a ra ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hAd+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+ne rat+no taM b+ha ba// rat+na be re ye swa hA// lus sam yang na sems kyang rung // ci tsam nus par bskor 
181b4(rgyud 'grel): babya// rgya cher 'gro ba la gnas te// smon lam mtha' yas gdab par bya// de nis rten gnas tshogs rnams kun// thams cad bdag la rnam btud cing // 'gro ba thams cad 'gron du gnyer// de dag 
181b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub la bzhugs phyir// rnam grangs mtha' yas 'jug pa'i sgo// khyad par brten gnas skyabs 'od gzung // bla ma dam chos sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // dus kun 
181b6(rgyud 'grel): btud de skabs gsol zhing // mchod 'os rnams la 'dud par bgyi// 'di dag sdig las zlog 'gyid cing // bsod dmas tshogs kun yongs su gzung // lus can rnams la bsod nams dag/ de dag 
181b7(rgyud 'grel): kun la rjes yi rang // lus gtud thal mo sbyar byas te// gsang ba'i theg chen bshad pa dang // 'gro rnams rab tu gzhug slad du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gsol// 'di dag gis bgyis 
181b8(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams dang // bdag gis bgyis dang ma bgyis dang // de gang sems can thams cad kyi// bla med byang chub sems bskyed shog/ chos kun rnam dag dri med dbang / yongs rdzogs mi khom kun spangs 
182a1(rgyud 'grel): nas// spyod pa rang dbang yod pa dang // 'tsho ba bzang po rgyu ldan shog/ lus can dag ni thams cad kyang // lag na rin chen nyid ldan zhing // yo byad tshogs rnams mtha' yas la// 'khor 'dra 
182a2(rgyud 'grel): srid dus gnas par shog/ bud med thams cad dus kun tu// skyes mchog byang chub sems ldan zhing // lus can thams cad rig pa dang // rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog/ 'gro rnams kha dog ldan 
182a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams// gzugs bzang bzi brjid che ba dang // blta na sdug cing nad med par// stobs cheni tshe ring brtan par shog/ thams cad thabs las mkhas gyur te// sdug bsngal tshogs rnams las 
182a4(rgyud 'grel): grol zhing // dkon mchog gsum la gzhol byed par// sangs rgyas theg pa'i rgyan ldan shog/ byams sogs snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms kun gyi gzhir gyur cig/ sbyin rnams tshul khrims 
182a5(rgyud 'grel): bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab kyis brgyan cing // tshogs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // mtshan dang dpe byad gsal bar bya// bsam gyis mi khyabs bcu dang // rgyun mi 'chad 
182a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gro byed shig/ bdag gis yon tan de dag dang // gzhan tshogs rnam par brgyan pa'i stobs// nyes pa kun las grol byed cing // sems can kun mchog byams pa'i gtso// sems can kun yid re 
182a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzunapa smra sa hU~M// na / sa sa / 
182a8(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis ming tsam thos pa'i dus// shin tu 'jigs pa maud gyur cig/ bdag nyid mthong zhing dran pa dang // ming tsam grag pas gzhan dag kun// rab tu 'khrug medan la ma'i yid// rdzogs pa'i byang 
182b1(rgyud 'grel): chub nges gzhol zhing // tshe rabs kun tu rjes 'breng ba'i// mngon shes lnga po thob par shog/ sems can kun la rnam kun tu// rtag tu phan par bgyid gyur cig/ 'jig rten kun la skye bo gang // sdig pa'i 
182b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun zhugs 'dod gyur dag/ de dag thams cad gnod med par// rtag tu thig car zlog gyur cig/ sa chu me rlung 'gyur tshogs dang // sman dang dgon pa shing bzhin du// rtag tu sems can thams cad
182b3(rgyud 'grel): rang dgar 'gag med spyod par shog/ sems can rnams ni srog bzhin pangs// de dag la bdag cher phongs shing // bdag la de dag sdig sman cing // bdag dge ma lus der smin thig 
182b4(rgyud 'grel): ji srid sems can dga' zhig kyang // gang du ma grol de srid du// de phyir bla na med pa yi// byang chub thob kyang gnas gyur cig/ gang dus gzhi legs pa'i gnas// der nam rten gyi las byas te/ 
182b5(rgyud 'grel): bar chad rkyen kun gsal nas ni// rigs kyi ting 'dzin bsgom par bya// sa gzhi 'jam zhing sbyin pa dag/ gtsang ma'i gnas na sna glang bya ste// dri zhing sngags kyi chus brlan nas// skyon med pha rol 
182b6(rgyud 'grel): phyin drug sbyar// oM na maHsarba na ta bud+d+hA naM/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ oM badz+ra badz+ro dbya ba ye swAhA/ oM a ra dze bi ra dze swAhA/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu gan+d+he swA hA/ legs par snam bsku phyag rgya gzhug/ gdab 
182b7(rgyud 'grel): pas sku gsum gsal gyur pa'o// miN+Dal mchod pa rgyan dang bcas// rol cha kun gyis mngon par bstod// dam tshig dkyil 'tshorime bzhin gsal// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs gnas 
182b8(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i tshogs mang legs bsngos nas// lpaganas dbang bskur byin brlab cing // gtor mas mgron tshogs tshim par bya// oM badz+ra a Ta sha dzaHd+ha mAd+ha re swAhA/ oM pad+ma sa~M pa ya a pra 
183a1(rgyud 'grel): ti ha ta ye thA b+hA badz+ra ya swAt+ma/ oMn ma thug bte badz+ra sar+b+ba pra b+hA rA dzA ya/ tA thA ga ta ya a ra ta tAM/ sam+bak+kas prad+d+hA ya/ tad+yaya/ suSh+Ta ma~M s+'uSh+Ta me/ sa ma ye sa ma ye/ shAn+te shAn+te/ sam 
183a2(rgyud 'grel): ro b+hU/ A na ya/ a ba~M bi/ oM baM bi ya/ shob ti/ ma hA te dzA ni dkr-i le ra bA ni raM bA praSh+TaM/ ad+hiSh+NI na A d+hiSh+Thi taM swAh+na/ oM sarba ta thA ta ni sha ta~M ta ba d+me dza la dza la d+harmA d+hA tu gan+d+he swAhA/ mtha' mar 
183a3(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa'i gsol bya ste/ byin rlabs brtan par mnga' gsol zhing // bkra shis rgya cher brjod byas pas// de dag bsdu zhing gshegs su gsol// oM A ka sha gaN+DI swAhA// ye d+harmA he du pra 
183a4(rgyud 'grel): b+hab hi t+yam+me tA thAg byab dang/ teSh+ThaHoM na roHoM beb+hU d+hima~Mny+dza sh+yA maN/ oMs b+ha ba ba~M shud+d+he/ ha8ha8/ a ka dz+wa la/ a kadz+wa la/ d+hur+m+man+na d+ha gar+b+he swAm+b+ha/ bye ba'i las kun btan 
183a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas// pra ni las bzhi bcas dngos grub tshogs// 'byung ba lnga yi khams rnams la// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas gdab// bar skabs khrus kyi dus rtag tu// dri bcas chu rgyun byin brlabs pas 
183a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang 'gro la sogs pa yi// phyi nang gsum gyis gnas gsum sbyang // oMnAmA/ sarba ta thA ge tA ma hA sa ma ya shrI hU~M/ byang chub sems dpa' snad gnas la// chargan bzeng po yini gnod/ 
183a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas brgya rtsa brgyad du 'bral// khrus gsol zug rngus la bar byed// oM dza~M b+ha la dza len+ta ye swAt+ma/ skar yang bris kyi dus dag dra// thob mar byin brlabs dkon mchog mchod// spang ma 
183a8(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen mnyes byas nas// lhag mas 'byung po chemi par bya// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM// Id+ya nut+pa nA tAta/ oM aHhUM phaT swA hA/ thams cad thugs rje'i mes bsregs nas/ 
183b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis dag par byed// A~M las 'dod lnga'i yon tan sogs// rgya chen na mkha'i khams su sprul// dbyer med lha yi rgyal gyis// gnas rnams kun tu longs spyod bya// rtagatubs pa 
183b2(rgyud 'grel): gtan la gnas pas// zab pa rgya mtsho'i mdag dan cing // sems can rgan gyid ni gyur pa'i// phyogs rnams mthun par 'thabar s+ho// lus dag sums kyi thu ba can// dam thos the pa bam 
183b3(rgyud 'grel): nams chags// phyogs thams cad nas brlab par bya ba'i tshig ste gnyis pa'o// // dga' chen dpal gyi dzardzalas// rdo rje sems dpa'i stong gnyis bcing // ting 'dzin sngags kyis bskum 
183b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mthus// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun gshegs 'byur// byin dbyugs rgya snang ba yi// gdag pa thams cad ni byed pa// rang bzhin sa gsung blugs kyi bdag/ bye parlabs ma 
183b5(rgyud 'grel): bas bsnyen par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs pa ya~M// gad na 'dzam bka' ba zos bzo mdzad cing // bang chad bgegs kun pa zhos pa'i tshogs// rang gi gnas nas rnam par spro 
183b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'khor lo rol gri dang // brtson ci gsum la sogs kyi// phyug rgya sngags la nam 'phrul pas// thams cad 'jig cing 'thor bar byed// rang gi gnas gzung brtan pa'i phyir// ngang nyid rdo 
183b7(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka'i// gnas kun mtshan ma bzang pos brgyan// shin tu 'phro ba'i sems kun gyis// phyogs bcu sprul pa'i 'khor lo brjod// 'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo ches// phyogs kun bgegs 
183b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams gzir byas te// phyag rgya bzhis btab gnas su dgod// nyi ma la gnas zo tshogs bsgom// grangs med sprul pa'i tshogs ldan pas// phyogs bcu'i mtha' rnams gtams 
184a1(rgyud 'grel): byas te// mi ri 'bar ba'i mtshon char bcas// phyogs rnams byams pa'i lta ba yis// snying rje chen po'i gnas kun gsal// 'di las lhag pa'i bsrung ba'i mchog/ gnyis
184a2(rgyud 'grel): med stong pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes lnga yi 'od 'bar ba// zab mo'i sngags kyis mtshams byas pa'o// phyogs gzhan khro tshogs bsrung ba'i phyir// rdo rje la sogs mtshon cha dang // nyungs kar 
184a3(rgyud 'grel): thal ba dri yi chu// legs sbyangs byin brlabs rigs kyi lha// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rab 'bar bas// de dag mthar phyin sel bar byed// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i// don kun mchog tu gsang 
184a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas// ngang nyid ngo bo ma bcos dbyings// chos kyi rgyun gyi ting 'dzin gsal// phyogs rnams sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dngos byung rdo rje sems dpa' che// ma chags g.yo ba'i dkyil 
184a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi// gnas kyi mtshan ma kun las 'phags// dkar dmar zhal phyag bzhi bzhis mdzes// g.yas sngog yon dmar rgyab ser ba'o// dang po ba dan gsum pa yi// phyag rgya rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// 
184a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa rin chen mda' gsor zhing // g.yon gyi dang po kha T+wAM nyid// rgya gram ba dan dril bu'i sgra// gnyis pa rin chen sna lnga'i gzhu// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes// las bzhir gzigs pa'i
184a7(rgyud 'grel): spyan ldan pa// 'od gsal rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs// rin chen phreng bas rgya rnams spras// sku stod dar dkar gser ris la// sku smad tshig gu'i na bza' nyid// spyi bor zla dkyil skur ldan par// 
184a8(rgyud 'grel): sku yi dkyil 'khor de nyid sngags// mgrin pa'i pad ma gsungs ldan par// gsung gi dkyil 'khor de nyid sngags// thugs ka'i nyi ma'i thugs ldan par// ye shes dkyil 'khor rten gsal ba'i// 
184b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi dkyil 'khor phreng ba'i tshul// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rnams// rang gi gnas kun gzhug par bya// byin brlabs shes pas ye shes lha// rang rig tshul bzhin spyan drangs te/ 
184b2(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la gzhag nas// phyag 'tshal mchod pas mnyes par bya// rdo rjes phyag rgya rnam par bzhis// rang gi gnas kun brtan byas la// byin brlabs 'dod don gsol gdab cing 
184b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod mnyes pa'i rol mos mchod// dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya yis// mdun nas sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la// sngags kyi phreng ba 'khor lo'i tshul// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i ngo bor brtag
184b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam kun tu ma nyams blos// dkyil 'khor gnyis med tshul bsgom zhing // byas pa'i tshogs gnyis rgyur shes pas// rang gi byin rlabs brtan par bya// ji srid kha zas dus kun dang // bya ba'i 
184b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul gzhan de bzhin nyid// 'dri klog kha don la sogs pa'i// don kun sngo ba rgya chen tshogs// rang gi dbang po gnas las byung // de dag rol pa'i tshul rgyun bcas// ma nyams dus kun snang byed pas// 
184b6(rgyud 'grel): de mtha'i chags pa grol bar 'gyur// de ltar dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'i// tshul rnams gang dag bshad pa yang // las su bye bas 'jug pa ste// mi gnas gsal bar goms pa nyid// gdul bya'i rgyad
184b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams spangs pa'i phyir// sngon 'byung sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi ni// rigs kyi 'khor lo gang nas 'jug/ de dag bsdus dang rgya chen tshogs// byin brlabs gsal bas brtan byas pa'i
184b8(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i don kun rdzogs par gnas// bsnyen sgrub yan lag rjes mthun pa'i// phyag rgya'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dag/ de dag mtshan ma med pa'i gnas// rol pa'i byin rlabs che las 'byung // 
185a1(rgyud 'grel): seMd ci smra // tshul snad / dgas pa bar byud// da shA sma gyu bas/ kun rgya cad// di na sa// thas 
185a2(rgyud 'grel): sa sa ny-id na/ shegs byur 'ad pa dus// de dag dngas kun rnaMs bral ba// dkyil 'khang gA sa med srung da // byi bsgrubs mjug na rnam par 
185a3(rgyud 'grel): sminas dgags pa pa'i mthas// byang chub sems su sna pa das// surnams kun gyi ma sa// spyod pa yongs su dran par 'i 'byung byis par chadags pa pa chags sku 
185a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyud 'dadus/ na gas sas pa // 
185a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang // yam gnas kyil ba snam// du ba sa rtAs na smra sa / sa kyis sa dang nas m+b+ha/ nga bad// sngags rnams kun rgyas 
185a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin 'pho 'dugs la rdzogs pa'i// brgya sna nI yi bzlas brjod \u0f7f// gang dag bsrung bar 'dang bral// ga la 'ams dri ras gsum du shes// b+hags mtshams ma tsha sa 
185a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung babyer gyi yin// nga mnas ma'i spang ldan pas// rdzus 'i dbyungs te// sru pa cang bye parlabs nas// kyil la ba rgyad pa la banas cing/ 
185b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun sngags pas par// nam gnas// sna dang rnas pa// sa pa/ pas/ man // A/ rgyu 
185b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis bskyod// rnam pazhin nang nams gnas// mun ngas rnams pa'i brdul bzums ldan// byug rgya gas chags snatshogs pa// ra tshul bstsagazhan dkrigacing // bzang ba zlas

185b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi gas pa ba \u0f7f// thAg+sas thags kyi rdzoms// shA sngags mnamam gas 'jams shid// nAs mas rlu byams shA /

185b8(rgyud 'grel): la/ gas pa gnas su spang bar byed// den byen phyag rgya 'di mas ni// 'jugan sa thams cad bsrung bar 'gyung // mas dngangs ye shes bya gargyalas/ 'a ba 
186a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang // rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ldan pas// phyogs bcu legs par 'khor lo'i tshul// bla 'og dag tu byin brlab cing // dkyil 'khor/ 
186a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus dang rgyas pa yis// thams cad bsrung ba bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyar ba las// zhe sdang la sogs 'joms byed pa'i// drag po chen po'i skur sbyor zhing // bsdus dang rgyas pa'i 
186a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen// phyag rgya rdo rje'i tshogs spro zhing // rang gi sngags dang rnal 'byor pas// brtan g.yo thams cad bsrung bar byed// de bzhin tshar gcod rangs pa 'grub// sangs rgyas 
186a4(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi rnam 'phrul ba// sbyor ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// bsdus dang rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// gsang sngags phyag rgya bsam gtan las// sna tshogs pad+ma la brten bya// 
186a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i tshogs kun kha 'byed pas// sgrib pa'i las kun rnam grol zhing // thams cad dag pa'i las la sbyor// sems dpa' chen po'i cha lugs kyis// sems dang ngo bo la gnas bya// 
186a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid la snang ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ldan// rin chen tshogs 'bar brjid pa'i gnas// 'bar ba'i lta ba'i tshul bzhugs pa// rdo rje rab tu drag po'i me// rab 'jigs 
186a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba mi bzad 'grub// gang dag rgyas pa'i tshul sbyor zhing // las rnams dngos grub skyed byed pas// dkyil 'khor bsdus dang rgyas pa'i tshul// gnas rnams kun tu 'gros pa'o// 
186a8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dag pa'i las la sbyar// mi gnyis ting 'dzin brtan pa'i mthus// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba// las kyi phrin las kun gyis bdag/ so so'i phyag rgya sngags kyis 
186b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor// ji ltar phran las grub pa yis// oM TuM rdo rje khu tshur gnyis// go cha bgos pa'i tshul du bya// gnas lngar rang gi sngags dang rgyas// nyis 'gyur dag tu bcings nas kyang // sangs rgyas 
186b2(rgyud 'grel): gtsug gi nor bu dag/ dar dpyangs 'gying dang bcas pas dgrol// thal mo brdabs pas brtan byed pa// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// phyi nang gdul dka' drag po'i tshegs// 'di dag mthu yis
186b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par 'gyur// thams cad kun gyis srung byed pa'i// bla na med pa'i go cha mchog/ bsod nams ye shes las brgyad stobs// mthu yis thams cad 'jigs 'gyur ba// don kun gsang
186b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags ting 'dzin gnas las skyes// rdo rje sems dpa'i tingange 'dzin gyis// chos sems rtse gcig gnas pa yi// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// zhi ba'i lta bas bltas nas
186b5(rgyud 'grel): ni// phyogs kyi rigs kun g.yo 'gyur zhing // rigs dug gdon rnams sel byed 'gyur// 'di dag bsam gtan gyis 'grub pa// bsam gtan goms pa'i stobs kyis ni// dang po las kyi sbyor 
186b6(rgyud 'grel): byed na// phyag rgya sngags kyi mthu ldan pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mthe chung lcags kyu rtse mos mnan// bsam gtan sngags kyi gnas rdzogs 'gyur// rtse gcig lha yi ting 'dzin gyi// 
186b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag/ mi mthun gnas kun lta ba'i tshul// rdo rje bsdam pa bstan byas pa'i// mdzub mo ban tshun skam pa'i tshul// nad dang zug rngu ma lus kun// 'dren byed phyag 
186b8(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i gtso bo mchog/ rtag tu rang gi ting 'dzin gnas// byams dang snying rje lta bar ldan// grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcings nas// mig gsal phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// shes rab ye shes mig 
187a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed cing // long ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// rigs kyi sbyor ba mngon ldan par// phyag rgya'i yan lag brtan byas pas// glad pa'i nad rnams kun bsdus te// kha phyogs drang zhing
187a2(rgyud 'grel): btung bar bya// rtse gcig bstan pas yang dang yang // rdo rje khu tshur dpal sbyor bas// nad kyi zug rngun sogs kun// gang la dmigs pa sel bar 'gyur// de dag kun gyi gsang sngags 'di// 
187a3(rgyud 'grel): don bzhin brtson pas rnal grags// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma sta ma sid+d+ha ho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya che// don kun rnam par 'phrul byed pas// lag g.yas sems dpa'i gtsug tor bcing / 
187a4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa nad med bde ba'i mchog/ 'od 'bar pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi byang chub sems dbab ste// lag g.yas klu yig dengs ka bya// 'bar ba'i tshul ston 'bebs par bcas/ 
187a5(rgyud 'grel): mi mthun gnas rnams dug rgyas btab// thams cad sel ba'i las byed pa'o// bde gshegs sku ni rigs chen pos// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mngon sbyar te// bsrung ba sngags kyi rgyud ldan
187a6(rgyud 'grel): dag/ dga' ba'i rgyud kyis grol bar 'gyur// drag pa che mchog sbyor ba yis// mdzes pa'i phyag rgya smin mtshams bzhag/ ru lu'i sngags kyi don sbyar bas// mkha'agro'i las kun 'grub par
187a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// 'gro gzhon dud 'gro phra mo sogs// thams cad rigs kyis sbyangs byas te// rten dang sbyor pa rnams tshogs dang // sngags bcas bas mo gtan rtse gcig mthus// de dag nad med bde ba 
187a8(rgyud 'grel): dang // gzi byin mthu rtsa la phun sum tshogs// me tog 'bras bu skye shing rnams// rten 'brel cho ga ji lta bar// phyag rgya sngags kyi sbyor byas shing // rigs pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed pa yis// 
187b1(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad bcud rdzogs te// rtag tu gzi mdangs rgyas par 'gyur// pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha'i phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams rang gi mtshan nyid rdzogs// 
187b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs bya ste// khro bo brjid pa'i stobs ldan pas// mi mthun gnas kun gzhom pa'i phyir// ji srid brtan par ma gyur par// de srid bsgom bzlas rtse gcig tu// khro bo'i// 
187b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kun legs gzhug cing // 'phro 'du yang yang don spyod pa// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon sbyor mthus// sde dpung 'joms pa'i stobs rdzogs 'gyur// de dag dkyil 'khor ji lta bur// 
187b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag brtan pas sngags rnams dang // phyag rgya'i stobs bskyed sbyor byas nas// mtshon cha so so'i tshul bzhin du// 'debs shing 'phangs pa drag po'i tshogs// tshar bcad bsgral zhing 
187b5(rgyud 'grel): brlags par 'gyur// mi gnyis ye shes che sbyor ba'i// zab cing rgya che dkyil 'khor nyid// thog mtha'i yul las 'das pa'i dngos// dpal mchog dang po'i mtshan nyid can// nyon mongs drag/ 
187b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i gnas tshogs bskyed// don kun 'joms byed thams cad sku// cha lugs ji bzhin gsal ldan pa// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug nas// rnam par spros pa'i las rnams kun// 
187b7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sder bcas mnon pa'i tshul// rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang // bskum nas 'degs pa'i stabs dag ni// phrin las bzhi yi sbyar bas te// phyag rgya bsam gtan sngags bcas pas//

188a1(rgyud 'grel): po lnga rnams dang // de rgyu nyon mongs drug lnga'i tshogs// yul bcas rnam par dag pa'i mthus// thams cad gnyis med sangs rgyas su// yon tan phrin las rol pa'i stabs// rigs kyi dkyil 
188a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po rnams// yongs bkug dbang du bsdu bya ste// bsam gtan sngags dang phyag rgya man na// rang bzhin gcig pa'i btsun po rnams// dga' zhing longs spyod dgyes pas spyad// 'di dag zag med 
188a3(rgyud 'grel): mthu ldan pas// gnyis med 'bras bu chen por spyor// ji snyed rgyu dang las kyi chos// so so'i theg pa gzhung bzhin du// byang chub pha rol phyin pa dang // grub dang gzung dang mdangs rnams dang // 
188a4(rgyud 'grel): rishes dang phyag rgya'i khyad par kun// so so'i las kun spyod cing ginod// rgyu 'bras gnyis su bde ba'i tshul// so so'i mthu yis sbyor byed cing // rnam pa'i deni kun las rnams sbrel// bsod nam/

188a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu rdzogs pa// dregs byed lha rnams dbang mdzad de// rigs kun dkyil 'khor cha lugs kyis// bya ni brlabs gsang ba lha mo dag/ rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus// 'jig rten gsum/ 
188a7(rgyud 'grel): tshigs rnam bkug cing // mthu rtsa la rdzu 'phrul 'brog bya ste// 'da' ba med par las bzhin dgug/ rigs kun phrin las rnam pa'i stobs// dregs byed ster bcas mnan byas te// chung ma rgyan 
188a8(rgyud 'grel): tshogs yo byad rnams// mthu yis dbrog cing longs spyod do// de bzhir 'jig rten gsum dag gi/ mthu chen sde brgyad dbang ldan sogs// phyogs skyong bcu po la sogs rnams// 
188b1(rgyud 'grel): yud tsam zhig gis 'dir bkug ste// gang gi rten la sbyor bstims nas// sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang du byed// ma lus 'jig rten kun grags pa'i// zhi dang rgyas sogs las rnams kun 
188b2(rgyud 'grel): de dag rnams 'byor mthu sbyor bas// 'bad pa medo par 'grub par 'gyur// las kun dngos grub tshogs shes pas// bdag gzhan don kun spyad pa'i rnams// mi 'jigs gnas 
188b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum theg pa dang // rten 'brel gsang bas kun bstan pa'o// de ltar dgug dang dbye ba dang // bsod dang skrod dang rengs pa dang // rmugs pa la sogs las rnams kun// 'di nyid 
188b4(rgyud 'grel): mthu yis grub par 'gyur// so so'i ting 'dzin sngags bcas pas// rten cing 'brel pas spyad byas te// don kun gsang ba sa sna tshogs pa'i// tshul rnams sna tshogs brjod pa bzhin// bsod 
188b5(rgyud 'grel): nams ye shes tshogs kun gyi// thun mong cho ga bzhin gyur pa'i// yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo dag/ byin rlabs tshogs bskyed brtsam par bya// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bsnyen rdzogs sgrub 
188b6(rgyud 'grel): pa tshul bzhin du// rten cing dkyil 'khor la sbyor bas// de dag gsang sngags brjod pa gdon// thog mar 'khor lo tshul bzhin du// rtsigs brgyad bcu drug mu khyud gnyis// A li kA li mnyan byas
188b7(rgyud 'grel): te// shar gyi gnas su sbyor bar bya// 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi rnams la// yi ge gsang sngags rdzogs par dgod// drag dal ring thung tshul bzhin du// g.yas g.yon phreng ba thabs shes rgya// 
188b8(rgyud 'grel): oM AHhUM shrI de ba te badz+ra satwa s+t+waM tra na mo swa tu sti/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gI nI na hUM hUM swA hA// rig sngags phre ngabs bsgyur byas pa'i// 'khor los gan sa kun dag par 'gyur// 'di nas dam tshig 
189a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rnams// gsal bar bskyed cing brtan byas nas// ye shes lha dang gnyis med par// phyag rgya ba ni yis rgyas btab cing // mchod bstod lhag gnas chog rdzogs/ 
189a2(rgyud 'grel): dus kun tshogs bsags dngos grub pa ni// 'jug pa po rnams phrin las sna tshogs 'grub pa'i cho ga sde bzhi pa'o// // de nas dngos grub bzang po ni// bdag gzhan kun la phan phyir du

194b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes phyag brgyas brtag par bya// rgyal po 'am yul gyi bdag bol// bslang ngam rim gyis nyo bar bya// bar chad med pa'i sa dbus su// rang rig lha yi sbyor ldan pas// rgyan bcas so// 
194b2(rgyud 'grel): so'i skyil krung gis// 'gying zhing nga rgyal gnas byas nas// sa gzhi lha tshogs srung ma la// mchod sbyin gtor ma dbul bar bya// khyad par las kyi bdag po dang // snying rje lan chags gyur pa dag 
194b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus dgug cing tshim byas nas// bsgo zhing 'tshe ba rin gyis brdzang // dri yi chu yis legs gtong zhing // spyod pa bzhi pa legs gnas pas// bdud rtsi'i rdzas kyis sbyang bya zhing // yi ge gsum 
194b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis dag par bya// lho phye'i rim pa shes byas la// dngos grub rab 'bring gsum don du// mgrin lho bus mo man chad de// gnas gzhan spang par bya ba yin// rus pa gas ga ma gyo mo dang // sal pa 
194b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rgan sa ro bsal// sa gnyan 'jam zhi de snam sres te// dri yi chus gdab dgang zhir bcag/ dkyil 'khor gnas kyi tshad mnyam bya// sor bzhi khru gang lus byed tshad// brkos pa'i tshad mnyam 
194b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phang du bstod// rin chen dri sbyor snying por gzhug/ chos nyid dag pa'i sngags brjod pa'i// dri yi chu yis legs byugs par// sna tshogs mchod gtor nyer sbyar nas// rnal 'byor grogs bzhi dang
194b7(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas// rang rig gtso 'khor lnga bsgoms te// sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bya// oM bruM ga ga na khaM AHhUM/ nam mkha' dag pa'i rang bzhin las// 'byung ba rim rtse ga ri rab ste// rdo rje sa gzhir 
194b8(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // bla re gur bcas 'od 'phro ba'o// rdo rje gtams pa bgyi byas te// rang gi gnas su bzhag par bya// oM mi di ni badz+ri b+ha ba badz+ra bad+d+ha hUM/ thal mo sa la lan gsum du// lha mo rgyan 
195a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun gyis mdzes// mdog gser bum pa'i mtshan ma can// lus phyed sa la gtan byas te// mdun na bka' nyan tshul gnas la// mchod gtor zhabs bsil sogs dbul 
195a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing // ji srid las rdzogs rnams kyi bar// de srid dbang por gsol ba gdab// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sbyor ba'i tshul dang khyad par gyi// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod
195a3(rgyud 'grel): ni dbang du shog/ skyob pa shAkya song gi yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag kyang bdud las ni// rgyal bar bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri// lan gsum gsol ba btab byas nas// 
195a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bgyes pas mdangs byung ste// slob dpon chen po'i dkyil 'khor mdzod// dga' ba chen pos las bsgrubs shing // bcu gnyis rgyun gyi mdzes byas pa'i// rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis/ 
195a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bdag por gnas pa la// phyogs bzhi'i lha mo bstod cing bskul// oM byams chen nam mkha'i rigs sbyor ba// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal 'jig pa'i gnas// rnam 'byed gsal ba'i chos
195a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog can// yang dag ye shes spyod pas grol// a la la la la ho// oM thugs rje'i gnas mchog dag pa'i dngos// mnyam nyid chos kun 'byung ba'i gzhi// yon tan rin chen mchog ston pa'i/ 
195a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phrul chos las rab tu grol// a la la la lA ho// oM dga' ba'i pad+mos mtshan ldan pa// kun rtog dngos gsal chags pa med// rdo rje gsang gsum sngags 'don pa'i// brjod 'byung 
195a8(rgyud 'grel): tshig las 'das pa'o// a la la la lpa ho// oM btang snyoms gnas ngan dra ba sel// phrin las bdag po stob dang ldan// bya ba'i ye shes mthar mdzad cing // 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor 
195b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan du gsol// a la la la la ho// oM sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gtso// sdig pa thams cad las grol zhing // bsod nams dngos grub 
195b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grub pa yi// rgyal bkun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ mthong dga' mthong ba grol byed pa// lam mchog gsang ba chen po'i tshogs// bdag nyid chen pos bstan du gsol// a la la la la to// 
195b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba'i bdag/ sna tshogs rta mchog rol pa'i sku// 'jigs pa'i cha lugs mtshon cha 'bar// ma lus kun la bka' bsgo zhing // mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa yis// 
195b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i blta bas gar byas nas// rab tu myur bar g.yo mdzad cing // dgug gzhug spros pas rol pa'i tshogs// ma ta a yi 'phro 'du yi// rdo rje me 'od rlung sogs kyis// bshig gtor 
195b5(rgyud 'grel): ra ba sa gzhir bcas// bskor zhing bskor ba'i rnam par gnas// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril 'khrol zhing // sum+b+ha ni yi sngags brjod de// khro tshogs rang gi gzugs 'dzin cing // mtshon cha 'bar ba rnams 
195b6(rgyud 'grel): spros pa'o// hAM lba klu gnod sbyin 'byung po dang // dri za srin po sha za'i tshogs// gshin rje ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gnod sbyini drag po ma lus rnams// gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa/ 
195b7(rgyud 'grel): srung byed sa yi bdag po'i bka'// thos pa tsam gyis myur du dengs// nga yi bka' la 'da' ma byed// gar zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che// rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM gas// thal ba'i tshogs bzhin bshig par 
195b8(rgyud 'grel): byed// rab 'bar khro bo'i gnas 'joms pa'i// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// gang dang gang gis bdag tshig bcag/ 'dod gsum skyes rnams dgas bya ste// 'jig par 'gyur phyir gzhan 
196a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis med// sal yongs su skor byas te// bgegs med bya phyir phur pas gdab// oM g+ha g+ha// g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra/ 
196a2(rgyud 'grel): kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ k+Sha ya bAk+tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ gsum brjod dbang ldan mtshams dag nas// thugs non sngags bcas lan gsum bskor// rgung pa bskyod nas lag pa 
196a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod// cung zad ngo mtshar zur mig tshul// rab dga' 'brang bas smin ma 'degs// g.yas 'dren g.yon 'dren mig gi bar// brla rgyas nu ma 'gying ba dang // kha yi pad+ma 'dzum bcas pa/ 
196a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar mche ba gnyer ba dang // so yi phreng zlum ljags bsgyur zhing // rta mchog rol pa'i gar thabs kyis// khams gsum 'dul ba rmad du byung // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ gar sogs/ 
196a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phrul bsam yas kyis// drag po'i tshogs 'joms gnas sbyor zhing // rang gi las gnas bsrung bar bya// ba yi rnam lnga dri bsres pa'i// bdud rtsi rdzas sogs kyis byugs kyis// lha gnas/ 
196a6(rgyud 'grel): dri yi thig le la// me tog sngags dang bcas pa 'gram// mchod pa'i rnam grangs legs brjod nas// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsam par bya// bzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 
196a7(rgyud 'grel): gang rung bsgom// ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing // mdun gyi dkyil 'khor nyes par bya// so so'i bstod pa sgra snyan tshul// rigs drug dkyil 'khor so so'i dbyangs// pus mo sa
196a8(rgyud 'grel): la gtsug byas nas// g.yas pas spos snod bteg byas te// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i lha rnams la// tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya// thugs rje chen po bcom ldan 'das// 
196b1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus sems can don mdzad pa'i// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sras dang bcas// stabs mchog rgya chen rnams la bstod// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// rigs bdag che ge'i dkyil 
196b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni// mgon gyur las rnams 'grub pa'i phyir// rdo rje gsang ba bdag gis bris// brtse bas slob ma rnams phyir dang // bdag nyid rnams la mchod po'i phyir// bcom ldan khyod la bdag 
196b3(rgyud 'grel): gus te// dgyes mdzad 'ongs par gyur pa las// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bya ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyir// 'bras gnas byang chub sems tshogs dang // gsang sngags
196b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i lha nyid dang // 'byung tshogs 'jig rten skyong ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rjes dga' ba// bstan la gnas pa'i phreng ba dang // legs sbyar mchod pas mnyes pa dag/ dbang por 
196b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bzhugs su gsal// bu khyod tshul ldan snod yin pas// theg chen gsang ba'i gzhung 'di nyon// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// rdzogs sangs 
196b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas tshogs 'das rnams dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'grol phan phyir gnas bzhugs pa// de kun gsang sngags zab mo yi// cho ga bzang po 'di 
196b7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs nas// skye mchog rang gi gnas nyid du// thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pa// bcom ldan che ge'i dkyil 'khor gyis// bdud tshogs shin tu mi// 
196b8(rgyud 'grel): bzad pa'i// dpung chen mtha' dag rnam bcom pas// de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes phyir// bu yis blo gros 'odi gyis shig/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// 
197a1(rgyud 'grel): nam 'byu ma thogs sngags sa na/ ma las bzugs pa'i bdag nyid rnams / khan la skyabs su pa rgyas/ dpa'atha pa' ba 'byung banas dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyi / 
197a2(rgyud 'grel): byu pad+ma d+ma yang skyebo dpon m+b+ha// byed par du yang 'grobar kyi// pha lus phyogs nab rmugs pa yis// dkyil 'atsang ba dad+ma la ny-id sa sngags la// bdag gis dus 'di nas gzung ste// ji srid 
197a3(rgyud 'grel): snyi kyang chub par// rnamatshangs spyo gnyis med pang / khyang gnyis rlom rnam sa bzung // zlab sa sbyang dang dngas pa na yas// dbang pa yang ladun pa nod de// bas der ma mchags 
197a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog rgya chen po// yan lag bcu bzhis dag par bya// dkon mchog gsuMm la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mo tshag gsum po bzung bar bya// bdag gi sdig pa bgyis pa dang // btsun la rjes su 
197a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bya// mgon pa'i spyan sngang mchis nus sa// de dag thams cad bshags par ba// rgyal bgrus sa rnags rnams dang // rang rgyal dgrab la 'tharnams kyi// bskam bzlas la ma 
197a6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams la// dang bas rab tu yi dang ngo // sems bskyed mngon par sangs rgyas dang // chos kyi 'khor lo ba skor bskyed cing // tshigs sna byang chub sems dpa' la// bdag ni sus 
197a7(rgyud 'grel): pa skyabs su mchis// sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ji lta bang // sal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yas// thugs mchog byang chub tu rten po// 'arbab rgya chen don lta dmigs/ 
197a8(rgyud 'grel): mgon rnams bdag la dgongs su gas la// malus phyogs pa gas dkyil 'dzor rnams// dus 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas par// tha ba rgya che dang bas gzigs// ji skar dus gsum 
197b1(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// tshul khrims kyi ni brlab 
197b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan par bzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon / 
197b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum// deng nas brtsams te gzung nas ni// nam du yang ni mi spang ngo // rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi// rdo rje dral bu'i phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ 
197b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bya// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re bzhin du lan drug/ sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu spyan// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ 
197b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos ni bzung bar bya// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang bdag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i// 
197b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // bdag gi sdom pa ma lus bzung // ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi// ma brgal ba rnams bdag gis bsgral/ 
197b7(rgyud 'grel): dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // thams cad mya ngan 'das la dgod// dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten sangs rgyas myur grub nas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor
197b8(rgyud 'grel): bying ba rnams// bla med byang chub dgod par bgyi// gnas gsum mtshan ma'i yi ger bcas// rdo rje sngags bcas dri yi byugs// mgo bor me tog mdun du spos// mar me dris byuH 
198a1(rgyud 'grel): snying ga ru// u dum+ba ra la sogs shing // drang po gas med 'bu rjes bral// sor tshad bcu gnyis dri yis byug/ rtse mo me tog bcas pa la// rigs sngags mang du bzlas byas te// 
198a2(rgyud 'grel): dben pa bdar nas byin pa dang // me tog la sogs byin byas la// bya ba'i bye brag rim bzhin bstan// shAr phyogs kha bltas mi smra bar// bca' zhing so rtse'i skyon bsal nas// lcibs sa gzhi 
198a3(rgyud 'grel): bgo tsam// rnam lngas maN+Dal byas pa ru// phan tshun dag tu mi lta zhing // drang po'i mdun du tshems shing dor// de tshe mtshan me'i bye brag ni// rtse mo bdag la bstan pa dang // rtse mo gyen du phyogs 
198a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur na// mchog gi dngos grub mtshan ma yin// gzhan du ba bstan dngos grub 'bring // mtshams dang byang du bltas pa dang // 'jig rten pa yi las 'grub 'gyur// rtse mo thung ngu bstan pas ni// 
198a5(rgyud 'grel): su 'og dngos grub nges par 'gyur// phyogs bzhi'i rtse mo bye brag gis// las bzhi'i mtshan ma shes par bya// dri chab byin brlabs sngags ldan pa'i// 'thor thung khyor gsum kha bshal bya// 
198a6(rgyud 'grel): oM hrI bi shud+d+ha sarba d+har+m+ma pA pa ni nAM sh+ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sarba bi kalpa a pa nA ya hUM/ yi ge sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i// ku sha sngags dang stan du sbyin// hUM AHau/ a hi a/ hriHa tAM 
198a7(rgyud 'grel): a haM a/ sarba ru ta te ku ru ku ru swa hA/ rang sngags yi ge gsum bzlas pa'i// srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa// ku sha gsum 'gyur s+pho phra'i tshad// dpung par bsrung ba'i don phyir bcing / 
198a8(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyen 'jig rten khams 'byung ba// u dum+bA ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam na ni res dga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung srid// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ 
198b1(rgyud 'grel): de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gis sems can dpag med don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed nus pa'o// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// gang gis sdig pa spyod byas pa'ang // dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra 
198b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas ni// de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// mnyam par 'gyur ba gzhan gang yod// tshe 'di nyid la sngags bzlas pas// bla med gnas su 'gro 
198b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te// sdug bsngal kun 'byung nyams thag pa'i// ngan 'gro'i gnas ngan spong bar 'gyur// des na spyod mchog las 'di la// blo gros shin tu brtan pas na// de ring khyod ni rnyed pa mchog// 
198b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur// gang gi rgyal ba thams cad ni// sras bcas rnams kyis bstan pa ni// blo mchog ldan pas yongs bzung ste// gnas ni bdag nyid chen po la/ 
198b5(rgyud 'grel): theg chen gsang ba'i gnas dag tu// des de 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// theg chen gsang ba cher 'byung bas// khyod ni 'gro bar 'gyur bas na// de bzhin 
198b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sta gon gnas mchog de nyid du// mchod dbul gtong ma btang byas te// ku sha'i sngas stan legs pa la// mi sma dge ba'i sems bcas kyis// seng ge'i 
198b7(rgyud 'grel): nyal stabs legs pa yi// rmi lam mtshan ma brtag par bya// slob dpon nang du bzhugs mnyam bzhag/ dkyil 'khor mchod cing bstod par bya// mthar mtshan ma bzang mthong na// yi rang
198b8(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rab 'bring bstan// ngan pa'i ltas dag sbyin sreg dang // gtor ma sngags dang phyag rgyas bzlog/ ba yi rnam lnga dri bsres chu// sngags kyis sbyangs pas dag par bya// mkha'

199b7(rgyud 'grel): oM a n+yon+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA/ pA rA s+pha ra a nug ta sarba d+harmA/ a \u0f7fn+ta a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA hUM/ grogs mchog rdo rje phyag rgya yis// dza gsum lte ba'i gnas su 'dren/ 
199b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khu tshur sar bzhag cing // dang po'i thig skud gdab par bya// shar nub lho byang thag bzhi yis// logs dang mtshams su gdab par bya// dang po che chen bcu drug las/ 
200a1(rgyud 'grel): khyams kyi snam bu ma gtogs pa// cha bran bzhir bzhir dgod byas pa// phyi nas bcu drug rta bab bsgo// rtsag pa brgyan banas g.yon pa nas// ra ba dur 
200a2(rgyud 'grel): khrod ci rigs brtag/ dbu ma rang gi rigs 'khor lo// dkyil 'khor so so'i cha bzhin pa'o// thig gdab cho ga rdzogs byas nas// ye shes skud pa mchod bstod cing / 
200a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i ting 'jani gsang sngags kyis// rang gi gnas su gshegs su gsol// rigs kyi nga rgyal sbyor ldan pas// mig gnyis nyi zla'i blta ba ya si// hi bcas 
200a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo dang cha rnams dbye// oM badz+ra be ka a kra ma hUM/ oM thams cad rnam 'phrul rang bzhin mchog/ dngos med zhi ba'i 'od ldan gsal// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gter chen 'byin// 
200a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dag par byin gyis rlabs// mnyam pa'i sngags blo rnams gsal bas// nyes pa'i zug rngu dag par 'gyur// dAkya li 'khor thig gdab shes rab can/ 
200a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid 'grub ca // shar nub byang gi phyogs rnams su// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar// rab tu brtag
200a7(rgyud 'grel): pas su zhig nus// rang gi lha'i rang bzhin gyis// dkyil 'khor brtag par 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// 
200a8(rgyud 'grel): cho ga lhag gam ma chad na'ang // nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// tshad ldan rnam par phyed pa la// rnam 'khor phreng ba'i ra bas mdzes// rta babs 
200b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyis rnams spras shing // bar byams cha chen gcig gi tshad// ka ba mchog brgyad gdung rnams la// so so'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas brgyan// rin chen rdor sogs tog ger bcas/ 
200b2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ngo // kun tu sna tshogs 'khor lo can// kun tu sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi/ 
200b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can gyi zla kham bzhin// pad+ma dbang gi pad+mo'i dbyibs// ra ni chen mchog gi ran chen dbya bas// ji ltar 'dod pa ci 'byor pa// ji lta'i dus dang ci bde bar// dkyil 
200b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor kun tu gnas pa dpal// rta mchog phyag rgya rdo rje'o// rani rten lnga sogs phye ma rnams// snong mdzes legs par thugs byas te// cho ga gsum gyis rigs kyi lha/ 
200b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan mig 'bar bas dgug byas te// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis med gzhugs// mchod bstod rang gi gnas nas dbye// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM// dkar po mthang 
200b6(rgyud 'grel): kha dmar ser ljang // rigs drug so so'i dbye ba yis// pany+tsa rang gi go ramis bzhin// byang shar mtshams nus brnams nas ni// hUM brjod rdor 'dzin g.yon gyis bris// 
200b7(rgyud 'grel): re khA ma yo ma 'dres par// mchod dbu la thod pas bkab nas ni// bden pa brjod cing blta bar bya// 'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag/ sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed// 
200b8(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rgyal po che ge mo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// yang dag bden pa'i bya ni rlabs kyis// dkyil 'khor las rnams shes par mdzod// thig ni phyi nas 
201a1(rgyud 'grel): btab pa la// tshon rtsi nad nas dgyes par bya// dang po slob dpon gyis bri zhing // phyi nas ci bde shes pas bri// nyes pa kun las rnam grol bas// tshen gyi las ni yang dag
201a2(rgyud 'grel): brtsam// rtse gcig las su rung byas te// mtho zhing drang ba'i rgyan bcas pa'o// de khwa dma' bas mi 'grub cing // yon pos gdung ba skyed par byed// chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag/ 'chi 'am 
201a3(rgyud 'grel): na bar 'gyur ba yin// lhag chad las ni nad 'byung zhing // phyogs 'khrul rmongs pa'i las su 'gyur// pad+mo so so'i gdan dag lo// rigs kyi mtshan mas brgyan pa dang // kun tu sna tshogs
201a4(rgyud 'grel): bskal bzang po// rang 'byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog/ gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin te// skal bzang de bzhi ni skal
201a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bzang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// pad+ma rgya gram dpag med tshe'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa// lha mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan ma'i phyag

201a7(rgyud 'grel): mtho ba// rta mgrani ljang gu de bzhin no// phag gi mche ba grub pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhin te// ra ni chen sna tshogs snod ched du// sangs rgyas kun gyi ras yin// thams cad bdag nyid myong 
201a8(rgyud 'grel): skal bzang // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// gling bu dang ni pi waM dang // ku mu ta dang muny+dza ra// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // sna tshogs dri rnams de bzhin no// rami bzhin 
201b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po sngags bcas pas// rang rang mtshan ma sngags bcas dgod// mtshams bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhi// bdud rtsi lnga yi thod par bcas// rgyan bcas mchod pa ma lus pa// phyogs 
201b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams steng 'og gnas su dgod// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin du ni mkhar bsil dang // dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dag/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// 
201b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin lce'i phyag rgya dang // cha lang dang ni rnga yab dang // rdo rje dang ni rin chen sgron// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang // me long dang ni

203a1(rgyud 'grel): lo'i cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor rdzas bcas bsrung byas nas// sta gon na mkha' bteg pa rnams// rang gi gnas su ma nor dgod// gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig 
203a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsal badrang // ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs te// dkyil 'khor mnyes pa'i las rdzogs nas// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsal bgadab// rgyan bcas rdo rje dril thog 
203a3(rgyud 'grel): pas// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags bcas kyi// bkang zhing stang stabs sbyor ldan pas// dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor zhing bstod// dkyil 'khor sgrub pa shes byas shing // las 'grub par

205b1(rgyud 'grel): chas rol la phyag 'tshal lo// ma lus lha'i mchog skyong de la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' rtsal rdzogs bcu shugs la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a ti b+hu ho// a la la la la ho// oM dur khrod dang ni

205b3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par du// drag po nag po drag chen po// ma mo dang ni mnyam par gnas// nag po gcig pa 'jigs su rung // dga' las 'das dang log 'dren ma// gdol pa chen po lam pa kyi 
205b4(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug ma// g.yon ldan mar me 'jib byed ma// grong du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor chog/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'dzin 'jigs chen mo// mche ba gzugs ngan 'jigs pa nyid
