211a2(rgyud 'grel): dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te// nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnam btul nas// ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra 
211a3(rgyud 'grel): shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ grong khyer bA ra na ser drang srong mchog bzhugs nas// chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bstan pa yi bkra shis gang // lha yul 
211a4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung gyur pa// bkra shas des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal bzhon pa dang // 'grol bde ba bskyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa 
211a5(rgyud 'grel): dag/ nye bar son pa rgyal ba'i bkra shasi gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye rnams la 'i byed shog/ 'gro lnga pan bya mtho ris nas ni 'dri gshegs te// tshangs pa la sogs 
211a6(rgyud 'grel): lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs// sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 
211a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu nyer gshegs pa// man dA ra bA'i me tog mang pos mngon gtor ba// lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bskor ba'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams 
211a8(rgyud 'grel): la ni byid shog/ lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa// mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis 
211b1(rgyud 'grel): gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ rigs rdzogs slob ma'i don gyi phyir// bsrungs shing rgongs mkhrus byas te// dris byugs phreng thogs rgyan btags 
211b2(rgyud 'grel): shing // dri bzang snyan pa de'i gnas dag tu// bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga'i rim// brtan pa yan lag kun rdzogs pa'i// 'dod chags chen po las byung ba'i// 'khor lo de nyid 
211b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan bzhin// gang gis shes na slob ma rnams// gzhug byar gtso sogs rnam par shes// oM na mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings// 
211b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i rdo rje tshe rang bzhin// rigs mchog mgon po bdag grub mdzad// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ 
211b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod// 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa// 'dod chags chen po dag pa ste// bcom ldan de nyid kyis bsgrubs 
211b6(rgyud 'grel): shig/ 'dod chags dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba'i grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang ba kun gyi bdag/ byang chub mchog tu bdag bsgrubs shig/ dngos 
211b7(rgyud 'grel): grub chen po kun gyi rgyal// dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa// rdo rje can bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sems can kun yid khyab pa'o// sems can 
211b8(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi snying la gnas// sems can kun gyi yab nyid de// 'dod chags bral ba'i dam tshig mchog/ mchod pa'i gar tshogs glu bcas pa// dkyil 'khor mnyes pa'i bstod pa bya// 
212a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ bden pa'i byin brlabs chen po yis// mgon tshogs 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// 'dod pa thams cad skong byed shog 
212a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// gzung 'dzin rab spangs brjod du med// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba dag/ chos nyid de kho na nyid las byung // bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor ni 
212a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan gsal ba dri med gnas// sems can kun gyi mthong bar shog/ dbang bskur phyi nang gsang chen dang // gsang chen rim bzhin rgyud las skyes// sngon gyi bla ma dkyil 'khor 
212a4(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa de// sgo mtshams maN+Dal stegs byas te// slob ma sgo drung bum pas gsang // mchod pa'i sbyor ba rnams mang dang // lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni// me tog la sogs mchod byas nas/ 
212a5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma thams cad gzung bar bya// de nas gdong ni mdzes pa dag/ a khaM bI ra hUM bzlas pa'i// ras bzang so so'i rigs mthun pas// legs par bsgrims te gnas par bya// dngos grub 'dod
212a6(rgyud 'grel): pas ci 'dod pas// snying po'i khar ni kun skyod nas// rin chen me tog kun phreng 'dzin// rtse gcig brtan pa'i sems bskyed nas// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la// gsang ba yang dag mtha' 
212a7(rgyud 'grel): yas mchog/ thog ma nyid du gsal brjod pa// bu khyod ci la dga' zhes dri// skal pa bzang la bdag dga' zhes// 'jug pa pos kyang smra bar bya// bla mas bul slar smras pa// de yis 
212b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod la ci zhig bya// sangs mchog sras bcas dam tshig las// yon phul thugs rjes bdag la dgongs// sangs rgyas sku gsum rang bzhin mchog/ slob dpon mgon la bdag skyabs
212b2(rgyud 'grel): mchi// skal bzang lha mo tshogs bcas pa'i// dkyil 'khor tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po sa bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// rgyal ba kun gyis gnas 
212b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i// dkyil 'khor chen po nyams dga' ba// snying po'i grong khyer chen po 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi// de nas yol ba'i nang mtshams su// las kyi rdo rjes gzhug par// 
212b4(rgyud 'grel): bya// gsang ba yang dag 'di shes nas// ji ltar 'dod pa rab tu ga zug/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes nas// g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya// oM sarba yo ga tsid+b+ha ut+pA da ya mi nAM/ thogs med dus 
212b5(rgyud 'grel): nas 'khor ba yis// las kyis sdig pa'i las gang bgyis// bgyid pa yi rang dus 'dir gshegs// phyin chad mi bgyid sdom rab gzung // rgyal ba sras tshogs dge rtsa'i bzhi// 'gro gzhan legs 
212b6(rgyud 'grel): byas gang yid la// de dag kun la yi rang ste// byang chub chen por bdag gis bsngo// sangs rgyas tshogs rdzogs dge 'dun la// bdag ni dus gsum skyabs su mchi// nyon mongs sdug bsngal 
212b7(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa dang // dge ba'i tshogs par spel ba'i phyir// byang sems gnyis med don bskyed nas// 'gro don di ring dus 'dir gnyer// sangs rgyas gyur nas bdag gis ni// 'gro rnams srid pa'i 
212b8(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas gdod// rdo rje me tog phreng bcas pas// slob pa'i snying khang bdag ste bosgo// bde gshegs kun gyis khyod nyid ni// di ring byin gyis brlabs pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
213a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang chen 'di// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing // dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la// nam yang smra bar bya ba min// oM su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM// ho sid+d+hi badz+ra ya thA su khaM/ 
213a2(rgyud 'grel): oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// sAng+ge gar yang dag zhugs mdzad de// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// oM sa ma ya u ta// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ 
213a3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis grub// oM AHhUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM badz+ra A yu ka ta hrI tha// di ring phyin chad khyod nyid// 
213a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' nga yin pas// gang zhig bsgo ba'i las rnams byos// ngal brnyas par ma byed cig/ gal te rlung zhig bad+has na ni// nus mini 'chi zhi de dmyal bar 'gyur/ 
213a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba kun gyi yi gzugs// srung da gsung 'phrul las mdzad pa// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// di ring bdag la dbab tu gsol// rkang ma thil ga mthun spyi bor// sa blon las 
213a6(rgyud 'grel): byung 'byung bzhi'i khams// so so'i sa bon mtshan 'dogs par// rta yi rgyal po'i sngags kyis bsrung // rdo rje 'dzin cing dril bu dkrol// a be sha ya stob pa dang // ra bzhi dzal 
213a7(rgyud 'grel): yang gnyis hUM/ a had+he'u sngags rtsa brgyad// sku yi mtshan mas g.yo 'gyur zhing // gsung gi sngags bcas tshig rnams brjod// thugs kyis mngon par shes pa gsal// gsum sngags 
213a8(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa'i la sa la sbyor// rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i// bai dgags ye shes brgya bsgrubs nas// ji lta'i tshul gyis gar byed pas// slong ma rnams la bde basbyin/ 
213b1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dam pas deng phyin chad// phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung bas// rnam par snang mdzad mchog sbyin du// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// de nas bdag gis rab bsgrubs

213b3(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi// rigs kyi lha yi bye brag dang // bsod nams gang yin de bzhin shog/ de bzhin dngos grub mtshan ma dag/ snying po'i gnas 'di legs ston par// 'dog dbyibs kyi bye brag gis// 
213b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma snang las las mthun grub// dngos grub ji lta thob 'dod pas// slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug/ lha mo gang la lhung ba ni// lha de de yis 'grub par 'gyur// oM pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ho// sku stod 
213b5(rgyud 'grel): sku smad yan lag gam// de ltar mtshan sgo'i gnas rnams sogs// dngos grub rim pa bye brag ste// rab las 'das lan gsum bsgyur// slar nyid phreng ba'i me tog gis// slob ma'i ma gol 
213b6(rgyud 'grel): bcings te brgyan// stobs ldan sems dpa'i rgyal po che// phreng ba 'di dang ldan par gyis// oM rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsi trAM/ gser gyi zur ma'i oM sogs kyis// spras mtshan dri ma gsal 
213b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// mig 'byed par ni brtson mdzad de// mig gi sgrib g.yog kun bsal nas// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// oM badz+ra tsak+Shu dz+nyA na pre be sha phaT/ 
213b8(rgyud 'grel): gdong g.yogs legs par bsal byas nas// snying po'i dkyil 'khor blta bar bya// legs par ltos shig sems dpa' che// thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// me tog gang la lhung ba ni// 
214a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid khyod kyis rigs kyi lha// rta mgrin 'phang mtho nas bzung ste// gtso bo'i bar du ming rnams bstan// de nas ro dang zas dang bcas// glu dang sil snyan la sogs pa// 
214a2(rgyud 'grel): ded dag mgon po rnams la dbul// rdo rje bla ma chen po dag/ sbyor ba'i rdzas kyis mnyes byas shing // bdag dang gzhan yang 'dod dbus mchod// bu khyod dang bas rab grus bskyed// dkyil 
214a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bzang po legs par ltos// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' gro sgyu ma'i rigs mchog 'dzin// 'gro ba phun sum tshogs kun dang // dngos grub thams cad mngon
214a4(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur// dam tshig 'dzin cing rjes chags dang // gsang sngags snying po 'dzin pa gyis// blo ldan yon mchod thogs pa yis// bla ma'i zhabs gus gsol ba gdab// rgyal ba 
214a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis gsang ba'i las// 'gro ba skyob pa'i gzi brjid can// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo mchog/ yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// di ring dbang bskur gnang ba yi//

214a7(rgyud 'grel): shes pa dang // sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis rdo rje slob dpon gzung // 'jug pa'i sgo yi phyogs nyid du// khru dos chod pa dbul gyi tshad// slob ma'i
214a8(rgyud 'grel): stegs bu sgo dang bcas// pad+ma 'dab brgyad mtshan ma bri// seng ge sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdon// gnyis med gus pa'i sems bcas bzhag/ 'phan gdugs me tog phreng sogs 
214b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // sna tshogs gos kyis nye bar brgyan// dri chu nyungs kar sbyin sreg dang // ku sha'i chu yis shes par bya// bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis bsrung ba dang // de nyid gsum gyis sbyang bar bya//

216a1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid ni sgrub par bya// rang gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni phyi/

216a8(rgyud 'grel): dbang chog go/ sems dpa'i nga rgyal rnal 'byor las// snyems bcas me tog phreng 'phang bya// deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// sras bcas kun nas rnam par rol// rdo rje sems 
216b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs rab sbyor bas// bdag bstod bde cher mchod pa mdzod// oM badz+ra lA s+ya hUM/ sgeg dang bcas pAs phreng ba 'phang // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// bcom ldan kun du mi 
216b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bral te// phreng ba de yi rgyan yin no// mA l+ye hUM// lus can kun la dam chos kyi// gla dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig brjod pas// bde bar gshegs pa'i dngos grub mchog/ myur du bde ba myong bar 
216b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gi badz+ra gI ti hUM// gar bcas thal mo sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar byos// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i 'phran las kyi// gang dbang tshul bzhin bskur bar gyis// 
216b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra rA n+ya nAM// rdzogs sangs rgyas la spos 'brel ma// brtul rlugs bzang pos legs par tshim// lus can bde gshegs cha 'dra bar// ye shes can gyis tshim par gyis// oM badz+ra d+ha 
216b5(rgyud 'grel): pe hUM// me tog sangs rgyas rnams su 'thong // byang chub yan lag tshogs pa'i sgo// mtshan bzang dpe byad kun ldan pa'i// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku thob 'gyur// b+h+rUM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ chos 
216b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi mige 'byed sgrol gsal bas// rdo rje chos dang 'dra ba ru// sems can pa rig pur thoms pa'i// ye shes snang ba gsal bar gyis// pra badz+ra A lo ke hUM// rgyal ba rnams la dri sbyor zhing // 
216b7(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims phung po shes rab dang // rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yis// byang chub lus can rnams la byug/ a badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ bdag gzhan don grub las kyi tshogs// thun mong 'bring po tshogs gyur pa'i// 
216b8(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang // sdang gnod nges pa'i las kun dang // 'byed rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnams// thogs pa med par bsgrub par gyis// ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang // thogs med mi 
217a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byings skas 'jog cing // gser 'gyur ri lu nyi zla gzung // char dbab la sogs las kyi tshogs// rnam shes bsgrub dang ye shes bsgrub// phyag rgya shes pa'i dngos grub 
217a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // thams cad bsgrub cing grol ba yi// don nyid yang dag grol bar gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas 'jug cing // sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan rgyas// phrin las gzhan dag sbyor ba yi// 
217a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dngos grub gnang // ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten lding tog bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa yi// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// oM badz+ra metra 
217a4(rgyud 'grel): a pa ha ra phaT laM b+ha nI// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la dri ma med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung // rang bzhin med cing bdag med// 
217a5(rgyud 'grel): pa// chos rnams de bzhin shes bgyis la// sems can don la yang dag byos// 'on kyang sangs rgyas rishes su skyes// thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// na mkha' la yang mtshan nyid 
217a6(rgyud 'grel): med// nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin// dag cing bsal la rtog pa med// bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs// 
217a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso// rigs kyi yi ge mtshan ldan pa'i// mda' 'phang ba dang 'khor log non// g.yas par dung gi sgra 'byin zhing // g.yon par rang gi glegs bam mo// oM pa 
217a8(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin drug las rnams kyis// sems can kun don rab sbyor zhing // 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod mya ngan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor // the tshom rtog tshogs gcod mdzad pa'i// 
217b1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dung ni sgra sgrogs shing // gsang sngags snying po'i gsang chen 'dri// snod ldan kun la rab tu shod// des ni rgyal ba thams cad la// phan thogs drin du gzo zhes bya// mkha' gro sgyu 
217b2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis// khyod la rtag tu srung bar mdzod// mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams su// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs su// rdo rje'i 'khor la 
217b3(rgyud 'grel): bskor du gsol// rdo rje gnas su bde gshegs rin// pad+mo las kyi rjes su gnas// 'di ltar nga yis khyod lung bstan// rdo rje dpal ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dngos po mchog tu sgrub pa'i 
217b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las grol// kye che ge mo zhes bya ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pa b+hur b+hu ba swaH// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis// dus gcig tu ni lung bstan pas// 
217b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po'i sngags bcas mthus// skad cig dus kyi lung bstan mdzad// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig/ khams gsum na ni gzhan med de// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ 
217b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis nam yang bya ma yin// ma hA sa ma ya hUM// di ride dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur// sngags sogs rgyud rnams 'dzin par gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
217b7(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kun gyis mthun par bsrungs// sems can kun la snying brtse bas// dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris// rtse gcig nan tan bskyed nas ni// sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor// 
217b8(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// zhugs shing mthong la sogs pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // khyed rnams rab tu dgyes par gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di
218a1(rgyud 'grel): la ni// byin kyang 'chi ba yod med cing // mtshungs med thub par mi 'gyur te// ces kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// srid pa kun tu dag pas na// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 
218a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das so// byang chub sems ni yongs mi spang ba// rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya ste// gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med// dam pa'i chos dag mi smad cing / 
218a3(rgyud 'grel): ma gus spang zhing dor mi bya// mi shes snod min mongs pa la// nam yang bstan par mi bya'o// rdo rje dril bu mi spang ste// slob dpon dag la gus par gyis// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che// 
218a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag por rgyal chen dbang bskur zhing // bdud rnams thams cad las rgyal bas// grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin// 'di yis khyed rnams dus 'di ru// sangs rgyas thob par the tshom med// 
218a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur rjes thob dbugs phyung bas// slob ma yon 'byung rgyal por 'gyur// slob dpon blo gros dam tshig ldan// brtan g.yo'i mtha' las rnam par grol// lam mchog 'jug sogs
218a6(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dbyung ste// ngal ba'i gnas ngan kun tu spangs// rigs kyi 'khor gang yin pa yi// brten pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid// rten gnas khang pa rgyan bcas pa'i/ 
218a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag rang bzhin rgyan bstan cing // bskyed pa'i las lam bye brag sogs// slob dpon phyogs gcig nas 'jug pa'i// rig pa'i yan lag rgyud don bzhini// slob dpon dbang
218a8(rgyud 'grel): bskur don du bstan// de nas sna tshogs rgyan rnams dang // mchod pa kun dang gtor ma kun// snga ma bzhin du phul byas te// dkyil 'khor lha rnams bstod par bya// 
218b1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la// yon mchog bdag gis dbul bar bya// gang la yongs su gtad dka' ba// de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin// gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog/ yang na shin / 
218b2(rgyud 'grel): tu khyad par can// de dang de ni bla ma la// de ni zad par 'dod pas dbul// yang na de ni 'dod gyur ba'am// 'on te sems la bgos pa dag/ de bzhin yang ni dgos par bya// de ni chung
218b3(rgyud 'grel): yang mchog yin no// gal te de la mchog bdog la// de yang ngan pa'i yon dbul na// kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na// de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob// bu mo shin tu brgyan pa 'am// 
218b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ phul nas rin gyis blu ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon// mi chen dag ni phul nas su// slar yang rin gyis blu ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin la dpal sbyor
218b5(rgyud 'grel): ba// yon de mchog gi yon yin no// mu tig zangs dang nor bu dang // shin tu dkar dang ras zung dang // de bzhin rta ni dkar po dang // pad+ma can gyi yon mchog yin// rgyal srid
218b6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams cad dang // rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no// rta mchog shin tu brgyan pa dang // shing rta rin chen
218b7(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba dog/ rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin no// de nas dben pa'i gnas dag tu// dris byugs maN+Dal legs bshams nas// sna tshogs rgyan sogs me tog bkram// bla ma bde ba'i stan la 
218b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ shes rab phun sum mtshan ldan pa// snod ldan dbang thob dam tshig gnas// yon bcas bla ma la phul nas// ston mo'i g.yos sogs dga' longs spyod// rdo rje yol bas 
219a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bcad la// gus pas rgyab nas gsol ba gdab// dpal ldan mgon po bde ba che// bde chen bde ba'i gnas la bzhugs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor 
219a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// mkha'agro sgyu ma'i bde stsol mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis// yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa// ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yi// mchog gri dbang bskur ba bzhin/ 
219a3(rgyud 'grel): du// de bzhin bdag sogs 'gro kun gyi// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog/ ma rig rtog pa'i rab rib sel// gang gis byang chub bla na med
219a4(rgyud 'grel): pa// di ring bdag gis thob par mdzod// blo gros thugs rje chen po yis// brtse ba'i gsung gis slar brjod pa// bu khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// rgyal ba kun gyi bde chen sbyin/ 
219a5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin sbyor sngags gsal ba yis// rang gi gnas su legs par sdod// de nas phyi nang khrus sogs kyis// dam tshig lha mo sbyang byas nas// nyungs kar sngags kyis bgegs bskrad/ 
219a6(rgyud 'grel): tsang // sbyor ba rjes sbyor gyis bskyed de// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs byas nas// rol pa'i brdas bskul spro ba bskyed// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// slob ma'i kha ru dbab 
219a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya// ji ltar rgyal ba bde gshegs kyis// rang gi sras mchog dbang bskur zhing // byang chub sems de dag pa'i chu// rtog tshogs dri ma dag par byas// oM mahA bo d+hi tsin+ta sa ma ya a 
219a8(rgyud 'grel): biShiny+tsa hUM// a ho sa kha zhes brjod cing // longs spyod gnas la gzhug byas te// rigs kyi cha lugs gsal ba dag/ chu zla sgyu ma'i rnam pa bzhin// rdzogs rimi bcud rdzogs 
219b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma mchog/ 'gro ba skyob pa'i blo ldan pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gas gnas don// slob mas rgyud la rab bskul mdzad// mtshan ldan yum bcas bla ma la// mchod cing gsol ba gdab 
219b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// kye kye mgon po bde ba che// rdo rje sbyor las yang dag byung // phyag rgya mi phyed rab sgrub pa// mngon sum nyams myong ba skyed pa'i phyir// bdag nyid chen pos ji lta bar
219b3(rgyud 'grel): gtso bos bdag la mdzad du gsol// rtog pa'i dri mas bsgrub pa rnams// byang chub chu yis dag par mdzod// rigs mthun mtshan ldan byin brlabs pa'i// lha mo bu yi lag tu gtad/ 
219b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i gnas chen lha mo 'di// sna tshogs sgyu rdu la yid du 'ong // legs par zung zhing blo gros mchog/ dga' ba de'i mchod pa rab tu gyis// thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya// 'gro ba'i 
219b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad 'gyur// de bas khyod kyis 'di nyid du// nam yang 'bral bar mi bya ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med// blun po gang zhig 'di 
219b6(rgyud 'grel): spong ba// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// lha mos grogs la dga' ba'i bzhin// rgyas mdzad pad+ma kha phye bstan// khyod kyis nus sam rdo rje can// dri chen dri chu'i bza' btung dang / 
219b7(rgyud 'grel): rak+ta ga bur maM sa dang // bud med rnams la da gus dang // b+ha gar 'o byed mi rtog pa// smros shig grogs po bde ba can// lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro// khu khrag la sogs bza' ba dang / 
219b8(rgyud 'grel): bud med rnams la rtag gus shing // dga' ba'i pad+mar 'o bgyid cing // rmad byung gsal ba'i pad+ma 'di// thams cad bde bar yang dag ldan// rtag tu rim bzhin 'di spyad na/ 
220a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bde chen 'bral mi 'gyur// chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag/ sems can thams cad rnam par dkrol// bde chen rgyal ba 'di nyid ni// dngos po kun gyi rang 
220a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bcas// nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo'i tshogs// pad+ma la bzhugs rab tu rgyas// b+ha ga'i mkha' dbyings na mkha'i dbyings// 'byung po lnga po rgyan bzhin dgod// lte ba za'u 'bru ge sar 
220a3(rgyud 'grel): zlum// 'dab ma brgyad sogs rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su gnas pa ni// de nyid bdud rtsi bde chen gzugs// b+hany+tsa mok+Sha ho// dben pa'i gnas mchog dri bcas brgyan// 
220a4(rgyud 'grel): yol ba'i ra bstan bde la// thabs shes sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang // rjes su sbyor dang sbyor chen bsgom// ka ma la yi gtsug lag gzhung // rim gyis bde ba'i ye shes bskyed/ 
220a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub shis dang mi shis las// yi ge lnga bcu'i mtshan ma rtag/ ye shes 'di ni shin tu phra// snying rje chen po mkha' 'dra zhing // rdul bral thar pa zhi ba chos// rang gi rang bzhin/ 
220a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid do// byang sems rdo rje lce yis blang // mchod yon dbul bskor gtang rag gtang // bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis// dbang bzhi'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab
220a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med pa'i// rnam gsum phyag rgya gang rung las// gnyis med bde ba'i ye shes don// mngon sum nyams myong rgyud la bskyed// de don rtog pa bdun pa las// rgyas par
220a8(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i gzhung bzhin brlab// phyi nang gsang ba gsang chen gyi// dbang bskur dam pa bzhi dag las// rgyud gzhan la las bum pa dang // gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang / 
220b1(rgyud 'grel): bde chen bzhi pa zhes brjod de// de don rang bzhin mtshungs pa'o// khyod kyis srog chags bsad par bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// 'dod pas log par g.yem par bya// brdzun gyi 
220b2(rgyud 'grel): tshig kyang smra bar bya// rdo rje bla ma byang chub sems// srog gi phyir yang byang chub sems// dran pa gsal bas gzung byas nas// lhag pa'i lha bzhin rin chen tog/ phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg/ 
220b3(rgyud 'grel): dang // gtor ma'i las rnams rdzogs byas nas// rab tu gces pa'i rin chen sogs// bla ma'i zhabs la btud de dbul// de nas brtsams te dus kun tu// bla ma bzod la
220b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum rim pa bzhin// bsdu ba'i cho ga rgya cher bya// sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i bye brag gis// mgron tshogs ma lus dgug par bya// bkra shis glu gar rol mo'i tshogs 
220b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid yongs spyod nye bar gnas// mgon thos dri myur rnam bikod de// dri don gsang brgya mtsho'i rmed// rab basmras dkyil lam chog bzhin// dri med yan lag rgyas pa'i rnam 
220b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i yan lag tu// bstan pa'i dge bas 'gro ba rnams// rang gi ye shes zag pa med// bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis rgyal bar shog/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par
220b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ku ku rA dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gu len+d+ra gu p+ta dang // zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dran pan na mkhas bsgyur ba/

221a2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma yo gI ga Da bi d+hi nA ma// bod skad du/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshogs kyi cho ga ces bya ba// dpal mkha'agro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan bde chen sems

221b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi gnas dag tu// tshogs kyi cho ga mdzad par gsol// e ma bu ni snying rje che// gal te lag pa'i phreng ston na// 'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin// phreng ba mngon par btang byas nas// dam tshig la// 
221b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas brtul zhugs bzang // dpa' bo gzhan don spyod pa'o// de nas nub mo 'dus pa dang // phyi nas 'dag chal dri chab chu// khrus byas me tog gis brgyan cing // rnal 'byor dag chos sngags kyis

221b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'o// dngos grub rin chen dbyug to 'dzin// dpal ldan dpa' bo 'dul bar mdzod// mkha' mdzes rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// dam pa'i mtshan ldan bdag thong zhig/ oM ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ 
221b8(rgyud 'grel): sur ta s+t+waM/ rdo rje slob ma chen po dang // rang gi grogs mchog lha rnams la// bskor zhing phyag 'tshal rang nyid kyi// stan la gus pa'i sems kyis 'dug/ yon bdag las mkhan gang rung gis/ 
222a1(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi legs pa sham dri bcas chus// thu gang la sogs tshad mnyam pa'i// maN+Dal rgyun dang bcas par bsham// rdo rje 'dzin gnon sngags kyis ni// gsang sbyang bsrung zhing 
222a2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlob// rig pa chad dag rnam phye la// dkyil 'khor sngags kyis me tog bkram// oM badz+ra re Te hUM/ 'jig rten pa yi maN+Dal ni// de yi 'og tu brtsam par bya// phyogs bzhir dkyil 
222a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam bzhi'am// yang na gcig tu dgod par bya// dbus su rta mchog lha mo ste// bla ga ma lha mchog chen po 'i gnas// bar byam dang por phyogs skyong lha// gnyis par mkha' gro'i tshogs rnams te// 
222a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum par glu rgyal 'khor bcas tshogs// bzhi par 'gro drug 'gegs tshogs so// so so'i las dang mthun pa yi// tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams dgram par bya// mchod yon mchod sogs rim gro dang / 
222a5(rgyud 'grel): 1sha la sogs bza' ba dang // chang rtsi myos byed phreng ba dang // g.yon du nye bar dgod par bya// g.yas pa dag tu chu yi snod// ku sha'i chun por nyungs kar bcas// mdun du mchod yon bzed 
222a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang // rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya'i tshogs// mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i shes tshogs rnams// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor dang po laM// mchod pa kun gyi gtor ma'i tshogs// phyag rgya shes pa'i rdzas rnams mi/ 
222a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pa yid dkyil 'khor la// bkod de bsrung sbyang shis par bya// bsod namasna tshogs kyis dag byas nas// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// gzhi rten sbyar ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// 
222a8(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dkyil 'khor sbyor ldan pas// bsgom pa'i yan lag ma nyams par// rigs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing // mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis med// 
222b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// dkyil 'khor dag gi las bya'o// chang la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams// mdun nas phyag tu ci rigs dbul// ltos shig rnal 'byor rgyan mdzes rnams// 'di la rnam rtog yod ma yin// 
222b2(rgyud 'grel): bram ze byi dang gdol pa rnams// rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza'// oM mahA sa ma ya/ ku ru ku ru d+ha ri ku ru hUM phaT/ bde gshegs de ni sdig med cing // 'dod chags sogs pa'i 
222b3(rgyud 'grel): skyor dang bral// gzung 'dzin dri marnam par spangs// de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal// g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag gnyis kyis// pad+ma'i bskor ba byas nas ni// dam pa'i bcas pas bza' ba 
222b4(rgyud 'grel): bzung // rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// ji bzhin du ni 'jug par bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon blo ldan pas// chang sogs rdzas rnams byir gyis rlob// g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i gzugs can dang / 
222b5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par du ni bskol ba nyid// shel gyi gzugs kyis byin brlab cing // thams cad bdud rtsi'i ngo bor brtag/ de nyid yang dag spyod pa 'dis// rnal 'byor pa ni kun nas bdag/ ji ltar bde bar 
222b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya// sgyu ma lta bu mdzes pa yi// 'o byed sogs spyod kun 'byung ba// sems can don du yang dag spyad// de nas mna' ni bsgrags byas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa 
222b7(rgyud 'grel): yi// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams par byekhyed byed pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad
222b8(rgyud 'grel): dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha dag dang ni mi dag dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// de dag la ni snying rings nas// snying nas khrag chen 'thungs pa yin/ 
223a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad 
223a2(rgyud 'grel): la// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig med stobs kyis khyod ma 'jigs// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// tshogs kyi dpa' bo'i ston mo las// slob dpon las kyi rim pa'o// / 
223a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas khrus byas dri yi lus// ji ltar 'byor pa'i gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs rnam par bgos nas ni// me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim// sems can khams ni ma lus gdon// srid pa shin tu
223a4(rgyud 'grel): dag bya'i phyir// mi 'gag chos nyid sbyor ba yis// mnyam pa nyid du bsgrub par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par bya// rdo rje rini chen pad+mo sogs// sgo bsrungs 
223a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni ldan par bya// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pas// skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad 
223a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul bas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de ni rnam par 'phrul par mdzad// brtan zhing grub pa'i slong byed pa// kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni// 
223a7(rgyud 'grel): stong pa rnal 'byor yod med mthus// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ bde gshegs bde bar gshegs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' bskal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ oM e h+ye ti b+ha ga 
223a8(rgyud 'grel): sran ma hA ka ru Ni katr-i sh+ya ho sa ma ya sa ma ya staM dzaHhUM baMHho s+t+waM// de nas yang dag par gsal bas// bud med dag ni bzhi rnams la// gar gyis phyag rgya'i mchod pa ya si/ 
223b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o// oM AHhUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod 
223b2(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// mchod pa ma lus byed pa yi// rab 'byam las 
223b3(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor du rung // gang dag grub par ma gyur dang // mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor pa// phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas na// mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub// de nas ro mchog bza' btung nas/ 
223b4(rgyud 'grel): klu tshig sil sman la sogasal// de dag mgon po rnams la dbul// dkyil 'khor tshogs bcas dbyer med thos// rdo rje bla ma chen po dang // bdag gzhan tshogs pa 'dod dgus mchod

223b6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ hUM hU~MhU~M/ rnam pa mang po khro/ 
223b7(rgyud 'grel): bo'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu ma thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ ru lu drA lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa 
223b8(rgyud 'grel): mang po srog gi rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi skums thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ hUM shi shri bi shwa hUM/ oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu 
224a1(rgyud 'grel): pA la/ badz+ra satwa te na pa tiSh+Tha/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba// sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma ku du su tsa me tsit+taM/ shre yaHku ru nAM 
224a2(rgyud 'grel): hahaha ha ho/ b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sarba ma me muny+dzA/ badz+ra b+hA ba/ ma hA sa ma ya/ sarba A/ de nas zos shing 'thungs pa yi// lhag pa'i tshogs rnams kun bsdus te// gong du bkod pa'i bkod/

224a8(rgyud 'grel): rang gi dam tshig dran byos pa// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsrungs pa'i phyir// 'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// 'od zer sngags kyis sbyad byas nas// rigs kyi dkyil 
224b1(rgyud 'grel): ma ngan pa dugs pa// oM kr-ik+shaT+Tan/ bab+bar+d+hanan+ta/ ShaSh+pA na/ sabadun+dan/ gan tan/ b+hab+har+dz+dza ta ya/ sasakrAm+b+ha/ shAn+tiM kurba/ NAMhUM phaT padza swAH// bdud rtsi bas mA 
224b2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs nas ni// bdud rtsis kha ni dag par bya// oM gu ru tro ti khA hi/ sa ma ya br-i sha khA hi/ bak+Sha su ga ni/ b+hu tak+She tra pra tistaM b+ha ya ha hi/ lhag ma kha chu'i tshogs kyis bran// dgyes pa'i longs 
224b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod rnam par rol// oM 'jig rten kun gcwo mnga' mdzad pa'i// lha chen dregs byebyid stobs ldan pa// bde gshegs sras sogs bran mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ldan snying rje can/

225a1(rgyud 'grel): g+hi na g+hi na/ gats+tsha hUM phaT/ de nas sna tshogs gar gyi rgya// dag mdzes stobs kyis bsgyur bya zhing // sna tshogs glu rnams snyan pa'i dbyangs// dpa' bo'i tshogs kyis legs/

227b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya cher bya// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// thugs rje che dang ldan pa yi// dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa yi// zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes byas te// bsnyen pa'i dus su goms byas nas// 
227b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs par bya// de yang spyi dang so so yi// sgrub pa'i bye brag rnam gnyis te// bsdus dang rgyas la dga' ba yi// dbye ba gnyis su shes par bya// dang por chos kyi dbying

227b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis// thams cad du ni khyab pa las// chos kun stong gsal rang bzhin med// mi dmigs snying rje chen po'i ngang // oM d+harma d+hA swa b+ha at+ma kau ha~M/ skad cig ma yis skur gnas te/ hUM gi 'od zer 'phros pa'i 
227b6(rgyud 'grel): mthus// rdo rje rgya gram sa gzhil// rab gur dang bla re dang // phyogs bcur me 'od 'bar ba yi// mtshon cha'i phreng bas 'khor bar bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' dbyings sna tshogs 
227b7(rgyud 'grel): la gnas nas// cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru las// 'od zer tshul du spros nas kyang // ma lus nyes par khyab byas te// re zhing rngam pa'i tshul du dgongs// e las mkha' dbyings grugasum dkar//

228a1(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi sa gzhi ste// gru bzhi spyan la rdo rjes mtshan// khaM las rak+ta'i dpa' klong 'khyil// 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin rtags// kaM byung keng rus ri rab ste// rin chen

232b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro'i tshogs bcas ngas bsdus so// oM shrI ka ra mu ka sha ra yA ya na maH/ oM shI rA ga sa ma yA l+yA na maH/ oM shrI badz+ra kha T+wAM ga pra dz+wa la yA ya nA maH/ oM shrI badz+ra gan+d+he pra dz+wa la yA ya nA maH 
232b8(rgyud 'grel): a ti Sh+Tha ho/ pra tiSh+Tha ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ban+da naM kA ro ya mi/ ma hA yo gI ni/ a la la ho/ oM bdag med phyogs bral den dam thugs chud cing // byams dang snying dgra zin mi mnga' 
233a1(rgyud 'grel): yang // gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'jig byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// na mkha'i lus can gang yang thogs med cing // 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i 
233a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma srin byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad pa'i// phyi nang mkha' gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin 
233a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgya gsal// sangs rgyas khro byung khro bo ni// thal bar 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can// 
233a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po sdang // rdo rje la T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu khrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// gos chen po dang klubs pa che// sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung ba 
233a5(rgyud 'grel): che// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin tu khrog tu ma gdug pa yi// sems can 'ams ni rnam sbyang zhing // 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgya chen dbang phyug mchog 
233a6(rgyud 'grel): se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wA~M ga la rgyab brten bcas// lag pa g.yon par thod pa thogs// g.yas paM ba dan gsum pa byas// na mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa// na mkha' kun tu 'gro 
233a7(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkhas las 'byin// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// bde ba dbab pa'i gar byed pa// skyil mo krung ni phyed 
233a8(rgyud 'grel): bcas la// rkang pa rang gi brlas mnan pa'o// zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' ba'i gar byed sbyar bar btsos// shi ba'i ro ldang bsgyur ba yis// bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas 
233b1(rgyud 'grel): zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang // gyen du dbyug 'byin gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog go/ tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin 'jig rten

233b3(rgyud 'grel): me// las kyi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'byud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston

233b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gsal bar mdzad// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bong gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma'o// yi ge brgya pa dang

234a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa thams cad grub par mdzod// a la la ste mchod pa 'bul// a la la ste dam tshig bskongs// a la la ste dgyes/

238a8(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ a la la la la to// byang sems bde chen 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes mdzad nas// 'gro ba'i lus ngag yid rtog sbyang // sku gsung thugs kyi 'od brgyad brjid/

238b2(rgyud 'grel): chen gnas bdus rim bzhin bcas// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba'i mes// sku bcas 'od dpung kha dog lnga// sngon gyi goms shugs lha mo bzhis// phyogs bzhin sa ni bskul mdzad de/ 
238b3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthu// na mkha' bzhin du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhi su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal 'byor 
238b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ ye shes gsal ba'i rgyud bskul nas// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i rgyud gzigs te// 'bras bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin// cho ga rdzogs pas gsal bar 'gyur// de nas bcom 
238b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje se gol gtogs byas te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad// 'jigs rten khams ni ma lus pa// sangs rgyas
238b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin bcas rgyas// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can

243b3(rgyud 'grel): hi/ dga' byed myur ba'i brtul zhugs 'chang // las rgyud gcod byed theg pa'i mchog/ zab cing rgya che kun tshul gyis// yon tan brgyad 'dzin byed pa'o// oM badz+ra lo tsa na yaM yaM/ ma hA ru tra hi/ gtang

243b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams rnam par grol// gzugs mchog lha rdzas me tog rgya// sa gzhi mdun rol g.yas g.yon bstod// sna tshogs spang bar thor byed pa'o// a badz+ra puSh+pe/ ma hA ru tra hi/ tshul khrims dri mchog tshim byed pa'i/

243b7(rgyud 'grel): sel byed me mar rgya// kun tu bskor ba'i gar bsgyur zhing // thugs ka'i mtshan ma gsal ston pa'i// oM badz+ra a lo ke hUM/ ma hA ru tra hi/ brtson 'grus rtse gcig 'gyur ba med// chos kun dag byed byug pa'i dri/ 
243b8(rgyud 'grel): srin mthe bzang nas rtse gsum 'thong // phyogs kun dngos bcas rnam dag 'gyur// aHbadz+ra gan+d+he/ ma hA ru hi/ pad+ma ban+d+ha'i bdud rtsi bstod// myang ba rngub pa ltar byed cing // lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rdo rjer bcas/ 
244a1(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa'i tshul mchog las grub po// oM badz+ra a ku sha dzaHma hA ru dra hi/ rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i rgya// sA yi myang ba rngub pa yi// rin chen zhags pa gsol dka'i tshul// rang gi las 
244a2(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor byed pa'o// oM badz+ra pA she hUM/ ma hA ru tra hi/ rdo rje lcags sgroga'i zlar bcas// mig mtshungs zhen par lta ba yis// khams gsum kun la gzigs pa'i rgya// phyag rgya'i las kyi bstan byed

244a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho mdzad// oM badz+ra gats+tsha ho/ ma hA ruHhi/ gzigs pa rnam pasna chags pa yi rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna chags 'byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pas tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsal

244b2(rgyud 'grel): don sbyor ba'o// // lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// 'dzub mo'i mthe'u chung mdzes skur te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol// mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul// oM pa na pe na/ be nu su 
244b3(rgyud 'grel): ru ta/ pra pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa ma ya/ yo ga sid+d+hi A hUM/ oM AHhUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par 
244b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ste mchod par 'bul// al la ste dam tshig bskongs// a la la ste//

244b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khi b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM ung+ga te/ s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na ShaM swA hA/ oM 'byung ba lnga las thams cad 'byung // rang las ma byung gang yang med// gtsang spa'i dri rtog kun bral ba'i/ 
244b8(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi byang chub sems chen pos// bdag sogs gnyis med mchod pa'i phyir// mnyam pa chen po'i rgyal la rol// a na maHsarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta AHhU~M/ oM kA ya sid+d+hi oM/ oM bAka sid+d+hi A 
245a1(rgyud 'grel): oM tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ oM shrI he ru ka i daM d+hu pa puSh+pa dI pa/ gan+d+ha/ ba lai ta/ pa tIts+tsha ho/ shI b+ha ga bAn kha kha kha le le le/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ dzaHhUM bi hoHshrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra/ a be/ 
245a2(rgyud 'grel): sha ya a be sha yaHpra be sha ya/ pra be sha ye/ pra tits+tsha ho/ shrI b+ha ga bAn/ khi kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sgeg po dpa' bo 'jigs su rung ba dang // rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang // snying rje rnga ma

245a8(rgyud 'grel): mudra ma ra kha kha kha/ khA hi kha hi kha hi/ hrid ya pa~M pa hUM phaT/ nga ni za byed chen po ste/ khams ma lus bsgral ba dang // gdul dka' ma lus gdul ba'i phyir// sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya/ 
245b1(rgyud 'grel): dzaHhU~M br-i ho/ shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra/ sa ma ya ma hA maM sa/ ma hA rak+ta ma hA tsit+ta/ ma hA ba su ta/ ma hA pany+tsa/ a mr-i ta/ ma hA ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho/ kha kha kha/ le le le ho/ b+h+yo hAM hU~M b+h+yo/ ko tak+Sha/ ko ta ko ta ba 
245b2(rgyud 'grel): sa pa sa/ ka ti ra ba/ ko lA k+Sha/ ko la ko la/ ka la pa/ shA tha/ rnam dag sgrib sbyangs srid gsum skyon bral zhing // ston ka'i zla gsal dri med zhal mnga' ba// bcom ldan bde gshegs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor

248b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor sbyin chen po'i cho ga yis// mgron tshogs bzhi po tshim byas nas// bsgo ba'i phrin las drag tu bya// phyogs bzhir bsrung ma'i stegs bul// bsrung ba'i yi ge brtsams te bzhag/ yang dag gsang 
248b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsang ba'i dam can so so nas// 'du ba las ni ma gtogs shing // nyan pa las ni mi dbang ba'i// bgegs dang 'byung po thams cad kun// da lta nyid du so sor de bas// ji ste 
248b6(rgyud 'grel): bka' las 'das gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang // rdo rje mtshon chen 'bar ba yis// gtan du brlag cing phung par 'gyur// hUM badz+ra dza la raM yaM laM tsakra bi shwa hUM phaT phaT// thabs dang shes rab bsgrub pa
248b7(rgyud 'grel): pos// phyi dang nang gis bskang bshags kyis// rin chen snod mdzes dri yis bsgribs// rnam dag ris gsal ji bzhin pa'o// thugs ka'i 'od zer spro bsdu yis// dkyil 'khor mdun du dbug bya ste/ 
248b8(rgyud 'grel): dga' chen dpal las byung ba yi// se gol dpung mgor lan gsum gtog/ rdo rje bceng skyo'i se gol gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// oM badz+ra si mdza hUM/ oM thams cad spros bral de nyid che/ 
249a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' mnyam ye shes rtog med mchog/ gnyis snang so sor smin dgongs mdzad// thugs rjes smon lam thabs mkhas pas// dbang po'i gzhu bzhin ci 'dul ston// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bsas// 
249a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas// lha mo dag mchog dam pa'i lha// dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams dgong sugasal// bahUM wa ha~MHoM e h+ye hi ma hA ka dra Nika sa ma ya s+t+waM// sna tshogs gang las byung ba yi// rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar // 
249a3(rgyud 'grel): oM rdo rje rgyal po yon tan mchog/ byang chub mchog ston 'dren mdzad cing // nyon mongs mtsho skems sgron masna brgyan// thugs rje can la skyabs su mchi// phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs sangs thub 
249a4(rgyud 'grel): pA swa sa tshogs bcas// thugs rje chen po mnga' rnams la// gus par phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi// oM a d+hi b+hU hUM/ oM hriHhriHtraM dz+dza// mtshon cha drug gi tshul 'dra yis// thal mo kha yi gnas su gtug 
249a5(rgyud 'grel): oM na maHsarba tro tra hUM/ oM hriHgr-iHtraM ho// mchod pa so so'i rjes mthun par// lha mo gang bcas phyag rgya bcing // oM stong gsum mi mjed gnas 'di dang // gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi// las kyi 
249a6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod mngon rgyud dang // sangs rgyas yon tan snang ba yi// mchod rdzas bzang po khyad par can// dngos su sbyar tshogs sems kyis sprul// me tog gzugs mdzes kha dog dang // dbyibs rnams sna
249a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mtha' yas mchog/ gdug spos dri mchog khyad par can// so so'i rgyu las byung ba'i dri// mar me rin chen shing gi 'od// mun pa'i tshogs 'joms gsal byed rgyan// dri mchog bzang pos sbyar 
249a8(rgyud 'grel): bachu// rnam rtog dri ma dag byed rgyun// bza' btung sna tshogs rgyu las byung // tshim byed ro mchog brgya ldan rdzas// yan lag brgyad ldan khrus pa'i chu// mchod yon tshul du dga' ba de'i mchog 
249b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor kun la legs 'bul na// mgon po thugs rje kun gyis bzhes// oM badz+ra puSh+pe a~M/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe b+h+rUM/ oM badz+ra A lo ki hrIHoM badz+ra gan+d+he hi haM/ oM badz+ra na Ta h+ye traM/ oM badz+ra A ha ra hi/ sman 
249b2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'bru yi rnam pa dang // bla ren bza' rgyal mtshan gdugs// bdan phreng ba sna tshogs dang // do shal dpung rgyan sor bdub spras// dam pa rnams kyi longs spyod rkyen// bsod nams mthu las byung ba yi// 
249b3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// nor bu rin chen 'khor lo'i mchog/ blon po dmag dpon btsun mo bza'// ta mchog glang po rin chen mchog/ rnam spras nye ba'i rin chen brlan// bkra shis rdzas mchog 
249b4(rgyud 'grel): mtho// rnam pa ban brnyan pa sogs// bapa'i phreng ba mangs sogs nasas// dkyi 'jo gnas lags 'anas na// mtshan pa gsas na kyis pa zhes/ sarba thAs / 
249b5(rgyud 'grel): la ka ra pa na be nu hU~M swA hA/ bid+hi d+haM shar ta me gra pa ra na hU~M// oM sna tshogs gzugs mdzes sgra snyan zhing // dri zhim ro mchog brgya ldan pa// reg bya'i bde ba sprin phung bzhin// na mkha' gang bar byung ba dang / 
249b6(rgyud 'grel): snyed spu byas rnams// dkyil 'khor kun la legs 'bul na// mgon po thugs rje can gyis bzhes// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM ung+ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ au 
249b7(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga'i dam tshig rdzas chen po// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i dbyibs// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun grol zhing // rgyud lnga'i sems can bdud rtsi 'di// snying po tshim byed brgyad kyi mchog/ byang chub sem/ 
250a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pade ba'i rgyun// ma lus kun gyi rig bya las// rol pa sna tshogs snang ba dang // srid gsum brtan g.yo dngas pa dang // nyon mongs sgo gsum spyod chags dang // phung po khams 
250a2(rgyud 'grel): dang skye mched kyi// gzugs bzang mchod sprin thams cad kun// sku lnga rigs lnga ye shes lnga// lha mo sras bcas ngo bo nyid// 'khor 'das snang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// sna tshogs dngos med byang chub sem/ 
250a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par 'bul lags na// mnyam nyid blang ngor med pas bzhes// oM na maHsarba pak+Sha rA sa ya na a mr-i te hUM phaT/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta mahA su kha hUM// brda med rje gcig sems nges par// rdo rje thal 
250a4(rgyud 'grel): mo snying gar sbyar// hUM bdag dang mtha' yas sems can gyi// mgon po'i spyan sngar bshags pa ni// thogs ma med nas dus 'di'i bar// mi dge las kyi dbang song ste// nyon mongs sgo gsum skyes pa yi// 
250a5(rgyud 'grel): mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga// lha log sgo skur zhen log gis// rnam grol lam las gol gyur dang // nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs tshogs// shes dang mi spong gzhan gzung dang // bgyid dang bgyid du sbal 
250a6(rgyud 'grel): ga zhan ma sa// sa na yang// rang bzhin pa na sa pa sha / da bral pa gzung // bas ma 
250a7(rgyud 'grel): sor thar pa las// rna ba yan lag nyams pa dang // skyabs 'gro mkhan sogs slob dpon spangs// dad pa'i dge 'dun dbyen sogs dang // log mtsho nyes byas phra la sogs// tshul khrims zhig 'gyur las 
250a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams bshags// zlabyang chub sems sogs ma skyes shing // sdom pa rnam par spangs pa dang // pharam byin gzhung nyams pa yi// log pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang // tshangs pa'i gnas nas bsdub ba ni/ 
250b1(rgyud 'grel): lam sogs sum cu rtsa bdun dang // ma 'dres 'bras bu mdzad par bcas// smod spangs sdig rnams dus 'dir bshags// hUM gsang ldan rdo rje che ge mos// rdo rje slob dpon smod 'ga' zhing // lha spangs 
250b2(rgyud 'grel): mched la 'khrus pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya spangs pa dang // snod min gsang ba bsgrags la sogs// gnyis gsum nyi shu rtse brgyad sogs// yan lag cha shas nyams las 'das// 'gyod sems 
250b3(rgyud 'grel): nges par bshags par bgyi// oM nA maHkA ya bAk+ShIt+ta sarba pA paM shud+d+ha shud+d+ha hUM swA hA/ 'das dang da ltar ma byon chags// rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyi// dad brtson shes rab che bskyed cing // rgyu 'bras 
250b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis bsags byas nas// mdzad pa bcu gnyis la sogs dang // khyad par gsang sngags mdzad pa yis// 'gro rnams lam gnyis mdzad thob la// bdag gi rjes su yi rang ngo // lam gzhan 
250b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa rang rgyal dang // nyan thos so so skye bo yi// dge bsam sgom sogs gang spyad la// phrag dog med par rjes yi rang // phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi// mgon po thugs rje'i dbang 
250b6(rgyud 'grel): gis ni// 'gro ba'i mos pa bzhin ston cing // sngon gyi smon lam ji lta bar// dam chos btsun par mdzad pa'i ched// bskul ba'i sa la bzhugs pa dang // ji ltar tshangs pa'i rgyal tshogs kyi// chos 'khor 'dra/ 
250b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don bskor phyir// gser gyi 'khor lo spyong ldan phul// 'jig rten mgon la bdag gsol 'debs// rgyal ba bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// thog ma 'di nas tha ma'i bar// mdzad pa rnam gsum 
250b8(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin nas// sku lnga ye shes chen por ni// myur du sprul pa bsdu bzhed rnams// 'gro rnams kun gyi don slad du// bskal pa ji srid gnas kyi bar// gzugs mang sprul sku'i tshul bzhugs shing // 
251a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dpe chu 'phrul mi 'jigs stobs// bkra shis tshogs kyis rgyas mdzad cing // rtag tu nyi zla sgrib gsal ltar// snyoms mdzad 'gro ba'i mun sel mdzod// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// 
251a2(rgyud 'grel): de lta de ltar 'gro ba rnams// sdug bsngal rgyu dang de nyid las// bsgral zhing thar pa byas nas ni// bde tshogs ldan par bye ba dang // bla med 'bras bu bskyed bya'i phyir// dang po thabs kyi bdag bsgral nas/ 
251a3(rgyud 'grel): smon lam rdzu 'phrul dpag med dang // zhi ga nas lhag mthong mngon shes sogs// thogs pa med par 'byung ba yis// myur du mthu stobs rtag gyur nas// g.yel med 'gro don brtson byed cing // thams cad 
251a4(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dbyung byas nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas bkod pa'o// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // bla ma rdo rje ldum dral dang // dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams
251a5(rgyud 'grel): dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// skye ba 'di dang gzhan dag tu// dge rtsa spyi dang khyad par don// sngon gyi bgyis bgyid la rjes yi rang // ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs// rgyal ba
251a6(rgyud 'grel): sras bcas tshogs gyur pas// bla na med pa'i byang chub tu// thugs mchog rin chen bskyed pa ltar// bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub chen por sems bskyed de// rgyal ba rnams kyis rjes su slob// 
251a7(rgyud 'grel): mdor na 'gro ba ma lus pa// sku gsum 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor drug gi sprul pa yis// rnam par rol pa'i don gnas bya// de las byung ba'i 'bras bzang mchog/ kun mkhyen gnas mchog snyoms
251a8(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// dngos rnams gang la'ang chags med de// byang chub sems dpa'i las chen pos// 'gro ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob shog/ sna tshogs sdang grags rnam grol ba/ 
251b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings na cho 'phrul dpag med de// de yi cho 'phrul de nyid pas// na mkha'i mtha' ltar sngo dang bral// 'khor gsum yongs su dag par ni// mnyam nyid bde ba chen po'i ngang // thams cad 'du 'bral med pa yi// 
251b2(rgyud 'grel): don nyid ngo bo lhun grub shog/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gzhibs te// mtheb chen bsgrengs nas g.yob par bya// oM badz+ra gats+tsha muHrdo rjes thal mos la na gsum du// mi drag smad gnyis brdab par bya// oM badz+ra tu sh+ya 
251b3(rgyud 'grel): ho// ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la// mnyam snyoms nyid du dmigs nas kyang // byams pa'i sems ni nyer gnas pas// sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad dag gis// gdungs pa'i nyams thag gang yin pa//

251b5(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po yis// de dag bde ba thob byas te// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga sogs kyis// bde ba dag la sgrub bya ste// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar/ sems can grangs med skur sprul nas// 'od zer mthu dang //

251b8(rgyud 'grel): snyoms gnas bral ba med// rang bzhin byang sems mnyam pa'i dbyings// mi rtog ting 'dzin chen po yis// mtha' las grol ba'i sems nyid bskyed// 'di ni tshangs pa'i gnas gzhi las// mchog 
252a1(rgyud 'grel): tu gyur pa'i tshad med bzhi// snying po sngags kyis spro byas la// rigs bcas 'od zer khyab par gnas// phyogs gzhan rtog pa sna tshogs kyi// rkang dang sre mnan cho ga dang // gsar bu shis/ 
252a2(rgyud 'grel): par byas pa'i las// las kyi cho ga gzhan bstan pa'o// rdo rje sems pa'i sbyor ba yis// dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'i// dpung mgor se gol brdabs byas nas// rdo rje bcings kyo'i se gol sgras/ 
252a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun// dam tshig mchog gi gsang sngags kyis// til gyi gang bu bzhin du rgyas// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur 
252a4(rgyud 'grel): te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag bsreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams 
252a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum ma lus smras ci dgas// de nas ma ci'i ni mo// yid ni gan par yang dag rlung // sgra yi dbugs rings chubapas// rgyal bus b+hag rgya sbyang ba byung // bcom ldan de napa 'byor pas// 
252a6(rgyud 'grel): bor bsgyur nas phyung // dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ 'bar bas thal ba rab tu 'jig/ sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmarang po 'bar// dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra// 'bar ba chen po skra

252b4(rgyud 'grel): sum+b+ha ni sngags brjod cing // brjid gnon po ba chen po'i tshul// phyogs bcu'i dgegs rnams bkug mdzad nas// pho mor bsnol te nyi mar bkod// so so'i tshogs bcas myos par mdzad// oM sum+b+ha ni su~Md+hahUM/ 
252b5(rgyud 'grel): grih+Na gr-ih+na n+d+he/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na bi d+ya rA dza hUM phaT/ in+ta ye dzaHya ma ye dzaHba ru na ye dzaHgu be ra ye dzaHag+ne ye dzaHnai ri te ye dzaHbe ram+ba ye dzaHe sha na ye dzaHtsan+d+ra ye dzaHsUr+ya na yai dzaH

252b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i cha lugs brgyan// oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha n+ta ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM Sh+Tha/ ti shwA tI sh+tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gr-i ya hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM 
252b8(rgyud 'grel): badz+rakr-i ta a mr-i ta N+Da lahU~M/ hU~MbaT/ a~M ba kro D+h+we gan+na tAM/ dab d+hA waM/ oM dz+ra kr-ita AHaHD+D+h+ya/ n+d+ha hU~M dz+dza phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-ita.a ba hri~Mgr-in+d+re/ ti swA te ga d+ha \u0f7f/ oM 
253a1(rgyud 'grel): lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ b+hi nad b+hi nad hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M kar hUM/ gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ rdo rje bdud rtsi rnam 'phrul pas// rdo rje thob phyag bsnams/ 
253a2(rgyud 'grel): shing // phyogs mtshams steng 'og btab nas ni// rang gi gnas su nges par 'debs// oM badz+ra g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya sarba duSh+Ta na phaT// badz+ra d+ha ro ad dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAk+Shit+ta/ badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM phyogs 
253a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rnams// 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha me 'od 'phro// rigs kyi mthun khro bo'i 'khor tshogs dang // dbang bskur rigs kyi skus brgyan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal// rdo rje sems

253a7(rgyud 'grel): dag/ snga ma bzhin du mnyam par 'gyur// khams las byung ba thams cad dang // srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te// rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa// snga ma bzhin du mnyam par 'grub// tsan dan gnyis 
253a8(rgyud 'grel): dang gla rtsi dang // ga pur na ka la la gyi// gdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gan dar dri dang gu gul dag/ sa rdza ga pur gla rtsi dang // rdzas 'di dag la btsos pa'i mar/ 
253b1(rgyud 'grel): me mar byas na snang ba skyes// tsan dan gur gum pri ka dang // ga pur dag ni gla rtsi dang // btsos pa'i gdug pa bsgrub pa ste// spos kyi phyag rgyas spos mchog 'gyur// ka ko la dang sug smel dang // gla sgang ga 
253b2(rgyud 'grel): pur gla rtsi dang // 'di dag zhib tu btags pa ni// seng ldeng dbur ma dag dang sbyar// shing rtsa pa tra lo 'dra dang // na le sham dang ga pur sbyar// ha sa ki ri shing mar gyis// smras pa kha yi spos yin no// 
253b3(rgyud 'grel): me tog dmar po sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang la kha dog dkar// ser po mkha' las byung ba la// tsa na da ni bdug pa sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la du ru ka/ spyan ras gzigs 
253b4(rgyud 'grel): laka pi ta// lte srog rdo rje nyi ma la// mar me'i phreng ba sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la mar me bdun// spyan ras gzigs la mar me brgya// stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la// sangs rgyas rnams la tsan dan spos/ 
253b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can lagur gum yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan dan dmar// ga pur rdo rje nyi ma la// me tog kun dang bdug pa kun// de bzhin mar me thams cad dang // spos rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ 
253b6(rgyud 'grel): rdorje rtal dbul du rung // sgeg mo dang nin chung dang // mos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang // gcig pu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra// g.yon can bran mo de bzhin te// lan tshal sogs ro kun dang // kar la 
253b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs bdud rtsi sbyin// bdag nyid kun gyir 'grub pa// sha dang chang du ldan pa yi// bza' bsna tshogs 'grub pa ni// dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste// tshe yi dam tshig rab tu bsgrub// amra 
253b8(rgyud 'grel): sprin dang rgun 'brum dang // pa na se dang na le kar// a ka ru la sogs pa yi// 'bras bu'i phyag rgya thams cad 'grub// kar sbrang rtses byugs pa yis// a mra la sogs tshig gu byug/ ha sa ra ka rim pa/ 
254a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs// mnyam pa'i dri yis slu bar bya// yung dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i// tshon gyis mthun par kha sbyar nas// shun pa gro ga la sogs byas// mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya// 
254a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la bshos dbul ba// sha dang chang ni rnam par spangs// glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang // sha dang chang du bcas pa ni// gtor ma'i mchog ste tshag/ 
254a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// bdag gi phyugs te skal bzang po// rdo rje las ni dpal grub pa'o// bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang // pad+ma me tog ldan pa ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la// phul nas dgos pa thams// 
254a4(rgyud 'grel): bad 'grub// rgyal po kha zas la sogs pa// sha dang chang ngadu ldan pa dang // glu dang sel snya sal bzang dag/ rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dpral// kha zas kun gyi rokun dang // sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang / 
254a5(rgyud 'grel): sel snyan phreng thogs shing // gar dbyangs bro thabs drug 'gyur rtse// gzeng bstad dga' ba'i bzhin rgyas spyod// hUM 'phags mchog thugs rje'i dus la bab// khyad par bstan pa'i dus labab/ 
254a6(rgyud 'grel): dmachog bskang ba'i dus la bab// dngos grub stsal ba'i dus la bab// mthu chen mthu stabs bcom ldan 'das// dpal chen dbang bar bcom ldan 'das// dngos grub mchog sul bcom ldan 
254a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das// bdag gi las rnams gang bsgrub pa// 'bras brangs 'dir mchis par mdzad// a la le haM b+ha ga bAn// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma yas/ oM yi nas rnam pa kun ldan pa'i// gsang bachen 
254b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsal la bstan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gnyis med brda' yis mtshan mar bya'o// maM stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// phyogs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams kyi// 
254b2(rgyud 'grel): ste gro rdul sred gnas pa kun// bde gshegs lnga yi dkyil 'bor dbyings// phyogs dus kun nas chags pa'i lha// gnyis su med pas phyag 'tshal lo// hUM ma hriHhaM/ a ti b+hAts+tshe/ pra ti b+hA ba/ tanA 
254b3(rgyud 'grel): gtogu rA pa ti a la la ho// lus ngag spyi dang khyad par gyi// gsang sngags brda yi phyag rgya 'dzin// byin rlabs mtshan ma gsal grub phyir// phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid spyad par bya// he ru kaM yi gnas bcu dang // 
254b4(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// dam chog rtags kyi mtshan ma yi// dpal gyi chas brgyad rgyan dang bcas// 'khor ba'i rgyu rkyen 'bras bu rnams// thugs rjes rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir// spyi dang khyad par 
254b5(rgyud 'grel): rtags dag dang // don gyi sgo nas gzhom par mdzad// sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas// phung po dur khrod gzhal yasa~M khang // dga' ba chen po'i glu dang gar// dngos kyang mchod pa'i rdzas su sngo// 
254b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang sgyur chen po'i ting 'dzin sogs// thams cad tshul bzhin byin rlabs te// cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru las// 'bar ba'i khang pa rnam par brjid// rang 'od sa bon so so las// bkod pa'i rgyan gyi dkyis 
254b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor tshe// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen pos// bsgrub rdzas de dag byin gyis brlab kro d+hi shwa ri dag byed kyis// mtshan ma'i gnas kun spyad par bya// mtshan ldan pad+ma'i pho brang du// 'chi med lcags kyu 
254b8(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa dag/ dpa' bo 'bru dgu'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad bdud rtsi byang chub sems// mchod dang gtor tshogs zhal zas rnams// kun bzang dkyil 'khor rnam par dag/ oM ma hA badz+ra tsakra maN+Da 
255a1(rgyud 'grel): la hUM/ hU~M oM hi traM haM/ oM AHhUM/ ba oM ma hA kro d+he shwa ri sarba tra ba pyaM sho d+ha ya AHhUM/ oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ti hU~M hri tha/ oM te dzo ba li te b+ha la b+hi ti gu h+ya sa ma ya swA hA// so so'i ting 
255a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin phyag rgya dang // sngags kyis gsal bar byas nas ni// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// de dag so sor dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor sngon 'gro rdzogs byas nas// bsnyen bsgrub yan lag 
255a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi yis// las kun 'bras bu'i gnas sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// dang po chos kyi dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// dngos po med par bdag sbyor 
255a4(rgyud 'grel): bas// nam mkha' kun mnyam sbyor ba'o// oM ma hA shUn+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad du yang khyab byas la// chos kun stong gsal rang bzhin med/ 
255a5(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs snying rje chen po'i dang // oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' dbyings sna tshogs la gnas nas// cing yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru bsam// 'od zer tshul du 
255a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phros nas kyang // ma lus nye bar khyab byas te// ri zhing dam pa'i tshul du dgongs// e 'byung mkha' dbyings gru gsum dkar// gyen bsgrengs bzang po'i mkha' dbyings nas// yaM 'byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor
255a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs// dud kha sra mkhregs sgrol ma'i mkha'// baM las chu dkyil dkar zhing zlum// bum pas mtshan pa mA ma ki/ laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ste// gru bzhi spyan ma rdo rjes mtshan// khaM las sna tshogs can 
255a8(rgyud 'grel): gyi mtsho// lcags ri mu khyud nor bus mtshan// suM la sa ri rab bai ri ma lcog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgu las grub// raM las me dkyil dkar ser 'bar// zur mangs gos dkar na mkha'i dbyings// sra mkhregs/ 
255b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i gzhi'i steng la// kun 'byung 'khor lo sna tshogs 'bum// de dbus brum las gzhal yas khang // ye shes rin chen sna tshogs rgyan// nang gi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// re'u mig 'khor lo mtshungs
255b2(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyad// rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs kyis brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma gdan mis mtshan// dkyil 'khor gyi rim gnas brgyad du// dur khrod shing dang zhing skyong dang // phyogs skyong rnal 'byor mtsho dang sprin// klu 
255b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal de dag gnas brgyad du// sha za 'byung po gshin rje dang // mkha' gro bya khyi ro langs dang // ce spyad khros pa'i sgra 'byin cing // ro yi tshogs la longs spyod mdzad// rong 'byung mchod rten dang bcas pa// 
255b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba rim gsum phyi rol gyi// ra ba'i mtshams su gnas pa las// kun 'byung rgyan gyi mtshan spras po'o// de dbus 'khor lo'i lte ba la// pad zla nyi ma'i gdon ste ngas su// dpal mchog dang po gnas mdzad
255b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// 'phrul dga'i ting 'dzin mngon par ston// chos rnams thams cad rnam brtags na// dngos med mtshan ma kun dang bral// zla dkyil A li bcu drug bzhi// nyi dkyil kA li sa brgyan pa'i 'od// 
255b6(rgyud 'grel): 'pho 'du mdzad par bcas pa yis// nyis 'gyur mtshan dang dpe byad gsal// de dag 'od du gyur pa la// 'od dpung kha dog sna lnga nyid// hU~M las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// dkar po bum par hUM gis mtshan/ 
255b7(rgyud 'grel): thog ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings// dang po rdo rje chen po yin// badz+ra a haM/ 'od zer lnga yi 'phro 'du yis// dkyil 'khor drug gi las mdzad nas// sku gsung thugs dbyings zhugs pa las// 'od zer

256a1(rgyud 'grel): byang lnga yi bdag nyid do// shel mdog karti 'od 'bar ba'i// ri bo nyi ma'i mdangs chags pa// bzhin 'dzum snum zhing nyams tshogs rgyas// chags tshul dang la bab pa bzhin// zhal phyag mtshungs 
256a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sde dmar ser// g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// g.yon pa kha T+wAM dril bur bcas// 'og ma gnyis kyi mda' dang gzhu// rin chen rgyan dang na bza' dang // mgul du do shal dpung rgyan dang // phyag zhabs gdu bu se 
256a3(rgyud 'grel): modo// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yi mdzes// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni// gnas lnga dag tu gdug bya ste// sngags kyis bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam// oM na maHsarba/ 
256a4(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta gu Na karma badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ lus kyib pa'i gnas rnams su// dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas// mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya// 
256a5(rgyud 'grel): oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rang 'od yum dang 'khril ba las// gsang gnas hUM dang aHsa brgyan te// ye shes rdo rje phaT dang bcas// rtse mo nor bu 'bar bas mtshan// rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can// mdog 
256a6(rgyud 'grel): sed lte bzi 'bru mar// sa ma ya sogs brdas bskul nas// dzA hU~M ba~M ho// sa rol pa rtsa// oM pra be sha ya phaT/ oM la la lal ho// bde ba chen po'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes mdzad de/ 
256a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i lus ngag yid rtog sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyan gyis brjid// stong gsum til gang 'bru 'dra rnams// thams cad 'od kyis slar bsdus nas// sangs rgyas drug gi yi ger gyur// ba spu'i
256a8(rgyud 'grel): bug kun tu thim// thugs ka'i gnas su zhu ba dang // 'dod chags chen po dga' ba'i mes// sku dang bcas pa 'od du gyur// sngon gyi gom shugs lha mo bzhes// phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul byas te/ 
256b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthu// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod ba dag/ ye shes gsal ba'i rgyud 
256b2(rgyud 'grel): bskul nas// thugs rjes 'gro la dmigs mdzad de// rgyu yi rjes mthun mgon po'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par 'gyur// mtshan ma rgyan sogs cha lugs dang // sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin// lus dang 
256b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag sems rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya// oM AHhUMHthugs gsal nyi ma la gnas pa'i// ye shes sems dpa' hU~M sngags bcas 
256b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis// las kun grub byed dngos grub gsal// 'od zer 'pho 'dra'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// thugs ka nas byung lha mo bzhis// bdud rtsi bum pas khrus byas nas/ 
256b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum dbang bskur dri bral byas// slar 'dus tshangs bug gnas su thim// mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag ma rdo rje thal mo bya// 
256b6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang lhag par sbyar// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol// rtse mo ngos rnams kun sprad nas// mthe bong rdo rjes mnan pa ni// sna dang mig phugs lta bu ste/ 
256b7(rgyud 'grel): gong bzhin mgo bo'i gnas lngar gtug/ rin chen thod phreng skur bcas 'gyur// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsi maM// sangs rgyas kun gyis rin chen mchog/ dpung rgyan kun tu brgyan par bya// oM rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM// dbu rgyan 
256b8(rgyud 'grel): bcings pas bcings nas ni// 'gying zhing mtha' nas grol bar bya// oM pa Ta laM ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M// dar gyis mtha' ma dpyangs pa ltar// byas nas thal mo brdab par bya// oM badz+ra tru Sh+ya ho// khams gsum 
257a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag na rin chen gzhan// sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin po che// dbu rgyan can ni de bas mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa// lha yi chu ni dag pa ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i

257a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// e ma'o// mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa// rang gi dam tshig rtag la rol cig rol cig to// yab yum gsang gnas hUM dang dzaH// rdo rje pad+ma 
257a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed byas nas// ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ba// brla yi dbus su gzhug byas te// ling ka rdo rjer byin brlabs nas// rdo rje sems sogs sku bstod do// byang chub sems de kun tu dag/ ma lus nye bar khyab byas 
257a5(rgyud 'grel): nas// 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung // gnas nas so so'i gdan dag la// chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed// hUM las rdo rje sems dpa' ste// dkyil 'khor 
257a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi gdan la'o// dzaHlas dpal ldan bde mchog ma// hU~M las e ma bde mchog ma// baM las lha mo snang mdzad ma// ho las de bzhin slob ma mo// 'di dag gtso bo'i phyogs bzhi yi// re'u cha'i gdan la 
257a7(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin gnas// oM las sangs rgyas byang chub ma// bruM las chos kyi 'khor lo ste// haM las khams gsum rnam rgyal yin// khaM las 'dod pa kun mdzad ma'o// 'di dag shar la sogs pa yi// ri mig 'khor lo'i 
257a8(rgyud 'grel): rtsal gnas// oM las gling butraM pi bi// pa~M las rnga chen rdza rngam// lha mo 'di bzhi me mtshams kyi// 'khor lo'i rtsel rin bzhin gnas// a las me tog A spos me// aM las mang me a dri chab/ 
257b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di mas kyi gnas pazhi dra// drim pa bzhin du skyed pag/ na // mgrin bar mthal grags bsrung // b+hag ya ga cug byas nas// de da nam gas pa \u0f7f/

257b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don dbyung b+h+yo// dza adz+ra tiSh+Tha sa ma ke mAdz+dza// mthar phyin rigs mthun las mdzad ma// phye 'dus shang gyi gdan lagan sa// e ma bde ba gser gyi mdog/ g.yas pa'i ling ga rdo rje mtshan// 
257b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i b+hag don chen snad// bde smos 'bying begs lnga phyogs su// tra~M batrai lI l-i 'aM rlung snang mdzad dmang ba g.yas pan// sngachags rdzag yon dgags/ bgying babs thod pa'i snod bdu / 
257b5(rgyud 'grel): rnaMg brtan chu phyogs gnas// skA ra taHzlab ma ma ni mngag ljang ser// gams kyis mdang mas bdag pa 'byung // g.yan pas dkyil tshul bdud rtsi'i snod// sangs rgyas sgra 'dzin 
257b6(rgyud 'grel): byang gi phyogs// ho badz+ra kA me sha ri ting // kun kyang rgyan bcas zhi ba'i mdadres// 'od kyi dkyil 'bang 'bar ba mdzes// chags pa bzhin 'dzum bteg pa'i mchog/ bdag pa chags tshul bskul bar byed/

258a1(rgyud 'grel): lo dkar mdangs ser// g.yas pa'i gung mo'i rtse mo la// 'khor lo rtsa brgyad gnyis brtsegs bstod// 'khor lo'i lho phyogs rtse la gnas// oM badz+ra me g+he gu lu gu lu bruM dz+dzaH// khams

258a3(rgyud 'grel): mo ljang gu'i mdog/ phyag gnyis dpag bas ma me tog shing // lhag ma rlung gis bskyod pa 'dzin// gar mdzad 'khor lo'i byang du gnas// oM khaM badz+ra she shi hU~M hU~M dz+dza// gling bu sngon mo rdo rje mtshan/ 
258a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sgra sngags ma yi phyogs// e he ti badz+ra pi la san rmA.Adz+dza// ba~M bas po rdo rjes mtshan// klu dbyangs drug ldan bden bral byugs// bair tri / hU~M// rnga dza mar mdzadza 'aH/

258a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhong thogs mi yi mtshams su gnas// oM puSh+pe dz+dzaH/ spos me dkar sngon rdo rjes mtshan// spog thogs bden bral mtshams su gnas// oM badz+ra d+hU pe dza// mar me dmar po rdo rjes mtshan// gsal 'dzin

258a8(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu rta mgo ljang gung shar// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHphag gdong nag mo zhags pa g.yon// g.yas pas che ba lho yi sgor// badz+ra pA sha hU~M dz+nyA// snang ba dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis// nyi zla lcags 
258b1(rgyud 'grel): srog na rdzogs// da kyi la ts+tsha// tham byed pang gragasas d+hil na// g.yon pas ban dusmra bcas b+h+yAM/ 'dzud+haHsodang ldan 'di dag mdzes pa'i mdangs// den rten rgyan dang phreng bsdu bcur 
258b2(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyen ye shes las grub phyir// dkyil 'khor lha rnams thams cad kyi// mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// rna ba rdo rje nyi ma brgya// khal pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ sA la rta mchog rol pa mchog/ yid la rdo rje he ru 
258b3(rgyud 'grel): ka/ lus la rdo rje sems dpa'o// gnas gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs ldan zhing // thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// rang rigs dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// dbang bskur rigs kyi mtshan ma bsam// 
258b4(rgyud 'grel): lag gnyis gar thabs bskyod byas te// g.yas g.yon mdun rol bskor bar bya// rdo rje bcing ba'i rgya gnyis pas// rdo rje se gol brdab par bya// dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pa khyab pa'i sku// spyan 'dren 
258b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol bar mi dmigs kyang // thugs rje'i ngang nyid chos sku dag pa las// ye shes sgyu mas rol cing gshegs su gsol// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' stobs bcu'i shugs ldan zhing // ma 'dres
258b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu rdzogs// dpa' bo chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// mkha' gro kun dang thabs gcig gshegs su gsol// thugs rje chen po'i sku mnga' gsung gnyis rdzogs// mi 'jigs
258b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs mnga' seng ge bskyod du med// gdug pa'i tshogs mang zil gyis gnon mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'gro la brtse slad gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM ho/ \u0f7fe h+ye hi b+ha ga ban// ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ tr-i sh+ya ho// 
258b8(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rdo rje gang las byung ba yi// dgug gzhug bcing dang pad+ma'i rgya// bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/ 'gro ba ma lus bsgral pa'i phyir// don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas 
259a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol// oM AHhUM/ kA ya bAk+Shit+ta tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM/ dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// sri zhur bcas shing bteg 
259a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam g.yos thal mo sbyar bar bya// sgra 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 
259a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam par mdzes// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad pa'i// rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnams mtha' yas// snang stong gnyis med 
259a4(rgyud 'grel): bde chen dbyings la rol// kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod rang las byung // mdzad pa rgya chen 'grogs med kun grub pas// tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs 
259a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// sna tshogs sku sprul rigs kyi sku gnas mchog/ zab cing rgya che gsung dbyings rdo rje'i glu// ye shes zag med thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs// rin chen tshogs kyis legs spras kun 'byung zhing / 
259a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan spyod tshogs las rnams 'bras mthar phyin// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// oM AHhUM/ a ti b+hu ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta ni kA ro ya mi a la la la ho// oM a ti b+he hUM/ ta thA/ 
259a7(rgyud 'grel): gtas ma yo ga sid+d+hi A hUM// skad kyi gsang ni mtho dman dang // gre 'gyur hUM las sogs pa'i gus// 'gying la sogs pa'i tshul bcas nas// ji lta'i tshul bzhin gang byed cing // bskor ba'i ga rnams sna 
259a8(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// oM pan pen be nu su ra to// di pu par mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sam yog sid d+hi AHhUM// gyen du 'thong dang thung du 'bebs// gsal me 'dregs samra/ 
259b1(rgyud 'grel): so so'i rgya// gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // rgyud mang rgyad drug sil snyan brdung // dngos 'byor 'phrul pa gang yang rung // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya// oM A hUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la 
259b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// a la la ste mchod par 'bul// a la la snyed ma// 
259b3(rgyud 'grel): chog bskongs// a la la ste dgyes par mchod// a la la sted dngas grub rtsol// dgyes mnyam longs spyod mchog la rol// oM shI rI rA ga hUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ AHbadz+ra d+hU be d+hu/ a badz+ra a lo ki hrIH/ A badz+ra/ 
259b4(rgyud 'grel): gan+d+he gaM/ oM he ra ti badz+ra bi la sin traT/ he re ti badz+ra g+hi te te te/ he ra ti badz+ra hA se ha ha tsa~M/ he ra ti badz+ra nr-i t+ye pi pe be pa dza/ a la la li la haM/ tshad med bzhi'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor mdun bskul g.yo byas/ 
259b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// dga' ba'i khams snyoms 'od dpung tshogs// ma 'dres so so'i gnas su bstim// hUM sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gas rab mchog gi dges pa 
259b6(rgyud 'grel): na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// bde ba kun la zhen pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku// 'dod chags kun la chags
259b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// chags pa chen po'i bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di// dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// bdan gsum pa'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje rtse lnga thugs dkar gdod// kha thA ba ngan

260a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum pa'i zhal// dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang // pad+mo 'dod chags rnam dag phyir// brla yi dbus ni dkar la dmar// phyag mtshig lo ma sngon po 'dra// de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang // bde bar reg

261a8(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul// mchog grub bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnams// rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du/ 
261b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHkye bde ba chen po'i mchog kun gyi// bde bas zung la rnam par 'phrul par mdzod// hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol// a la la ho// bde gshegs mkha' gro slob ma bzung du gsol// mtshan ma'i

262a2(rgyud 'grel): med mchod pa'i phyir// mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol// hUM mahA su kha bi d+hi tsit+ta a la la ho a la la ho// oM mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal/

263a8(rgyud 'grel): dmigs te// kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod rgyas par// dmigs pa gcig bzhin gsal bar ru// brtan par gyur nas spro bar bya// rgya cher gnas gsum rdo rje la// bum pa'i khang par dkyil 'khor bsgom/

263b2(rgyud 'grel): phreng babacu yong bas// mgal me'i 'tshar lo'i rnam pa bzhin// gnas ldan pa da med par bcas// hrIn rlung rdza srin ma// mang me na'i'i 'dra bzhin du// zag le rgyas pa'i dkyil 'bar gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i 
263b3(rgyud 'grel): lam la sbyor// gnyis med rol pa'i mtha' gsang du// gtso bo'i mtshan mags la zung nas// bum par rten dang rten pa'i sgra// gtsab nas gzung rim par bsgom// phyag tu rgyan mas chalugs kyi// rigs kyi dkyil
