263b5(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin mtshan ma lnga yi bar// lha rnams kun skyong gnas rgyas par// rnam gcig su lags pa ji lta bar// spro dang bsdu ba'i tshul brtan pa// pra rags dkyil 'khor mthar phyin pa'o// des na phrin las dngos grub kyi// 
263b6(rgyud 'grel): phra mo'i las kun brtsams pas 'grub// de ltar thog le phra ma'i tshul// dkyil 'khor lha yin mad granyis// mtshan mas dmigs pa sbyang byas te// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por gnas// gang zag pazhi yis dbya ba yis// 
263b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi phrin las sbyor ba'i mthus// bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi rdzogs te// mchog gyur phyag rgya bzhi mthar phyin// bsnyen sgrub sbyor ba bzhi dag gis// dang po'i dkyil 'khor mnyes byas pa// spyi yi bsnyen pa dang po ste/ 
263b8(rgyud 'grel): thun mongs bzhi yis dkyil 'khor yin// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod pas// bar chad med par zhi rgyas dbang // phrin las sna tshogs sgo dganas// nye ba'i brten pa brtsam 
264a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi las la 'jug/ dang po zhi ba chen po'i las// rgyud sbyang bsrung zhing lhag gnas dang // dngos grub shis pa brtag pa'i phyir// rnam snang dkyil 'khor nye bar bsnyen/ 
264a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid nas brtsam bya ste// phreng bas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom// nang gi dkyil 'khor dbyings dag re// ra'u mig zlum po 'khor los brgyan// 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par spras// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan gyis 
264a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan// phyi rol ra ba dur khrod dang // kun 'byung 'khor yug tu bzhis mtshan// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// mgon po rgyu yi sems dpa' skyed// sku mdog rgyun chanas bzung ste// byin rlabs rdzogs/ 
264a4(rgyud 'grel): pas dag par bya// rang 'od rig pa bskyed pa nas// lha mos bskul pa'i mthar thugs brtsam// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i rgyud gzigs te// kham dang 'khor lo las byung ste// zhing oM pre khaM gis bskyed pa'i// 
264a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dul phyir rnam snang mdzad du gyur// gser mdo gzhal bzhi phyag bzhis mdzes// zhal gsum dkar dmar ljang gu'i mdog/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la// sna tshogs mtshan mas brgyan pa 'am// lhun bzed
264a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhar gsil chos gos dang // dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam 'dzin// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yi spras// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas/ 
264a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur zhing // dbul rigs kyi bdag pas brgyan// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du// ji ltar rigs pas mnyam sbyar nas// mdzub mos mthe ba rtse mo bzhi/ 
264a8(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su// dpral ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya// aM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// rin chen myu gu 'khor lo'i phreng // ngar dbyangs dgyes pa'i thal mar bcas// rang 'od yum dang 'khrel ba nas/ 
264b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas kham dang shaM brgyan te// ling ga 'bar ba'i rin chen phaT// rtse mo 'khor lo rnam par mdzes// rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can// mdog ser lte ba ze 'bru dmar// sa ma ya sogs brdas bskul nas/ 
264b2(rgyud 'grel): dzaHhUM baM ho// sa rol pa bya// ling ga 'greng ba rang byung ba// brla yi dbus su gzhug byas nas// ling ga mtshan mar byin brlabs te// rdo rje dbyings dag sngon kye'o// gsang gnas so so'i gdan dag la/ 
264b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed// khaM las rnam par snang mdzad nyid// dbus kyi gdan la bsgom par bya// shaM las sangs rgyas dbyangs ma ste// raM las de bzhin dpa' mo ma// maM las kun tu bzang mo yin// 
264b4(rgyud 'grel): thilas zad med snod 'dzin ma'o// 'di bzhi'i gtso bo'i phyogs rnams su// pho brang pad+ma bzhi la gnas// haM las sangs rgyas sku ldan ma// cha las lha mo zhal mdzes mo// traM las de bzhin sprin chen mo// daM las nam 
264b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i spyan ma yin// gling bu ma sogs lha mo rnams// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// b+ha gar li ga bcug byas nas// der ni mtshan ma bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs 'dra ba'i// sku gnyis 
264b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa spro bya'o// oM b+ha khaM dza dza// phyogs bcur don byas 'dus pa dag/ gtso bo yab yum la gzhug bya// sangs rgyas dbyangs mchu shel mangs rgyan mdzes lce yi phyag rgyas mtshan// oM badz+ra satwa shaM
264b7(rgyud 'grel): dz+dza/ dpal mog ser mdog phyag gnyis kyis// cha lang 'khrol zhing gar mdzad pa'o// oM badz+ra rat+na rad+b+ha/ kun tu bzang mo dmar gsal mdangs// phyag gnyis rdo rje rin po che// oM badz+ra d+harma mad+d+ha/ 
264b8(rgyud 'grel): zad med snod 'dzin sna tshogs mdog/ rgyan chas snod dang dung 'dzin pa'o// oM badz+ra karma thadz+dza/ 'di bzhi dbus kyi lha mo ste// phyag rgya'i sku dang 'khrig par bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun ldan me long mdog 
265a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis mi bskyod thug kar 'dzin// haM satwa badz+ra dz+nyA/ zhal mdzes sngo skya phyag gnyis kyis// me long mdangs gsal rlung yab 'dzin// tshe badz+ra rat+to dz+dza/ sprin chen bai DU n+ya mdog phyag 
265a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i sprin las ser ba 'beb// ta~M badz+ra pad+me dzA/ nam mkha'i spyan mgur gum mdog/ phyag na pad+ma la gnas spyan// dr-i bi shwa badz+ra dz+nyA/ 'di dag phyogs kyi 'khor lo la// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// lha mo 
265a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag mdzes pa'i mdangs// rin chen dang phreng bas brgyan// byin rlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byas pas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur// sbyor bas rang rig dkyil 'khor bskul// zhi ba'i tshul 
265a4(rgyud 'grel): ban+d+has mdun du bzhugs// rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur// bsam pa g.yos pas phyag rgya'o// oM a ti b+hu oM// gar bsgyur rdo rje thul mo bsgyur// g.yon bskor spyi bo'i mtshams su bzhag/ bskal bzang 
265a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir// sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// don dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// bcom gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la sogs chags chen phyir/ 
265a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrub pa// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de las theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can// g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung
265a7(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yis// sor mo kun la rig pa ni// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol tu phyin gsal yin// g.yas pa'i 
265b1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyas// sems dpa'i skyil mo grung bcas na// dpung rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// oM b+ha khaM ma hA mu dra oM// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas kyang //

266a1(rgyud 'grel): phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa// sprul pa'i sku rnams rab dag tu// phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni// srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs// rnam 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran

267a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+mo gar bdag sngon skye'o// gsang gnas so so'i gdan dag la// chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed// hrIHlas pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ gsang gnas dbus kyi gdan la bsgom// dzaHyis rnam par

267a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar g.yas 'byed shar// oM sarba te thA ga te pid+ma maMdz+nyA// sgrol ma dkar gsal g.yon dkur brten// ut+pa la sngo g.yas bud med lho// oM badz+ra pad+mi dz+nyA/ rgyan can dmar mo g.yon pad dkar/

269a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar bas mtshan// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mtshan// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas//

274a4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' phyin gsang sngags rgyal po yis// las kyi sbyor ba kun brtsam bya// mnyes shing mgron tshim las grub byed// tshogs dang sbyin sreg lhag pa'i las// las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul byas shing // 
274a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gnas su bsdus nas ni// mtshan ma kun dang yongs bral ba'i// mnyam nyid dbyings su gnas par bya// thams cad namakha'i mtshan nyid de// na mkha'i la yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsul 
274a6(rgyud 'grel): dag ni malus pa// thams cad sgyu ma k+ta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams da // mthing ba dang ni rig par 'gyur// dmigs su med pa ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro bkun gyi la// dbug byung dkyil 
274a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam dag drug/ sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan par bya// sbyor dang rjes su sbyor ba dang // shin tu spyod dang sbyor chen po// ye shes tsam la sems 'jug pa// sbyor ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// yum 
274a8(rgyud 'grel): ldan byin brlabs rol pas mchod// gzug pa rjes su sbyor ba'o// dag mdzad dkyil 'khong rdzogs byas nas// 'bro 'du shin tu sbyor ba yin// byin brlabs dbang bskur las rdzogs pa/ 
274b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o// sgru ba chen dngos grub tshul bzhin du// mtshan brtags gsal ba'i gnas shes pas// bdag gzhan don tshogs las sbyar te// re dogs mtha' kun bral bas blang // 
274b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid nas brtsam bya ste// phreng bas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom// nang gi dkyil 'khor dbyibs dag ni// thig bzhis rnam par phye ba la// so so'i bo brang ji lta bar// rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor 
274b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i tshul// dbus su rigs bdag 'khor lo ste// shar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// lho phyogs rdo rje drag po'i tshogs// nub tu pad+mo rnam dag chos// byang phyogs yon tan rin chen mdzod// 
274b4(rgyud 'grel): shar mtshams bzhi dkyil sdud pa'i tshul// lho mtshams drag po sreg byed ltar// nub mtshams dbang mdzad g.yo ba'i bzhin// byang mtshams rgyas pa dbang chen ltar // rang rang phreng bas mdzes 
274b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// pho brang kha dog rin chen bani// sna tshogs pad ma gdan gyis mtshan// phyi rol ra ba dur khrod dang // kun 'byung khor yug tu bzhis mtshan// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis/ 
274b6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po rgyu yis sems dpa' bskyed// sku mdog rgyun chan sa bzung ste// byin brlab rdzogs pas dag par bya// rang 'od rig ma bskyed pa nas// lha mo bskul ba'i mthar thug par// thugs rjes 
274b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro rgyud la gzigs nas// 'od kyi gang bralas 'gro ba'i// thig le rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs// phyogs mtshams dbus kyi lte ba ni// yi ge'i 'phra 'dus mthon ma ste// sngags kyi phyag rgya chen po 
274b8(rgyud 'grel): su/ sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan chas dang // cha lugs so sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang 
275a1(rgyud 'grel): bskur zhing // dbus la rigs kyi bdag pos mtshan// so so'i dbang bskur phyag rgya dang // rang gi gsang sngags bcas pa'o// rin chen myu gu la sogs dang / 
275a2(rgyud 'grel): dar dbyangs dges pa'i thal mor bcas// so so'i yum dang 'khril ba las// gsang gnas byin brlabs bcas bskul te// snyoms 'jug chos kyi snying po las// rigs dgu'i 
275a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsal bas bsgom// phyi nang sngags kyis spro mdzad nas// rang rigs dkyil 'khor gnas la 'khod// byin brlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byas pas// dam tshig dkyil

275a5(rgyud 'grel): nas shes ye shes byi brag gis// dkyil 'khor drug gi rim pa bzhin// yi ge gcig pa'i sngags bzlas shing // las bzhi'i bsgral sngags gsang ba las// mtha' brgyan gyur pas

275a7(rgyud 'grel): mthun 'dams byed cing // 'dzung las khams gsum gas par 'byung // mda' yis thab 'jigs byed cing // dal zlas lha me thong byed 'jams// brdas lnga ma la bzlas 'grags/ 
275a8(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum lha dbang dul 'gyur zhing // bum pas bkra shis bdud rtsi 'grub// rgya thams 'og gser 'gyur gyi// nyi mas gser mdog 'od dang ldan// lcags kyus srid pa'i rtse mo 
275b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro// nor bus grong khyer rgyas par byed// me long mngon par shes pa 'grub// bi baM sna tshogs gsung sgrogs shing // gling bus chos kyi tshig brjod pa'o// gzhan yang gzugs sogs mang 
275b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i// yul drug snang ba'i mtshan mthun// ting 'dzin sngags dang las sbyar zhing // bcom ldan par tshad med pas bzung // g.yas g.yon nyizla'i dkyil 'tshar la// yab yums pan

279b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i shar phyogs su// las kun pa dang rgyas pa brtsam// byang du zhi ba lhor mngon spyod// nub du dbang dang dgug pa'i las// thabs khud kun gyi nang rgya ru// khru gang zabs su phyed brkos shing //

284a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal chen po// sngo nag 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin// rdo rje gshin rje dus kyi tshogs// mdog dmar glegs pa mkhram shing thog/ rdo rje gshin rje sdang ba 'joms// ser skya rtse gsum ba dan dril// rdo rje gshin 
284b1(rgyud 'grel): rje khro bo mchog/ sngon garal gri thod khrag sha/ rdo rje gshin rje'i 'khor lo'i gdan// dud ka 'khor lo phreng ba me// rdo rje gshin rje mdung 'dzin gnon// sngo skya gdung rtse gsum pa rlung // rdo rje gshin rje 
284b2(rgyud 'grel): mda' 'dzin rgyal// dmar skya mda' gzhu glog phreng rgyan// rdo rje gshin rje thub pa che// sngo gnag gri gug thod khrag sprin// dur khrod cha che gtum pa yi// mkha' gro 'jigs byed brgyad rnams kun 
284b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog nag mun pa'i tshogs ltar gtibs// lag na gri gug thod khrag sha/ dus 'dzin 'chi bdag bzlog byed cing // ma mo'i skrod pa'i gdon la brtson// oM nub phyogs rdo rje klu yi tshogs// byang chub sems 
284b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs bu las sprul// rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs byin brlabs can// rin chen 'bar ba'i sprul mtho'i rgyan// pho brang rin chen khang mdzes na// bdud ci'i rgya mtsho rdzing bu'i tshogs// btsun mo yum tshogs 
284b5(rgyud 'grel): byung gas// sa rgyu nas// phun sus ye// zung / 
284b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'jog po dmar mdangs can// sprin phung po rin chen char 'bebs mdzad// rdo rje kar ko Ta nag po// rin chen phreng ba pad+ma'i rgyu// rdo rje pad+ma chu shel mdangs// 'dod pa'i zhal zas bdud nI'i rgyun// 
284b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje pad chen dkar skya'i mdangs// me tog ut+pal sgra snyan sgrogs// rdo rje dung skyong gser gyis mdog/ phreng ba ljong shing me tog rgyan// rdo rje rigs ldan sna tshogs sku// chu srin rin chen gter mdzod 
284b8(rgyud 'grel): sbyor// oM byang chuganod sbyin 'jigs pa'i gtso// pho brang rin chen gnas kyi bdag/ me'u thung zugs 'dra stobs ldan pa// byang sems rigs sogs haM las sprul// rin chen bu ma tshogs
285a1(rgyud 'grel): nor bu'i tshogs// pad+ma bdun rtsegs rin chen khri// dpag bsam rgyan phreng bum pa'i lho// rgyal blon btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas// rdo rje gang bzang chu shel mdog/ rin chen ma kha 
285a2(rgyud 'grel): dzad thugs la mdangs// jirje bram bzung gser sa phra// cigasum nub pa la nan na// n+tu// nong dran chedan phreng ba'i chags// rdorjen ma thos gser gyim dngas 
285a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten rin chen dbyug pa thogs// rdo rje lus ngan ljang skya'i 'od// rin chen dbyug pa lcug ma'i rgyun// rdo rje gnon 'jigs mthing shun mdog/ ral gri ut+pal me tog phreng // rdo rje gnon gnas 
285a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i mdangs// shing thog me'u le'i sbrul bu 'thor// rdo rje sde bzang in+d+ra'i maudag/ glegs bum rin chen bum pa'i chu// khro gnyer spyan dmar dbu spu 'khril// mche ba cung zad 'dzum 
285a5(rgyud 'grel): mdangs brgyan// rin chen go cha mtshan sna chags// 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis myos// oM mtshams kyi rgyal chen dpa' bo'i dpung // rang gi 'khor tshigs 'dul mdzad pa// byang chub sems

285a7(rgyud 'grel): srad bus brgyan// rdo rje srin po dmar ser 'od// nu srin pad+ma 'jigs byed gzugs// rdo rje rlung lha dud kha'i mdog/ ba dan phreng ba kha mang rgya// rdo rje dbang ldan in+d+ra rin// be con rtse gsum 'od 
285a8(rgyud 'grel): phreng 'phrengs// bdun pa'i 'khor tshags las mdzad pa// nga skyes nu srin sha bdang // mdzong ldan la rin chen brgyad// 'dod pa'i longs stod dga' zer rol// mi grwa bzhi pa nya mthun pa'i grogs// 
285b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dam can spyong mdzad pa// steng 'og nyin mtshan dus 'byed cing // byang chub sems tshogs spyod ldan pas// tshad med bzhi yis rnam par rol// sa bon sum tsaM pra taM las// 'byung ba'i gzi 
285b2(rgyud 'grel): brjid 'od po che// btsun mo dam pa'i gnas longs spyod// blon po ded dpon dpung bcas pas// dam chos bstan ba rgyas par mdzad// rdo rje nyi ma me shel mdangs// pad+ma rin chen shing rtar ldan// 
285b3(rgyud 'grel): rdorje zla ba chu shel 'od// bdud rtsi ku mu dang pa'i khri// rdo rjes 'dzin gser gyi mdog/ bum pa bgrang phreng pad+ma'i gdan// rdo rje thag bzangs btsod kyi mdog/ gos mtshon 'brug gi khril gnas/ 
285b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs rten gsam la mnga' mdzad pa'i// stobs ldan phrin las myur ba'i tshul// oM bde gshegs sras tshogs bka' nyan bran// mkhar gro'i rgyal pa rgyal monams// rnam pa rang gi gzugs nyid la// 
285b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bde gshegs su gsung thugs// phyag rgya rnam bzhi dbu brgyan dang // rigs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ba'i// rgyal ba'i sras tshogs thugs rje can// bka' gsang dam tshig byos la/ 
285b6(rgyud 'grel): spad byung mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis// rigs 'dzin sgrub pa'i grogs mdzod cig/ dgra gegs nad padon par chad rnams// phrin las kun gyis 'dul mdzad cing // tshe dbang bkra shis bde legs tshogs/ 
285b7(rgyud 'grel): dus kun tu ni rgyas par mdzod// oM phyi rol mtshogs mkha 'gro'i sku// thams cad 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// sna tshogs dbang phyug phrin las kyi// rtag tu rang gi dod brtson zhing // drag po mkha' 'khor tshogs/ 
285b8(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pas// gzhan don las la rnam par rol// sprul pa yang sprul 'jigs pa'i gzugs// bsod don sha grag las da// shang kyi rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gtso// gzugs chen na mkha'i gyos bya 
286a1(rgyud 'grel): keng rus rnam par 'gyur ba dang // mkha' chen 'dra ba'i skra ma che// rdo rje'i thogs 'bebs mthu rtsal can// mun pa'i tshogs 'joms snang ba'i sku// rdo rje rigs tshogs mkha' gro'i rgyu la/

286a3(rgyud 'grel): me ltar 'phro// gtum pa'i rngam tshig 'brag bzhin sgrogs// shar gyi gnas mchog lhun po'i rtse// dkyil 'khor 'bar po'i las mdzod cig/ lho phyogs rin chen 'od mdzes brgyan// byang chub gnas
286a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung rdzu 'phrul che// khro ga nyer 'jigs pa'i sprul pa can// gshin rje'i tshogs 'joms mche ba zogs// 'od chen khams gsum khyab pa mo// rin chen dbyug pa'i klu dbyangs sgrogs// sngon 'gro ral 
286a5(rgyud 'grel): tho bid zag 'thung // 'tshar mo ga ri mem pa dang // bdud kyi zab shing gags pa bdud// ce gsum mag zod bum bu dang // dra ba lpags kyu bang bathogs// 'jigs pa'i 'od 'bar rig chen gnas/

286a8(rgyud 'grel): 'then thag zangs drung dang // mkha' lding mi snying khrag 'dzag ma// mda' yi me tog ldug ma dang // rdo rje'i phreng ba thod dbyug 'chang // po'i nags tshal lcug ma can// khams gsum 'khrug pa'i khrag mtsho nas/ 
286b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang po srid gsum chags mdzad spyan// byang gi rdo rje las mchog gtso// kun tu bzang mo yid kyi shugs// rdo rje gnon byed dpa' mo'i mchog/ dpal ldan bzang mo'i rgyan chas can// 'bar ba'i spyan can

286b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul 'khor me tog lcug ma dang // rtse gsum ba danA mi yi rkang // gnod byed stobs mchog 'jigs pa'i ri// byang gi gdum 'phrul rol pa'i tshogs// ma mo mkha' gro gzugs can rnams// dam tshig 
286b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi gnas grub mdzad// oM bud+d+ha DA ki ni maM pa li ta pra tits+tsha ho oM phaT kha'i// oM badz+ra DA kI ni me ba li ta pra tits+tsha ho hUMHphaT ba'i// oM rat+na DA kI ni maM pa lai ta pra tits+tsha ho tr-i phaT kha'i// oM pad+ma DA krI ni maM ba laM ta 
286b5(rgyud 'grel): pa tits+tsha ho hr-i biT khA'i/ oM kaR+Ya DA DA da ma ba li ta pra tiSh+Tha ho haM phaT kha'i/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra tits+tsha ho/ shrI b+ha ga bAn/ kha kha She/ le le le/ 
286b6(rgyud 'grel): lag mig gi tshul// gung mthebs gnyis gdangs rtse sprad pa// mthe'u chung gyen dubasgreng ba'i rgyas// 'jig rten pa yi las tshogs rnams// phyogs kun dngos grub rgyas byed pa'o// oM pad+ma ba mu kaR+Sha sid+d+hi NAM/ 
287a1(rgyud 'grel): bcangs pa yi// mthe bo'i rtse bzhi mche ba'i tshul// mchod gtor phyogs kun gnas bsgyur bas// las kun bya ba mthar phyin 'gyur// oM badz+ra e sa hUM// pU sa hUM/ sa ma ya bak+Sha 
287a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM lu ru lu hUM b+h+yohU~M/ phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin ljags bcas ldan// gtor ma'i las bskul gnas su gting // sngar log dkyil 'khor ma nyams thos// bkra shis dngos grub bskul bar bya/ 
287a3(rgyud 'grel): oM dngos grub dbang phyug yang dag bden pa'i stobs// phun sum tshogs pa kun tu 'byung ba'i gzhi// stobs mchog mi 'jigs gdon bral 'tshe ba med// bcom ldan bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog

287b1(rgyud 'grel): brtan par shog/ las rdzogs rnal 'byor pho mo kun// lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgyas 'brel// oM mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'gyur ba med pa lhun gyis grub pa dang // rab 'byams 
287b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i bka' la dbang thob nas// 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du 'gyur bar shog/ 'di lta bu'i man ngag lung ston cing // bka' drin che ba'i dge ba'i gshe na gnyen dang // srog gi lu gu rgyud kyi 'brel pa

287b8(rgyud 'grel): rgya rgya chen sgom// tshul bzhin the tshom med pas 'grub// de ltar byin brlabs myur ba'i mthus// las kyi rtog tshogs rab 'jigs pa'o// sbyor ba ji snyed yod pa kun// byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la// 
288a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya// dngos grub thams cad rab grub pa'o// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // khyab par du ni dbrog pa dag/ yan lag kun tu byed pa'i nang // des ni nor rnams

289b1(rgyud 'grel): na// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu yis 'gram// lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis// gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang // khrus byas pa dang phogs pa yis// phyogs mtshams//

289b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun tu kun gyi bdag/ thams cad bsrung ba mi 'gyur che// mi mthun gdon sogs mos la zhi// sna tshogs pad+mo la 'byed pas// sgrib pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// 'bar bas blta 
289b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul bzhugs na// rdo rje 'bar ba mi bzad 'grub// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// go cha bgo ba'i tshul du bya// 'di yis bsrung bar byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra/ 
289b7(rgyud 'grel): mi chod pa dang mi byed pa'i// rdo rje'i sku ni rab tu 'grub// dus rnams kun tu 'gro gzhan dag/ bsod nams tshe 'phel longs spyod tshogs// 'khrul 'khor phyag rgya sngags kyi mthus// bde gshegs
289b8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sgyur rgyal stobs// lha dbang klu yis dbang sogs kyis// 'dod yon rin chen gnyer sogs dpal// lang tshe tshe dbang nad med bde// yon tan rgyas pa'i tshogs 'phel 'gyur/ 
290a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rin ched 'phreng // mu khyud yi ge'i phreng bas mdzes// rigs mchog lha'i mtshan ma sngags// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i tshul du dgod// bsam bya bris shing / 
290a2(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa dag/ byin brlabs brtan par 'gyur med gnas// chos sems pa yi tshul ston cing // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dag dang // zhi sogs lta bas bltas na ni// rims dug nad rnam par sel// 
290a3(rgyud 'grel): rdorje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mthe'u chung lcags kyu lta bur spel// mdzub mo bsams pa'i rtse mo man// nad rnams thams cad bzlog par byed// yongs su gyur te bteg nas su/ 
290a4(rgyud 'grel): dpral bar legs par bzhag par bya// ma lus lus pa med pa yis// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje bsdams pa byas pa las// mdzub mo phan chu mngon phyogs pa/ 
290a5(rgyud 'grel): zug rngu kun las grol 'gyur zhing // nang rnams kun gyis gnod pa med// grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcings nas// de yis phyis mig longs pas mthong // sbyor ldan khu tshur dam pa yis/ 
290a6(rgyud 'grel): slad nas kha nas drangs te btung // de bzhin rims gnod dug rnams kun// sbyor ldan khu tshur tshul gyis btung // oM sarba ta thA ga R+Sha ta mis ho// 'di ni rna bar bzlas pa'i mchog/ zug rngu med 
290a7(rgyud 'grel): cing 'bar ba'i mchog/ zug rngu med cing 'bar ba'i mchog/ lag g.yas sems dpa'i gtsug tor bcing // byis pa nad med bde bar bsrung // g.yas pa klu'i mgo'i gdengs ka brgya// 'bar ba'i tshul ston 'bebs bcas pas// 
290a8(rgyud 'grel): dug gi las rnams 'dul byed de// 'chi ba'ang 'tshe bar byed pa'i mchog/ g.yas pa'i mthe bo gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcings pa yi// gung mo la ni reg byas te// gdon rnams 
290b1(rgyud 'grel): kun las thar bar 'gyur// ba dan gsum po gnyis bcings nas// gung mo gnyis ni bdud par bcings// mdzub mo mthe'u chung rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bsgyur bteg/ smin mtshams bzhag pas 
290b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha'agro yi// las rnams ma lus lus med 'grub// sbyor ba sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus// glang po rtagya 'gro ba'i tshogs// skyed tshal me tog ldumar rnams// thams cad gsob bla na med// thams cad/ 
290b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kun spyod pa'i// gnas gsum 'khrul 'khor bsngo ba'i rgya// thun mong khams gsum las la byang // dus 'dir dngos grub las tshogs 'joms// mchog gi phyag rgya ye shes sku// 'dod 
290b4(rgyud 'grel): don 'bras bu 'di sbyor dpa la// chags pa gnyis tshul longs spyad pas// 'bras bzang mdzad pa chen po 'grub// khu tshur snying gar bcings pa ni// bud med phyag rgyar de bshad de// bud med sbyor 
290b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan pad+ma sna tshogs 'dzin// g.yon pa brdeg pa'i khu tshur dang // g.yas pa sdang ba 'grub pa dang // sangs rgyas dbang phyug ting 'dzin bya// g.yon pa dril bu sgra sgrogs shing / 
290b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis// rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing bskor// sgyu ma thams cad dbyung bar bya// lag pa g.yon pa bla ma bzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis// sbyor ba sngags kyi 
290b7(rgyud 'grel): mdangs bcas pa// mi dge'i las rnams sel bar byed// bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du// g.yon pa nor bu rin chen 'dzin// g.yas nas de rdzogs rin chen bdun// bsam pa thams cad 
291a1(rgyud 'grel): / yongs rdzogs byed// bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du// pad+ma sna tshogs pa yi 'dzin// g.yas pa rdo rje 'gying pa yis// dbang phyug dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// drag po las kyi 
291a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad pa'i// mtshon chagasang sngags spu gri'i 'os// gnod gdug phyi nang dgra bgegs sogs// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'ching bar byed// mtshon cha lnga yi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum 
291a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dul byed rgyal bar gyur// dbyibs dang bde blage sbyor ba dang // kun tu sbyor dang 'dren dang myur// 'gengs dang 'phen dang gsal ba yis// drag po'i las rnams kun la sbyor// drag shul sbyor 
291a4(rgyud 'grel): bas gnod pa yi// 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba sngags ljon pas// rkang pa brkyang dang gnod pa dang // bskums nas 'debs pa'i stabs dag gis// g.yas g.yon sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ches/

291b6(rgyud 'grel): dgrol// dar dbyangs dkar dmar bzhi 'phur zhing // thal mo brdabs pas brtan par bya// rdzas rnams legs par bskol nas kyang // rdul tshon chu bo chen por dor// ba yi rnam lngas legs byug

291b8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bkang byas te// brda'i mtshams la sogs pa dgrol// srung mtshogs mchod btad rag gtang // spyod lam ma nyams

301a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / mchod pa thams cad kyi gtor ma'i phyag rgya shes pa rdzas dag kyang byin gyis brlabs te bzhag par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsrung bar bya zhing sta gon gyi lha rnams kyi gnas su dgod do// 
301a5(rgyud 'grel): yang rdo rje rgyal po bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang rten gyi ting 'dzin dang / dmigs pa dang po gnyis kyis 'khor mnyes par byas nas gsol ba gdab po// de nas rnal 'byor pho mo rgyan dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu thog te yi ge 
301a6(rgyud 'grel): brgya pas bskang zhing / stang stabs dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor la lan bdun du bskor ro// de nas rdo rje rgyal po dang / rgyal mtheb dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / brda sbyor ba dang / rdul 
301a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag la sogs pa so sor bye ste/ so sor gdan bshams zhing dgod par bya'o// de dag snga ma'i gnas ji lta ba las/ phyis mi 'gyur bar rang rang gi rnal 'byor gyis 'khod cing phyogs kun nas langs te/ 
301a8(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dag gis byin phab nas// gnas dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa mnga' gsol lo// de nas gsang ba'i theg pa'i 'jug sgo shes pas// gzhan las dpag par bya ba'i phyir brda' 
301b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo dbye// tha mal gyi tshig spang zhing // rdo rje rgyal mtheb kyi sgo nas lus kyi brda la gnas par bya zhing / phyogs bzhin sa phyag 'tshal zhing gsol ba gdab ste/ sbyor ba'i gar thabs kyis gnas par bya'o// 
301b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang dur khrod kyi bdag po la sogs pa 'dul ba'i phyir dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i nga rgyal gyi glang po che'i/ stod g.yogs la sogs pas lus mtshan par bya ste/ sngag kyis sbyang zhing byin gyi brlabs 
301b3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ gti mug dag par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dag par bya ba dang / nga rgyal dag par bya ba'i phyir ni mnabs pa'i rgyal// zhe sdang dag par bya ba'i phyir dang / phrag don dag par bya ba'i phyir ni gdags pa'i rgyan 
301b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bgo'o// thugs rje chen po'i chags pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing srid pa gsum gdul ba'i phyir ni byug pa'i rgyan pa bgo'o// des ni dur khrod dngos po gdul zhing rang gi don ston pa'o// 
301b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la bsdus nas dmigs su med pa'i don la gnas pa las/ yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bslang bar bsam nas rdo rje sems 
301b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i skur bzhengs te 'dir brjod do// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor na// 'byung ba lnga yi mtshan nyid las// zhi ba'i lhan lhan ne ba'i// thugs rje 'gro kun de las skyes/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ 
301b7(rgyud 'grel): shin tu khri drag gtum par 'gyur// de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ shin tu chags shin zhen par 'gyur/ de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ shin tu gti mug che bar 'gyur// de ltar dus gsum brdo ba la 
301b8(rgyud 'grel): zhibs phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma las// rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag/ oM ma hA shI he ru ka sa ma ya kro d+ha ha la ha la hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas/ thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa 
302a1(rgyud 'grel): las// rngam pa'i sgra sgrog te/ hU~M hUM hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ hUM mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// na mkha'i khro bo za byed cing // 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha 'od dpung 'khrigs/ 
302a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal du stong khams ma lus thim// zad par byed cing stong ze je byed// rgas rgung brlag par byed pa'o// glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba// myur ba'i za byed chen po lngas// skyen na 'chi 'joms byed cing / 
302a3(rgyud 'grel): brlag cing zad byed stong par byed// rigs chen za byed khros pa'i tshe// sku ni sngo skye thal ba'i ngang // 'od zer mang po rab tu 'khrigs// ru lu ru lus mang po za// 'bar ba'i mkha' gro tshogs brnyas pas// 
302a4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg cing 'jigs pa 'thor zhing 'khrud// gang 'dir bskal pa kun brlag tshe// gzhan zhig 'ongs 'jigs ma yin te// za byed khrod pa lnga po yis// zhal du stong khams ma lus thim// oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka/ 
302a5(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya kro d+ha/ oM oM ha ha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo smag gnag/ phyag na 'khor lo dang 'dzin// thos khrag 'dzin pa grangs med pa'i tshogs rnams sprul pa dang bcas par gnas so// 
302a6(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ sa ma ya kro d+ha/ hU~M hUM ru lu phaT/ lag pa g.yas pa la rdo rje khro bo sku mdog sngo skya// lag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / kha T+wA~M ga thogs pa grangs med pa'i tshogs sprul pa dang bcas pa'o// 
302a7(rgyud 'grel): oM rat+na shrI he ru ka/ sa ma ya kro d+ha/ traM tr-i he he hU~M phaT/ lag pa g.yon pa na rin po che khro bo ser gnag/ tri shru la dang / ral gri thogs pa grangs med pa sprul pa'i tshogs dang bcad par ro// 
302a8(rgyud 'grel): oM pad+ma shrI hrIHhe ru ka/ sa ma ya kro d+ha hri na hri da ha na hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yon pa la pad+ma'i khro bo dmar nag/ phyag na ral gri rtse gsum dang / gtum shing thogs pa grangs med pa sprul par bcas pa 
302b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas so// oM karma shrI he ru ka/ sa ma ya kro d+ha/ haM haM rak+Sha hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yas pa la las kyi khro bo ljang nag/ phyag na sna tshogs rdo rje dang / lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pa sprul pa dang bcas 
302b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// oM shrI b+hai ra ba hUM me hU~M ma hA de ba hUM phaT/ mtshan ma la lha chen po mdog dkar po// lagAn tri shul dang / thod pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o// oM biSh+Ta kam+ba la tsakra hU~M phaT/ snying gar khyab 
302b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug mthing nakaM/ lug ni 'khor lo dang / thod pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o// oM rAk+Sha da sha gr-i ba hU~M phaT/ mgrin par srin po'i rgyal po ljang sgra/ lag na dgra sta dang / thob thogs pa 'khor 
302b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'o// oM ma pa sha la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+hai ra hU~M phaT/ brla gnyis la rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs pa ljang sbra/ rdo rje rtse gsum dang thod pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o// 
302b5(rgyud 'grel): dedagakun kyang rang rang gi yum dang 'brel pa'i tshul du gnas so// lag pa'i sor mo bcul mche ba can k+Sha dang / sder mo can lnga dang / sngags 'dis gsal bar bya'o// oM ma hA d+he ki shA ri bi ka ma ru sha ha ha he he ru lu hU~M phaT 
302b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes glog gi dkyil 'khor dang / 'jigs pa'i khro bo gtum po'i tshogs// cir yang gyur pa'i mtshon cha yis// sdug bsngal gnas rnams rab tu bcom// ma rung dur khrod gzhig pa'i phyir/ 
302b7(rgyud 'grel): stong gsum gnas rnams bsgral bar bya// 'jig byed drag shul chen po yis// khams gsum cig car bsngal nas kyang // za byed chen po'i zhal du ni// 'gro kun yud tsam cig la dren// 'gro dang 
302b8(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gro'i snod bcud 'di// 'jigs byed khyed lngas kun zan dngos por gyur pa'i bgegs 'di kun// ngas bstabs khyed kyi yul la gsol// ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du// sems can 
303a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs sdang byed pas// de phyir nga ni rdo rje che// zhe sdang zhes ni grags pa yin// ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru// sems can thams cad rmongs byed pa// de phyir nga ni gti 
303a2(rgyud 'grel): mug Ne// rtab tu thub pa mchog yin no// srid pa'i 'di mnas myos pa rnams// 'dod rtags nyid kyis mtshams sbyong bas// de phyir chos rdo ni// 'dod dgas chen po'i mchog yinan/ 
303a3(rgyud 'grel): bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni// sems can thams cad nga rgyal bskyed// na mkha' bde bas bsdus pa'i phyir// bde chen 'dod pa nga yin no// rol sogs pa mnyam sbyor bas// phrag dog rdo rje gdon miza/ 
303a4(rgyud 'grel): snga tshogs las kyi khro ba'i sku// phrag dog chen po'i mchog yin no// da ni dus gsum bzhugs bai yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes su// ye shes rjod pa la ma chen tsha yis// log rtog 'khor ba'i 
303a5(rgyud 'grel): na cad do// chos nyid mnyam nyid namasprul la// ye shes thog gi 'du 'brug// gan sa med dmigs pa 'a ma yin// rna ba myed cing brten pa med// oMd k+Shad Sh+Tas rban pa// 
303a6(rgyud 'grel): oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba na ra kA ga te he tun hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba na ra ka ga te he tun hU~M phaT/ oM sarba kle shats+tshin+dats+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ sarba bid+ya tshin+d+ra hU~M phaT/ sarba bir+ya kha Da gan+d+hin+dats+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM tri bi shra mu la ts+tshin+da 
303a7(rgyud 'grel): ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ dpal chen 'bar ba rgyal ba'i sku// rngam brjid khros pa'i cha lugs 'bar// gar dgur dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// shes rab sku dang 'khril sbyor zhing // 'jo tshul gar mdzad lta bu yi/ 
303a8(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang srin po 'dul bar mdzad// matang la sogs bgegs byed rnams// gzugs dang bcas pa'i tshogs bsdus te// sra kri ta yi phyag rgya yis// nges par gzugs la dbab par bya/ 
303b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan bri la sogs pa la// phyag rgya bzhi yis mnyes byas nas// sngags dang 'od 'phro phyag rgya yis// de yi 'khor tshegs bsdu bar bya'o// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te gyen du bteg nas/ 
303b2(rgyud 'grel): oM ma hA kaM pa la d+ha ri shwa ya hU~M/ A kaR+Sha ya hU~M dzaHzhes brjod cing // rdo rje gshog pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas zil gyis mnan cing bstim mo// 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson// 'byung po mang po kun 
303b3(rgyud 'grel): nyon cig/ stobs chen dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rnan po 'jam dpal gyi// thugs rje dang ni shes rab dang // thabs la mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bdag dang 'gro ba bsrung bar mdzod// 'gro ba rnams 
303b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshe dang srog/ gson po bde bar gcod byed pa'i// bdud dang srin po'i 'khor bcas kun// bcom zhing gsang ba'i gnyen po ni// bde gshegs thugs kyi dngos grub mchog/ srin gsum thal byed rngam pa des 
303b5(rgyud 'grel): kha T+wAM drag pos mi bzad pas// bdud dang srin po 'khor bcas dang // gshin rje bcom zhing bsad nas ni// ro yang lho'i 'dzam gling du// bor nas sa gzhir gyur pa ni// dur khrod chen po brgyad yin no// mgo ni lce 
303b6(rgyud 'grel): nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// lag pa g.yas g.yon mtshams su bstan// nyams shing 'bod 'grogs rgyal bar 'gyur// oM sarba pA pa ka ra he ta ba bi shwa ma ta ga rudra hUM phaT 
303b7(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba pA pa ka ra he te pa bi shwa kha T+wAM ga ru dra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pA paM ka ra he ta pa bi shra A kaR+Sha ru da hUM phaT/ gnas kyi sgra ni su yis bcad// sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci// gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba las/ 
303b8(rgyud 'grel): yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis dbye// de nas g.yas su bskor te// lte ba'i phyogs su e gru gsum gyi sgo phye nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas rnam par shes pa drangs te/ oM ma hA bo sha phyang zhes// gnas
304a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi zhing khams gang rung du rigs kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i sras su bya'o// de nas log pa gzhal yas khang du byas te// rnal 'byor pa rnams nang du bzhugs nas// nang khrol gyi tshogs 
304a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams dug gsum rnam par dag pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi mchod par dmigs shing // dga' ba'i glu gar dang rol mos mchod par bya'o// de nas lha thams cad la bstod cing bskul ba'i phyir rdo rje'i glu blang ste/ 
304a3(rgyud 'grel): kha T+wAMg la rgyab rten bcas// nam pa'i phrug rgyarnal 'byor pas// nam la 'akun las grol ba 'grub// dngos po thams cad mkha' byin pa// mtha' las sgyu makun blangs nas// lus pa med par de za'o/ 
304a4(rgyud 'grel): g+han d+ha tsa/ g+han d+ha ho/ g+han d+ha'i sgra yis sgrol bar mdzad// la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin// la lar tshangs pa bzhin du zhi// la la rag shin rje bzhin du rngam// la lar dus mtha'i me ltar 
304a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar// 'jigs rten khams ni stong dag na// mi sdug rigs kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i// mkha 'gro 'bar ma'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus lus pa med par sgrol// zhes so// gzhan yang sha zag 
304a6(rgyud 'grel): rus pa'i tshogs rnams dang // za byed kyi tshogs dang // 'jigs byed kyi zhal du dbul ba ni// stabs su gsol cig he ru ka/ gang la bya ba'i dngos po 'di// phra men gshed ma khyed rnams kyis// dbang dang 
304a7(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags byin brlabs te// rig sngags kyis ni rmongs mdzad nas// drag po las kyis sgrub byed cing // 'di la sogs pa rnams la yang // de dag longs spyod rgyun du 'bul// sha dang rkang khrag 'dod 
304a8(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams// rig sngags kyis ni byin brlabs nas// 'tsho ba phrogs nas ci bde bar// khyod kyis de la longs spyod cig/ can dang bcud yangs zab pa na// khor yug gtos kyi dngos po 'di/ 
304b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir// 'jigs byed dka' zlog dgyes shing rol// rdo rjeg sum dang sku gsung thugs// sri dag sum 'joms mdzad tri shwa ro la// rdo rje gsum 'bar srag sung thugs/ 
304b2(rgyud 'grel): si gsum 'jams mdzod ci shul// drugag sngam cad nas bcad pa'i phyir/ khams gsum cig par basprul bar bya// 'jigs byed drug shul chen pa yis// mas gsum cig cang bskul nas kyang / 
304b3(rgyud 'grel): za byed chen po'i zhal du ni// 'gro kun yud tsam cig la 'dren// 'gro dang mi 'gro'i stong bcud 'di// 'jig rten byed lngas kun zan// dngos por gyur pa'i dgegs 'di kun// ngas bstabs byed kyis 
304b4(rgyud 'grel): yul la bzhes// oM ma hA shrI te drug pa ha ha ha ru lu ru lun+te ts+tsha nr-i b+h+yo Sha N+Di Shahi/ shar phyogs 'jig rten lam snyan// yang dag thar lam bcod byed pa// 'byung po gsum po nga rgyal can// byed ni sgrub pa kun la/ 
304b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrib// yang dag thar pa ye shes kyi// khungs brtag rtsad bcad dag las byung // bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa rnams so// bdag med stong pa'i thobs gzhom// at+mAn hi ma hA shUn+ya tA badz+ra swa b+hA ba AH/ 
304b6(rgyud 'grel): kauhaM// chos kun rtag tu rang gi ngo bos stong // rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jigs// srid pa ji bzhin yod ye stong pa ste// nyi tshe'i stong nyid mu stegs can rnams kyi'o// 'dod pa'i 
304b7(rgyud 'grel): khams stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi khams stong pa nyid do// gzugs med pa'i khams stong pa nyid do// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi lus stong pa nyid do// ngag stong pa nyid do// sems
304b8(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid do// gang dag stong pa nyid mi shes pa// de yis mya ngan 'das mi shes// de phyir dngos po dngos med pas// 'jigs pas stong nyid shes par bya// chen po stong pa zhes bya ba// 
305a1(rgyud 'grel): / kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// stong nyid rjes su dran par bya// oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes pas/ mtshan ma'i rtog tshogs kun mi rtog/ 
305a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis gzhom par bya'o// de nas ban+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa dag byin gyis brlab cing // rang rang gi gnas su mi mar dang bcas pas dgram pa dang // dur khrod chen po brgyad dag nas dgod de// shar du 
305a3(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa g.yas pa'o// lhor lag pa g.yas pa'o// nub tu lag pa g.yon pa'o// byang du rkang pa g.yon pa'o// shar lhor dgugayas pa'o// lha nub tu mgo bo'o// nub byang du dkug yon pa'o// 
305a4(rgyud 'grel): byang shar du mtshan ma'o// de ltar dug gsum gyi rkyen bsags nas// zhing skyong la sogs pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o// gzhan yang dbang skur ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las 'brum gyi 'phro 'dus 
305a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas byin gyis brlabs pa dang // rnal 'byor pa thams cad rang gi lhar bsgom pa dang // sgrub rdzas thams cad yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang // lha mo kro d+hi shwa ris byin gyis brlabs

305a7(rgyud 'grel): so so'i gnas su dgram par bya'o// de dag gi ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag gi cho ga bstan pa yin no// da ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir phyag rgya lngas mtshan cing chos gos lnga
