335a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni yan lag rnams// nye bar bstan pa nyid du bya// bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi snod// thams cad bdag nyid mgon btud de// bla ma mgon la gsol ba 'debs// bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol//

336b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i rgyu ni rnam lnga dang // rtag tu rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gzung // thod pa kha T+wAM tsang ti'u// zung zhig zung zhig dpal chen po// rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu'i sgra ni 'khrol ba dang / tshangs skud rang bzhin rnal 'byor/ 
336b8(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje kha T+wAM rnal 'byor dang // dpal ldan khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni// phyi rol nang du yang dag gnas// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal chen po// gtso bo dpal ldan yon tan gtso// thams cad bdud sogs 
337a1(rgyud 'grel): pas rgyal nas// khyod ni mchog gi grong du gshegs// shes bya ba ni lung bstan pa'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang chen po// dpa' bo chen pos bdag la stsol// 'gro ba mtshan ma med bya'i phyir// /

337a4(rgyud 'grel): rten kun gyis phyag rgyas la// gsang ba gsupa gnas 'byung ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin par bya// dpa' bo kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o// de nas mi bskyod cod par gyur// oM su pa tiSh+Tha badz+re sAhA/

337a6(rgyud 'grel): slob mas phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar// sangs rgyas gzugs su dmigs byas te// rtag pa'i gnang ba sbyin par bya// sems can kun la phan don du// kun nas sems can thams cad la// ji ltar sna tshogs 
337a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dul 'gyur ba// ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// de ltar chos kyi gnas su ni// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // las rnams gzhugs par bya ba ni// ci rigs par ni shes par bya// tshigs bcad rim pa lnga yis 
337a8(rgyud 'grel): ni// khyab bdag gi ni gnang ba sbyin// rnal 'byor de nyid rig pa la// bya ba ma yin cung zad med// dpa' bo de nyid shes de nas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod// bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid//

342a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer nag po 'phro bas srid pa gsum khyab pa// phyag bzhi pa// phyag g.yas na dbyug tho dang ral gri thogs pa// g.yon na zhags pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ rlung gi med mngon spyod la sgom par bya'o// de nas lus bkru 
342a7(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim byug/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i rgyan bgos te// zhi dang brgyas dang de bzhin dbang // bsad pa yi ni las rnams la// ji ltar las dang rjes mthun par// blo ldan gyis ni sngon bzhin brjod// sems can kun la phan
342a8(rgyud 'grel): brtson pas// ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad bya// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sngon bzhin du// sngags pa yis ni bya ba yin// shar phyogs su ni mngon phyogs dang // de bzhin du ni byang du yin// nub phyogs su ni mngon phyogs te// 
342b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du ni lho phyogs yin// zhi ba la sogs la 'dug nas// las bzhi po ni bya ba yin// de nas la sa dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul gyis phyi rol gyi me dgug ste// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyi bzlas pa'i chu ku sha'i rtse mos 
342b2(rgyud 'grel): blangs nas bskor zhing bsang gtor lan gsum gyi bar bya'o// de'i rjes su btsang zhing skam pa'i rtsa dang lhan cig pa'i shing la// rlung yab kyis me rab tu sbar bar bya'o// oM dz+wa la dzA hUM zhes bya ba ni sbar ba'i sngags so// 
342b3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra yak+Sha hU~M zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi sngags so// dam tshig sems dpa' brjod pa bzhin// thabs khung dbus su des bsams te// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba// sngags dang phyag rgyas bya ba yin/ 
342b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i mi 'jigs rgya byas te// mthe bong gis ni srin lag gi/ rtsa ba'i tshigs la reg byas te// yang dang yang du bskul bar bya// 'di nyid kyi ni phyag rgya ni// me 'gugs pa yi mchog yin no// tshur gshegs tshur 
342b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs mgon po che// sangs rgyas bla med las bla med// dgang blugs 'di ni bzhes nas su// de nyid du ni gzhugs su gsol// de nas me lha spyan drangs pa// dam tshig sems dpa' dang gcig tu byas te mchod yon la 
342b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa phul nas// byin gyi gnyis kyi nang du bzhag la// blugs gzar gyis dgang blugs gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o// yang dgang gzar khengs par byas la/ 
342b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du blugs gzar bzhag ste// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang mthe chung sbrel te// lhag ma'i sor mo yu ba'i steng du bzhag la mar gyi dogang blugs dbul bar bya'o// de nas yo byad thams cad sngar brjod pa'i sngags 
342b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi sbyin sreg bya zhing // sngags kyi bcu chas sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas bsreg rdzas dang // me tog la sogs pa dang // bshos bzang la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// rdzogs pa'i mthar oM hriHzhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis 
343a1(rgyud 'grel): mar gyi dgang blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gzi byin bskyed par bya'o// de'i rjes la gang ba'i dgang blugs dbul bar bya zhing // cha chod yon la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas stod cing yid la 'dod pa'i 
343a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub la gsol ba btab ste gzod pa gsol la// oM muHzhes brjod de steng du gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul 
343a3(rgyud 'grel): du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs gsol nas// sprul pa'i me ni mchod byas te// gsang gtor la sogs phul byas nas// bsreg rdzas lhag ma bsreg 
343a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de nas gang ba'i dgang blugs dbul// mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya'o// de'i rjes su yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba btab ste bzod par gsol la// dzi hi dza hi zhes bya bas gshegs su
343a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar bya'o// sngon du brjod pa'i rim bzhin du// a ra li ho// zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// 'di yi mthar ni tshogs 'khor lo// sngags pa yi ni bya ba ste// bsdus pas dngos grub kun 'grub 
343a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// cung zad bdag gis brjod par bya// nyin re lam ni zla ba re// yang na lo re dag tu ni// sna tshogs ston mor ldan pa la// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// dam tshig sdom pa shes pa yi// rang gi slob ma bla mar bcas// 
343a7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dbus su mdor bsdu ste// pad+ma bde ba chen po 'di// thog mar rim bzhin bsgom bya ste// 'byung po rnams la gtor ma gtang // kun kyang dam tshig bdag nyid can// rang rang phyag rgyar ldan byas te// dus min yid 
343a8(rgyud 'grel): kyis brtags nas ni// der ni rim pa bzhin du 'jug/ me tog spos dang de bzhin me// ji dang phreng ba na bza' dang // ji ltar dmigs par 'gyur ba yi// bza' dang btung ba dbul bar bya// rim bzhin mchod pa byas nas ni// 
343b1(rgyud 'grel): rang ba 'dam skyes thabs khung du// lag pa blugs gzar tha snyad kyis// snod las dgang blugs dbul bar bya// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis// lhag pa'i lha ni yid 'ong za// dga' zhing bde bas spro ba ni// dngos po kun 
343b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis mnyes par bya// snod ni a yis khongs bya ste// mkhas pa yis ni so sor dbul// bla ma lagus dad cing grims// thams cad yid 'ongs bzod ldan zhing // thams cad mtshungs par khrims ldan pa'i// slob ma 
343b3(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rdo rje 'dod// de ltar rnal 'byor pa kun gyis// spyod lam la ni mnyam bzhag ste// skom par gyur kyang rgyalam yang // snod ni skam par mi bya'o// 'thab pa dang ni snod pa dang // ku co'i sgra ni 'jigs pa dang // shin tu 
343b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dang ldan pa// tshogs kyi dbus si bya'o// slob dpon gyi ni dga' min par// glu dang gang ni mi bya zhing // tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bo yis// gang la bka' snang byin byung na// de yis myur du dgongs pa ni/ 
343b5(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' sbyin bya// brda dang brda'i tha snyad ni// sgrub pa po ye shes bya ste// shin tu rgyas par spyod bsdus las// 'phags pa lha yis bris pa yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan rin chen rdo 
343b6(rgyud 'grel): dang // thobazangs ma yis dka' yis rjes bzung bas// rnam pa sa tshogs pa yi babs ni bstan pa yin// srid pa shin tu 'jigs las sems can sgrol bar shog// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal sangs rgyas 
343b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba// mkha' gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog sems can thams cad thams cad kyi bde ba skye ma zhes bya ba/ khache mkhas pa chen po shes bya mtha' dag la mkhas pa dpal 
343b8(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / dpal ldan o thun du sbyangs pa/ mkhas pa ye shes rdo rje dang // gad sbyar gnyan pan ba sod de yis// bskur cing zhus nas gtan la phab// dpal ldan mnyam sbyor 
344a1(rgyud 'grel): \u0f7f// rgyud chen gyi// dge ba shel sgong ltar thob pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa gnas shog// ga// rje sems dpa'i sbubs thabs bzhugs sa// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra satra no pi ka/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems 
344a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig phan bzang skyob pa'i mgon// thams cad don kun ston mdzad cing // yang dag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i mchog/ rigs bdag sems dpa'i la phyag 
344a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i chog dag/ rab tu sbyangs pas grol gyur cing // de gnas ye shes bzang po nyid// don mchog gsang ba bshad par bya// dam tshig 'khor lo rdzogs byas te// phyag rgya'i yan lag rnam sbyangs pas// 
344a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kun gyi cha shas dag/ nye bar sbyor ba'i yul tu 'gyur// sa phyogs mngon par dga' ba ru// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste// 'gro rnams kun grol bsam pa yis// khrus rnams cho ga bzhin du sbyar// 
344a5(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum phyogs cha'i bye brag gis// drug gi chos rnams rang bzhin med// der snang rtog pa'i cha bral zhing // 'byung tshogs khams rnams ma skyes pa'o// 'gro ba'i rigs rnams tha dad kyang // mtshan nyid rten cing 
344a6(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa'i rkun// bya dang byed tshogs yul can nyid// kun rtags ye shes chen pos non// thugs rje snang ba 'od ldan pa'i// kun 'byung rin chen phung po'i tshogs// rab tu sbyar bas khyab mdzad cing // nye bar ston pa'i 
344a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid do// thugs kyi sngags kyis gsal byas te// kun nas sro zhing bsdus pa'i mthus// rdo rje sa gzhi la brten pa'i// rab gur sogs mtshon char bcas// shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba las// thabs kyi phyag rgya 
344a8(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa nyid// gnyen po'i ye shes stobs dang ldan// 'gro gnas nyon mongs rnam par dag/ rigs mchog 'khor lo bzang po'i tshogs// kun nas bsdus pas brtan pa dag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid su//

344b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgeg dang bcas// rin chen rgyan sogs kun gyis spras// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// g.yon pa kha T+wAM dril bu 'khrol// dbu rgyan rtse phran lnga yis brgyad// byang chub 
344b2(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi cha lugs kyis// 'od 'bar kha dog sna lnga'i mdangs// stod smad na bzas rnam par grubs// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// nyi zla gsal ba'i gdan dang bcas// mtshan dang dpe byed phun sum tshogs/ 
344b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi sprul pas kun don mdzad// gnas gsum yi ge'i mtshan ma las// spro bsdus rigs kyi sems dpa' dang // rang gi cha lugs phreng ba sngags bcas// thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' nyid// ting 'dzin 
344b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i gnas// yang dag bskul ba'i byin brlabs kyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // rigs lnga'i cod pan rnam par mdzes// dam tshig phyag rgya rdzogs pa las// ye shes byin brlabs
344b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan par gzhug/ lha mo mchod pas mnyes byas te// shin tu gar bcas rol mo'i glus// rigs kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs dag/ yang dag stod cing gnas kun brgyan// thugs ka'i sngags kyi phreng ba las// sna lnga'i phreng/ 
344b6(rgyud 'grel): baspro nang bsdu// oM badz+ra sarbA hU~M swAhA/ ji srid brtan par ma gyur par// 'od 'bar 'phreng bas kun tu rgyas// stong pa ma yin mi stong min// dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor bas// 
344b7(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams// de bas de nyid snying rje thabs// shes rab pha rol gyin par gsal// kun tu 'gro dang 'dug pa dang // nyal dang la sogs thams cad nga // lha yi ting 'dzin brtan byas te// 
344b8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab// bza' btung thams cad bdud rtsi'i tshogs// yul kun lha mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bskyed la phyag rgya'i 'khor lo yis// bya ba'i phrin las sna tshogs kun// 'gro gnas 'jug 
345a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don bzhin spyad// dkyil 'khor mnyes pas mchod bya ste// dga' ba'i sbyin sreg tshim pa'i mchog/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo rdul zhugs bzang // yige phyag rgya mtshan ma'i sku// rnam gsum mdzad

345a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog min// bdag nyid kun du rtag gnas srid gsum gzugs// dpal ldan tshad med bde ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'gyur ba// bde chen bde skyed rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po la// 'gro ba gsum

345a8(rgyud 'grel): bla med bde ba thob pa'i phyir// 'di yi sgrub pa cho ga cung zad bshad par bya// 'jig rten mgon pa rdo rje sems// skyob pa pos ni rnam gsum pa// rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad las// de bas thams cad lha nyid do// 
345b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje byang chub sems 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo ste// de bas bdag nyid kun sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid de// de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad pas/ 
345b2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// de bas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya// rdo rje byin brlab tshul gyis su// ting nge 'dzin ni bdag dbang bskur// snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig gis// gsang ba'i mchod pa mchog gis bskur

345b7(rgyud 'grel): a sa na ma hA yo ga bi da hU~M zhes byin gyis brlabs nas// stan bde ba la sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam par gnas te ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa de bzhin du thams cad kyi stan dang sbyar ro// mnyam par bzhag nas rgyal ba kun/

346a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par bya// cho ga bzhin du phyag byas te// ci rigs mchod pa rnams byas la// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams// dbang po kun nas spro bar bya// dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa// zhi ba'i 
346a2(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyor ba yis// sha rdza gan dang tshul gyis su// rdo rje dbyangs kyis stod par bya// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi tshe nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' 
346a3(rgyud 'grel): yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med migayo mnyam med dam pa'i chos mchog can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang chad med de// dpe ni na mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam 
346a4(rgyud 'grel): med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don bsgrub rab tu 
346a5(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa snyed gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog 
346a6(rgyud 'grel): srel mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma ho shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sprin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pas// khams gsum kun la rtag tu 
346a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon por dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// de nas sngon tshe gang byas pa'i// sdig pa rnams ni bshags par bya// 
346a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba rnams ni dge bzang la// ma lus rjes su yi rangs bya// de rnams gsol btab par bya ba// skad cig skad cig sems par bya// ma lus pa yi dge ba rnams// sems can rnams la bsngo bar bya// de nas 
346b1(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus chen po'i go bgos pa// snying rje chen po brlan pa'i sems gzhan la phan pa gcig pu mthar gyur pa'i mchog ma lus lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bsgral 
346b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas nas pad+ma'i lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi mthil la 
346b3(rgyud 'grel): maT yi ge gnyis las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha thams cad kyis rnam par mdzes pa'i mngon du brtags te// de'i steng du 'dis rdo rje dang pad+mor bsam par bya ste// oM ma hA su kha sa man+ta b+ha dra hUM a zhes brjod nas rdo rje'i 
346b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig la sa mngon du bsdu ba dang / spo ba bya ba ni 'od zer sna tshogs kyi phreng bas spro ba dang bsdu ba bya ste// g.yon pa'i sor mo thams cad du yi ge sa bon lnga las gzugs mar bsam// g.yas kyi rnams la gtso bo rnams tshul 'di 
346b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo// aM a aM a aM/ hUM hUM tra~M wi a/ de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya'o// oM badz+ra any+tsa li a~M/ rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa'i snying po ni/ oM badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM/ de yang snying po 'di la na gnyis sam 
346b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum du brjod de dbab par byin gyis brlab bo// oM badz+ra pad+ma saM yog a bi sha ma hA su kha/ oM badz+ra saHhUM a/ sur ta s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM ba hoH/ bcings pa de 'bab par gyur gyi bar du brjod nas de nas snying gar dkrol bar 
346b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// oM badz+ra bar+N+Na mahA kro d+ha ha nad ha pa tsag ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TaM/ me ma na sidz+dza/ dz+nyA na ma hA ta mon+ta kar pi ti tsi gi ra bi ka ra hUM/ rbat+ta trade ta tat+ta/ de nas rang gi lus mi shes pa'i dri ma dang bral nas zla ba lta bur yongs su/ 
346b8(rgyud 'grel): dag par bsgoms te/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+hi d+harmA ta sa ma ya hUM zhes yid la brjod do// de nas bcings pa de slar gnyis su bcings nas mdzub me gnyis brkyang ba las lcags kyu ltar gcus te// de bzhin du rang gi snying gar sngags 
347a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis grol bar bya'o// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha a gu sha ma hA kro ta dzaHhUM baM hoHhUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag par bsam ste/ ye shes yongs su dag pa tsam la dmigs nas sangs rgyas 
347a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag la 'dis bskul bar bsam mo// stong pa yod med shin tu rnal 'byor mthus// namakha' bzhin du dam tshig nye bar gshegs// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa gzhengs su gsol/ 
347a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems pa'i skal bzar dpal khyod bdag/ de nas de bdag gi bdag la bskul bar rig nas bdag nyid bde ba chen po rim pa 'di ltar bskyed par bya'o// hUM gi phyag rgya dang bcas par byin gyis brlab par bya ste// de la phyag rgya 
347a4(rgyud 'grel): ni bcings pa las brkyang ste// mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi dbus su mthe bong rtsi sbyar nas// dbab pa byas la/ snying gar dbu ma rtse mo can du byas te/ a'i pad+ma'i steng du bzhag go/ oM ma hA su kha sa man+ta patha a biShiny+tsahUM a 
347a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod nas dbab pa'i phyag rgya bskyong ngo // yang na a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du brtags te// sa bon rgyal po rdo rje sems dpa'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa bzhin bsams te// hUM gdan la a la sogs pas kyang 'od zer gyis 
347a6(rgyud 'grel): chas brgyan pa ltar bsams nas sa bon hUM de las rdo rje rtse lnga par bsam mo// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ zhes brjod pa 'dis rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dir mngon du 'grub ste/ rdo rje'i ye shes de las ye shes rnam lngar gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs su byung 
347a7(rgyud 'grel): nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs par kun tu snang bar byed par bsams te/ de bdag nyid rdo rje la sngar 'dus pas phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du gyur par bsams pa/ thams cad bde byed dkar ba'i 
347a8(rgyud 'grel): phyir// thams cad dag pa rnam dag ste// zla ba gang ba dkar ba'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni// dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// g.yas kyis 'dud pa'i snying ga ru/ 
347b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzub bcas rdo rje gsor bar mdzad// sems dpa'i skyil krung dbyibs su gnas// chu skyes spyan yang yid tsam rgyas// sangs rgyas rin chen dbu rgyan rnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyi rnam par grubs// rgyab tu 'ong dang 'drab 
347b2(rgyud 'grel): yis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi mchog/ a las yang dag bskyed byas te// de nas kun du spro bar bya// sangs rgyas rin chen khams gsupa ni// rin chen gzhan dang mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin po che// 
347b3(rgyud 'grel): de bsad bu brgyan mchog ces bya// bdag gi gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs te// dag cing dang ba'i chu 'dra ba// ngo bo nyid kyi mthar gyur pas// rang bzhin gyis ni de dngos grub// de nas byin brlabs tshul gyis su// snying ga smin 
347b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams mgrin spyi bor// gang bcas lag pa 'dud pa yis// rdo rje phyag rgya bcings par bya// byin brlabs phyag rgya 'di yin te// rdo rje khu tshur bcings bya ste// mdzub mo mthe bo'i mtshan nyid du// g.yas pa'i mthe bo dbang po yis// 
347b5(rgyud 'grel): kha ru bcug nas bsdam par bya// 'di yis byin gyis brlab pa yis// rdo rje dga' chen thob par 'gyur// bde ba chen po bde byed cha// phye yi gsang ba rnam sdud yin// rdo rje dga' ba rab bcings nas// dbum bcings pa nang du bzhug 
347b6(rgyud 'grel): mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam bsnol ba'i// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub par bya// bcings pa de yis byin brlabs nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog tu 'gyur// 'di yis ji ltar rigs pa yis// blo dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// 
347b7(rgyud 'grel): dar gyis bcings pas bcing bya ste// 'gying dang bcas pas mtha' dgrol bya// dar dbyangs 'dra ba'i tshul nyid kyis// thal mo yis ni bstan par bya// sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di yis// hUM a b+hi'iny+tsa maM/ 'di na 
347b8(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o// mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil krung las// mdzub martsi mo dgug par bya// gung mo mchog gnyis mnyam sbyor mnyam// lhag mardo rje thal mo 'od/ 
348a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur brgya// rang byung ba yis dbang bskur bas// rgyal srid mchog gi dngos grub kun// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba gnyis// blo dang de bzhin rgyab 
348a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid du// byas nas dar dbyangs tshul du bya// oM bud+d+ha a b+hi She ke ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha bud+d+ha lo tsa na sar+b+ba ar+tha sa d+ha na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM swA hA// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas snga ma bzhin dbang 
348a3(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'o// oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi She ka hi ri mi ti shI ya a b+hi Shany+tsa maM swA hA// rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba'o// oM pad+ma a b+hi She ka ta re du re tut+tA re a b+hiShin+ta maM swA hA// de'i phyag rgya ni sangs rgyas rin chen gyis dbang bskur bas dbu 
348a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rtse mo phab pa ni pad+ma rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste// 'dis snga pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro// rdo rje thal mo rab sbyor te// gnyis kyis rin chen 'dzin pa ltar// ji ltar rigs pas mnyam par bya// mthe brtse mo gdong gzhi yis/ 
348a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya de nas rab bsgyur te// g.yas pa nyid du bzhag par bya// blo dang ldan pa'i sngags 'di yis// sngags rigs de bzhin dbang bskur bya// oM rat+na rat+na a b+hi She k+She traM traM// b+ha b+ha ta ta tra tra tra tra a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM swA hA/ 
348a6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rigs kyi dbade bskur ba'o// rdo rje thal mo gdab pa ste// mdzub mo'i rtse mo yud tsam dgug/ mthe bo dpa' ba'i skyil krung ngu// lhag ma rnams ni 'od bzhin btang // sngon bzhin yang ni sbyang bar bya// las kyi rin chen 
348a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'o// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma rat+na a b+hi She ke hi hi hi hi/ shrI pad+ma ba da mu She a b+hi Shiny+tsA maM swA hA/ rig sngags sbyin bdag la dbang bskur bar bstan te rang gi rigs kyin thog ma nyid du dbang bskur ba'o// de ltar bdag nyid dbang 
348a8(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar byas nas// go bgo bar bya ste// rdo rje khu tshur brkyang ba las mgrin par gzhag ste// oM badz+ra ka pa tsa yA maM haM paM yaM/ zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod nas bcings pa de las 'dzub mo brkyang ste// so sor nas gdong sprad 
348b1(rgyud 'grel): pa mdud pa'i tshul gyis snying gnas brtsams te// spyi bo'i gtsug gi bar du sngags 'dis oM TuM ka pa tsa yaM maM hUM/ lan gsum du byas na lus la cis kyang mi phyed par 'gyur ro// de nas a las bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje shin tu dga' 
348b2(rgyud 'grel): bama'ab rdo rje sems ma skyed de// bcom ldan 'das kyis cha lugs dang kha dog dbyibs su ldan pa g.yas g.yon gyi pad+mo'i dbyibs can du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya ste/ gnyis su med 
348b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis brtsam par bya ni ni lung ngo // dzaHhUM baM ho/ zhes brjod cing bcing ba ni nang gi dbu ma'i lcags kyu rang gi snying gar lcags kyus drang bar bya// de nyid gdong reg pa ni zhags pa'o// de nyid lu gu rgyad ltar byas pa ni bcing 
348b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nyid rtse mo bsdams pa ni dgyes pa'o// 'di ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste// phyi yi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang sbyang bar bya'o// de la de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di ste// rdo rje bcing ba gnyis su bya ste// g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas 
348b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhag nas// mthe'u chung bsnol ba la g.yon gyi mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs nas g.yas kyi mdzub mo dgug pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ste// oM badz+ra kA ma aM ku sha ka ta hUM dzaH/ zhes pa'i snying po dang bcas pas drang bar 
348b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nyid las phan tshun du mdzub mo gnyis zhags pa ltar bcings te// oM badz+ra pra be sha ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i snying po dang bcas pas bzhug go/ de nyid las phan tshun shin tu bskums te/ oM badz+ra kA ma ban+d+ha ban+d+ha 
348b7(rgyud 'grel): baM/ zhes pas bcing bar bya'o// de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bzung ste// rgyab sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje dgyes pa'o// oM badz+ra duSh+Ti ka ma su ko sho ta ya ho/ zhes brjod nas phyag rgya des dgyes par bya ste/ 
348b8(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i thal mo 'am// zhi ba'i thal mo gsum gyis dgyes pa bskyed nas mdun du rdo rje shin tu dga' ba la sogs pa mngon du blta bar bya ba'i phyir dbyangs bskul bar bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen bskal bzang khyod bdag 
349a1(rgyud 'grel): lags so// bsgrub la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog grub pa bdag 
349a2(rgyud 'grel): la grub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dzaHhUM baM ho/ kye ma bde mchog bde bas gzung ba rnam par sprul pa snang bar mdzad du gsol/ 
349a3(rgyud 'grel): a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sna tshogs sgyu ma mkha' gro slong mas gzung du gsol// de nas 'dug pa de langs te// ma dang Ta las gyur pa'i mig gis na mkha'i ngos la bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis til 'bru 
349a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin brtags te rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas dzaHhUM baM ho/ \u0f7fzhes brjod cing rang gi lha la mchod pa'i phyir// de rnams kyi snying gar gzhug par bya'o// yang na rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya stsal te// cho ga ji lta bu bzhin du byin gyis brlabs 
349a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas// mchod pa brtsam par bya'o// mdun du zla ba'i kha dog can// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum dang bcas// phyag rgya mda' ltong 'dran par 'dzin// sangs rgyas rin chen rnams kyis brgyan// rgyab tu lha 
349a6(rgyud 'grel): mo chu srin gyi// pad+ma dmar po 'od dang ldan// dpal byed dran pa sna tshogs kyi// sangs rgyas dbu brgyan mchog 'dzin ma// sngo mthing mchog gi phyag gnyis kyis// phyag rgya rang gis 'khyud pa yi// sangs rgyas dbu rgyan phreng ba la// 
349a7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// 'dud bcas g.yon nas sngogasangs te// sangs rgyas gtsug gis rnam par spras// rnal 'byor 'byor ldan bsam bya ba// rang gi snying po rdzogs par bya// bzhi po de rnams ni phyag rgya 
349a8(rgyud 'grel): phyi mo'i tshigs su bstan te// gzugs dang / spra dang dri dang / ro'i lha mo rnams phyogs bzhir rang gi lhan la pad+mo'i lo ma la gnas par bsam mo// pad+ma'i phyi mtshams su sgeg mo dang // phreng ba ma dang / dbyangs can ma dang / 
349b1(rgyud 'grel): gar ma la sogs pa grwa bzhir bzhag go/ de bzhin du me tog ma dang / bdug pa ma dang / mar me ma dang / sna tshogs kyi dri la sogs pa yang phyogs mtshams su bzhag go/ gling bu dang pi wang dang / cang te'u dang / rdza rnga dang 
349b2(rgyud 'grel): chalang dang / dang dir dang / pa Ta ha gdung pa la sogs pa yang phyogs phyogs su bzhag go/ shar gyi sgo ru bsam pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa mchog/ g.yon du rdo rje nags pa ste// nub du rdo rje lcags kyu rgyud/ 
349b3(rgyud 'grel): byang du dril bu bshad pa ste// de rnams rang gi las la brtson// kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog ldan pa// rang gi lha la rjes mthun pa'i// rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin ldan par// sngags shes pas na dgod par bya// rang gi lha'i/ 
349b4(rgyud 'grel): spyo ldan pas// ci rigs mnyam par gzhag bya ste// mnyam par banag pa'i ting 'dzin nyid// rdo rje 'dzin du nye bar 'gyur// de nas ji ltar sbyang ba yis// sbyor dgyes pa yis rol byas te// sbyar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis sa/ 
349b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bzhag nas rab tu bya// mchod pa thams cad ma 'byor na// phyag rgyabacing zhing mchod byab// rang nyid lha yi ngo bo la// de dag gis mchod dmigs par bya// brdung dang gang du bcas pa yis// stegs bcas 
349b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' bas bde ga yis// grul sogs pa'i ldan pas// b+h+rUM a/ bde ba chen po bskal bzang khyod// thams cad 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod chags pas// bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhes shig/ mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga 
349b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogos pa sbyong ba dang ldan pas dbul bar bya'o// dza r+b+hu ba hoH/ ru maH sbyarar te/ swa lu hu lu/ pra si ta/ ta ki hAM/ tru ta ki ni hr-i dza/ dra lu dra lu/ al la ho/ shud+d+ha/ sad+d+ha ya/ da ra sha ya/ sar+b+ba/ 
349b8(rgyud 'grel): tete b+he ta g+heta b+ho/ ta ta k+She ta b+he/ g+heb+heta/ g+he ta b+heta/ glen ta/ rtag rlung ngo / pra lu su lu phu mra/ al la la la haM/ rba maT/ thal ma byu ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen rje sems dpa' bde bcan pa la 
350a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o// ta b+he ta g+he/ ta g+he g+he/ tag+he g+he/ g+heg+he ta/ rgyun gyis brdung ba'o// aM aM aM/ haM haM haM/ baM be baM/ daMd daM/ dam tshig gsum gyis 
350a2(rgyud 'grel): brdungs pa ste/ 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs bskul ba'i dam tshig gsum gyi gsang ba'i sbyor ba ste/ de rnams kyi brdung ba dbyings su blangs shing sha rdza dang de ba ti dbyangs 'dis kyang sbyor ba'i bdag nyid kyis hUM 
350a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis bskur bar bya'o// rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad+mo rna ma dag pa'o// mchod pa gsal bas rjes su mchod byas pa// mchog rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzad/ 
350a4(rgyud 'grel): kye mchog bde ba'i dam mchog rang go ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor shin tu bskal bzang mchog brnyes pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon med rtag la ral cig rol cig to// bye mchog thugasang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i 
350a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir// rabatugs ba'i lha mor tshag rnams so// 'gro ba'i rgyud ni yang sna tshogs 'dul ba gsal bar mkhyen// dam cig thams cad dnges pa brtan g.yog ku bying bar gyur// rgyas bkun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde bskum 
350a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha 'akra ho// bye dam pa brtag pa'i dngas grub chen po rabatu bsgrubs bstan// dzaHhUM ba hoH/ kye maho ba de mchog ba bas drangs// rnam par sprul pa snang bar mdzad// a la la la la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// 
350a7(rgyud 'grel): ma gro sgrums tshogs kyi// slong ma dag nag zung drugs pa// 'di ni sam ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs pab debs bskul bar// g.yas dang gan gyi lag pa yis// babyings pa'i tshul gyi gang byas te// gci 
350a8(rgyud 'grel): khyimanapa srin lag sbyar// g.yas kyi bdan gsum pa yis// phyag rgya ni yis btab pa ni// sangs rgyas kun dang yang dag 'thogs// thams cad mchog gi dngas grub che// dbang phyug chen pa rab tu 'grub 
350b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid dor ba'i tshul gyis su// slad du sdud pa cher byas te// bsgyur nas g.yas kyi 'gram pa dang // spyi gzug ma rnams su bzhag pa las// slad du gar byed pa ba tshul gyis// rta lugs kun gyis rab bskur cing // bsal

350b3(rgyud 'grel): lalar mdangs bzang gze brjid zhibar ldan pa rgyal ba'i gzugs su snang // la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston// rdo rje sems dpa'agrub phyir 'dul mkhas ma lus bde ba'i

350b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhan gar mdzad a la la ho// rnam mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa yis thar pa'i bde ba'ang thob par mdzod// 'di yis ba dan gsum dang ldan par gar du bya'o// rab tu dga' dang rjes su chags par dga' ba'i mda' gzhu 
350b6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu brabs rgyas btab pas// rab tu dga' bar sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzad// rab tu bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshags rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgrer ba'i longs spyod dang // rab tu dga' 
350b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs// ho rta mchog to// kye maho rab tu bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs rol cig to// de bas slong rnam par rol// hUM snang bar mdzod// al la la ho// de bzhin 
350b8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' gro sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi slob ma gzung du gsol// kye bde ba'i mchog grub par mdzod// kye ma ho bde bas bde ba stsol// dam par rab tu zhugs par mdzod// bdag la rab tu bde bar gyur/ 
351a1(rgyud 'grel): / al lal ho// kye maho shi shi bzhugs shig ma' 'gro ba de ba'i mchog/ yongs su skong / kan tu zhugs/ de nas gar dang ldan pa yis// dbyangs 'di rnams kyis glu dablangs shing / 
351a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan g.yon du 'dud pa yis// g.yas kyi bdan gsum du bya// de ltar g.yas dang g.yon tshul gyis// sems dpa'i skyil krung bsnyams byas te// steng du dor dang 'og tu dor// skor dang de bzhin byug byas te// 
351a3(rgyud 'grel): metog bdug pa mar ma mchog/ dri yis mchod pa bskur ba yis// lhag ma gar gyi tshul gyis su// gling bu pi waM rdza rnga mchog/ de bzhin cang te'u rnam dag kyang // g.yon gyi'u chung rab bsdams te// lag pa g.yas pas brdung / 
351a4(rgyud 'grel): byaste// rang gi ming gis bskul bcas pas// sngags pas mchod pa dbul bar bya// zhi ba'i thal mo ba de mchog gis// thal ma'i sbyor bas dgyes pa bskyed// g.yon du 'dod pas phyag bya ning // 'jam dang bcas pas 
351a5(rgyud 'grel): blta ba'i mig/ smin pa mig dang mchug don pa// kha dang lus kyis gdon pa yis// cha lugs ji bzhin gang bya ste// phyag rgya thams cad dbul bar bya// nam swA sar+b+ba bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ zhes pas phyag rgya rab gnas te/ 
351a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa mchog ni dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis btab na// bdag nyid dang ni yang na gzhan// sgrub pa pa ni myur 'grub ste// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog 'dra 'gyur/ 
351a7(rgyud 'grel): langs pa'i tshe yang de bzhin du dbang bskur ba dang / bsrung ba la sogs pa byas te/ bde ba'i thal mos dgyes pa bskyed nas ci dga' gnas par bya'o// oM rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang // rdo rje rin chen bla na med pa/ 
351a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang // rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// a ho su kha zhes pa'i ming // rdo rje sems gang gang klog pa// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsod nams rnams ni byin brlabs 'gyur// bcom ldan 
351b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das bdabachen po rdo rjes pas dpa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// / sarba ma ng+ga la// // rgyag skad du/ shrI badz+ra sa twA n+ya sI ti nA ma ban+de/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje sems 
351b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rdzas su dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// rang gnas yul chags nyams dka' bar// kun rdzob 'phrul pa'i dkyi'a'akhor la// rnam dag gnyis med yul kun sbyar// byang chub 
351b3(rgyud 'grel): sems byung rgyal ba'i mchog/ de la de snang rol mo'i chos// srid mtha' mi dmigs dus gsum 'gog/ rnam bcas bya ba'i rgyud ldan zhing // rigs bdag dkyil 'khor bstad pa'i gnas// nges pa'i gsang mchog rtsa ba'i 
351b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung // de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs chen po// gnyis dang gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ rjes su dran pa skyed byed pa'i// cho ga bzang ba rmad du byung // gsang ngon brgyud pa rdo rje'i cig/ dus gsum rgyun gyi mtshan ldan ba cing / 
351b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs bdag dkyil 'khor bstod pa'i gnas// 'khor ba'i bya ba kun gnas 'jug/ dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang // bstan sgrub yan lag dang bcas bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i yul/ 
351b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i yan lag kun rdzogs shing // nges pa'i gsang bsnyen mdzad pa'i// 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor blan med// thams cad dus zhes bya ba yi// lta ba la sogs 'byung ba'i chos// nyon mongs gnas kun rnam dag cing / 
351b7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin mnyam pas spros dang bral// yang dag sangs rgyas bde ba che// kun tu goms pas gsal byed pa'i// yan lag lan gnyis rdzogs pa'i grogs// rab sbyangs pas ni 'jug 'gyur zhing // rigs 'dzin gnas 
351b8(rgyud 'grel): kun 'grod byed cing // rgyu rkyen cha shas kun rdzogs shing // thun mong bye brag rkyen gyi stobs// snga ma las byung phyi ma'i rgyun// 'bras bu tshogs pa'i bdag nyid do// sa dang sar gnas rig 'dzin kun// rang rig sbyar

352a2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gnas mthong zhing // nges pa'i sa mchog rdzogs par 'gyur// rigs kyi 'khor la kun bskar zhing // rigs kyi gnas rnam rnam dag pas// rig mchog yon tan bzang po'i tshigs// rigs kun rgyal bas mnyam sbyor ba'o// 
352a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nges pa'i theg le'i mchog/ dam pa las byung dam pa'i yul// de gnas tshul gyi phreng ba nyid// yang dag bsdeb pas brgyan du byas// dkyil 'khor chen po dga' 'tshal dag/ chos kyi rgyal po'i grong khyer mchog

356b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra d+hU pe/ oM badz+ra A lo kaM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ oM badz+ra a ku sha dzaHoM badz+ri pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra shri khe le baM/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De ho// 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs rnams kyis// rnam mdzes phreng ba'i rgyan thogs shing /

356b5(rgyud 'grel): du yod med rnal 'byor mthus// na mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ dzaHhUM ba ho// e a ra li b+ha ga ban/ 
356b6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+yaho// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHtiSh+Tha badz+ra ho// sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol pa'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis 
356b7(rgyud 'grel): gnon mdzad pa'i// rtog pa du ma'i sgo 'dogs gcod par mdzad// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mtha' yas// snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings la rol// kun 'byung yon tan stsol med ldan grub snang // 
356b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod rang las byung // mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med lhun grub pas// tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs gnas// sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan phrin las rgyan// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha 
357a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// oM AHhUM a ti/ bu ho/ sarba ta thA ga ban+da naM ka ro mi/ a la la ho/ dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying pa'i thabs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// sri zhu byas shing bteg pa'i 
357a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos pas phyag 'tshal lo// oM bde bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyis/

357a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas btab cing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i bdag/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ ma hA mu dra s+t+waM/ rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ bdag cag sbubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// rigs mchog

357a8(rgyud 'grel): rdorje khu tshur so so yi// mdzub mo lugs kyu lta bur bya// oM badz+ra satwa ka ra ma nu dra hU~M/ oM badz+ra pa na pe nu sur ta ti pu pa ra mu sa ma yo ga si ta A hUM/ oM AHhUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// 
357b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol tu gsol// gyen du 'thor dang zur 
357b2(rgyud 'grel): du 'bebs// mar mi 'debs sogs so so'i rgya// gling bu dang ni pi wang dang // rgyud mangs rgyud drug sil snyan dag/ dngos 'byor sprul pa gang yang rung // rim bzhin sngags dang sbyar te dbul/
